Summary: Really huge rooms. Great beds and pillows. Great location but a long walk to the gate. Overpriced for a hotel that is really not that close to the gate. Breakfast was really bad, cold, and small selection. Staff was great. We would stay here again if we can get a better price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope you had a safe travel back home.  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Great value, very close to Disney
Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for a week, we had comfortable stay. Every time we had breakfast, Linda went above and beyond to make us feel like home. This place is perfect for families.  Thank you
Manager Response: Greetings gonzaloh435,   Thank you for your review, we appreciate your time and feedback.  We are so happy to hear Linda from breakfast provided great service to you and your family. We look forward on welcoming you back soon!   -Front Desk Team

Summary: Conveniently close to parks! Nice free breakfast with super friendly and attentive serving staff, like Linda! Front desk staff were very helpful too. The room was very clean and larger than we expected. The ice maker, washer and dryer were conveniently located and working perfectly. Overall, an excellent place to stay for the price!
Manager Response: Dear 57viviennew,   Thank you for your review, we are so happy you enjoyed our amenities and hotel, thank you for acknowledging our breakfast attendant Linda! She has great customer service and is a super sweet employee here at Springhill Suites.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary: Fabulous place to stay when visiting Disneyland nice and close we still used the ART bus system but you could walk. Randy was amazing we had some trouble with our reservations but he didnâ€™t leave until we had it sorted out even though he had to stay late for us. The rest of the staff was also extremely helpful and kind. The Breakfast buffet saved us so much time in the morning we could just eat and leave.
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you for your review, we appreciate your time and feedback. We are happy to know our front desk supervisor Randy was able to help sort your reservation and provide great customer service, and also enjoyed our complimentary breakfast! Hope to welcome you back soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Great place to rest and feed our crew
Summary: We stayed here for our Disneyland visit.  We enjoyed comfortable beds and plenty of space for our family to rest at the end of the night. The breakfast bar will filled with plenty of options to get the crew fed and on our way to another Disney day.
Manager Response: We are so glad to see that you enjoyed your time with us! It's always uplifting to read a review like this, so thank you so much for taking the time to review us. We can't wait to serve you again, the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim!  - Front Desk Team

Summary: As an Ambassador Elite Marriott member, I become conditioned to nice properties with specific amenities. This property was truly a diamond in the rough with top-notch staff! Thank you!!! My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: Dear Joshua Olbricht, Thank you for the compliments! We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay and we certainly hope to see you again in the near future. Thank you on behalf of the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team

Summary: Randy checked us and he was just beyond amazing. They had spin the wheel at the front desk and my kiddo loved playing it every time we would walk by the entrance.  Location is great, but in my view if you are going to Disney use Uber, that's the best option, $9-12 one way ride will get you there within 7-9 mins. Free breakfast is the Cherry on top :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we are so thrilled your family had a great stay. And thank you for acknowledging our front desk Supervisor Randy, he absolutely has the best customer service and we are lucky to have her here with us. We hope you had a safe travel back home and we look forward to your next stay!  -Front Desk Team

Summary: I will start off by saying we are DVC members and all previous visits to Disneyland we have been fortunate enough to get a unit at Grand Californian. However, we planned this trip only 2 months ahead and those of you that know DVC and GC in general, not enough time to get a unit there (despite daily stalking). After reading many, many, many reviews we decided on Spring Hill Suites Maingate and we are SO glad we did! The unit was very clean when we arrived and had everything we needed. The front desk and staff were very nice and hospitable. We ordered from Instacart and they held it there no problem. The walk to Disneyland was easy - a tad less than a mile. We walked back and forth daily (even late at night). I understand what people are saying it is not where all the other
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! We're so fortunate to have such a wonderful location and staff. Our team loves to provide excellent customer service, and it really makes my day to see that you enjoyed your time with us! I am so excited to pass along your kind words to our entire team, as a way to celebrate a job well done.  We loved having you stay with us, and we hope to see you again the next time you are in Anaheim! Have a wonderful day!  -Front desk Team

Summary Heading: Fantastic choice for Disneylandâ€¦with wonderful staff!
Summary: I chose this Springhill Suites location because of the positive reviews on its location, staff, and generous-sized rooms. I also tend to choose Springhill Suites locations in general because of its free hot breakfast and the microwave and fridge that comes in each room.  I particularly was impressed with how friendly, warm, and accommodating the entire staff were at each point of service. Randy checked me in and was a great source of information of the hotelâ€™s amenities such as breakfast times and letting us know that Disneyland fireworks were visible from our hotel. In the morning, each staff member working in the breakfast area kept all breakfast items replenished, fresh, and hot when needed. At the front desk, Maria was able to explain how the ART bus works between the hotel
Room tip: I was in room 418 and I had a view of the fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to write us a review! We strive to provide the most excellent service around, and it truly makes my day to read your kind words. I was able to highlight this review at our most recent staff meeting, as a way to celebrate a job well done. We loved having you stay with us, and I hope we get the chance to serve you again soon. Happy Holidays!  -Front Desk Team

Summary: As someone who stays in lots of Marriotts for work, I wasnâ€™t expecting to be impressed by this hotel. The rooms are spacious and clean, the parking situation is easy, and the staff are friendly and competent. Randy at the front desk was very helpful with answering questions I had. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Disneyland or the greater OC area!
Manager Response: Dear 298amiray,   Thank you so much for your review, it is always great to hear our guest had a wonderful stay! We are happy to know our front desk supervisor Randy provided excellent customer service, we look forward to welcoming you back here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate!  -Nina Solano

Summary: Our stay here at the springhill suites was fantastic!! It's a short walk 15 min to downtown Disneyland to enter the park. Everyone from morning breakfast staff, front desk were very nice and welcoming and particularly manager Randy were exceptionally helpful and accommodating. The facility is very clean (which is very important  to me), there is complimentary free breakfast- standard bagels, toast, muffins, cereal, juice, coffee, tea but also a nice assortment of hot breakfast options also- scrambled eggs, sausage, oatmeal. I had no issues at our stay here, very easy from check-in to check-out. Would definitely stay here again next time we visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for taking the time to make a review of our hotel and recognize our team! We'll be sure to pass your comments on to Randy and the entire desk, breakfast and housekeeping departments! We love hearing about when our team makes a difference. We look forward to seeing you again.  -Front Desk Team

Summary: GREAT PLACE TO STAY!!=NICE STAFF ABD CLOSE TO EVERYTHING WE WANTED TO DO!!-EVEN WHEN OUR CAR BROKE DOWN THE STAFF HELP US GET BACK ON THE ROAD!!!GOOD BREAKFAST AND CLOSE TO DISNEYLAND,FOR OUR STAY-WHALE WATCHED AS WELL!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We appreciate your time and it is good to know you had a great stay with us. Thank you for acknowledging our team member's, we aim high to give our best customer service to each and everyone of our guest! Hope to see you next time you visit Anaheim.  Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Linda gave the friendliest and best service at breakfast.
Summary: Linda was the happiest and most helpful person. The front desk was quite friendly and accommodating. It was a great stay. The rooms are awesome. The ART bus worked really great; you can set it up in advance. The walk from the hotel to downtown Disney was not bad at all and then you can take the monorail into the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic review. We were pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate Thank you also for your kind compliments about the excellent service provided by Linda. Please be assured that we will pass on your comments to her. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you and your again soon.

Summary: Our stay was short but we enjoyed it, spacious rooms and great for family of five with free breakfast. My four kids really enjoyed the breakfast and visiting the themed parks, we are now heading to the Palm Springs desert and staying at another Marriott property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  - Front Desk Team.

Summary Heading: Disney stay, with a magical experience
Summary: I canâ€™t thank the staff enough at this hotel. They went the extra mile for my girlfriend and I. A super clean and spacious room, with a help breakfast for Disney days. When asked for any favor, the front desk went above and beyond to accommodate us. I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: We are flattered by your kind review of the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate. We are delighted that our caring hospitality stood out. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Always a pleasure to stay here
Summary: We absolutely love staying at this hotel when we want to do a long day at Disney and don't feel like driving back to San Diego. Some of the best beds and the staff is fantastic!!!! The location from mickey and friends parking lot.
Manager Response: Hello CbGriffin! We would like to thank you for your 5 star review and we are delighted you enjoyed our lovely beds and wonderful staff! We look forward to your next stay soon! -Front Desk Manager

Summary: Amazing Customer Service The rooms are amazing, the staff goes above and beyond any other Marriott I have ever visited, Randy that works the front counter was absolutely amazing, His customer service was beyond expectation. I called a few weeks before my stay and during our conversation I brought up we'd be there celebrating a birthday, to my surprise he set up a birthday banner and balloons in our room and what a fantastic surprise it was to us, the next morning Gladys was at the front desk and offered the birthday girl a free snack and a cold drink. Why did I remember their names? Because of their kindness, friendliness and helpfulness. Thank you for a great stay!! Our room as well as the hotel was clean and had more than enough space for our family of five, It is this kind of
Manager Response: Greetings katevF75off,  Thank you  for such a wonderful review, we appreciate your time and appreciate you recognizing our wonderful front desk agent Gladys and supervisor Randy! They both have wonderful customer service and I am happy you were greeted with the best! We hope to welcome you back soon! Thank you for the 5 stars! -Front Desk Manager

Summary: The hotel is awesome. Room is clean, staff are very welcome. They layout is great, you can work while the other person is resting. The pool is nice and clean. Breakfast is included too. We stay here for our Disney trip. You can walk to downtown Disney and get in from there or you can do a short Uber ride, very convenient. Hotel parking is easy too. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Khwan843, On behalf of the entire hotel team, I want to thank you for your feedback. It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most â€“ you! We look forward to your next stay with us! - Front Desk Team

Summary: The hotel is amazing and clean. The staffs are very friendly. They have delicious breakfast and I enjoyed it. I was exhausted after visiting Disney, and the hotel made me feel relaxed and comfortable. I definitely will choose this hotel when I visit Disney next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate for your stay. It is nice to read that we met all of your expectations. Your compliments will be shared with our team we look forward to welcoming you again soon. -Front Desk Team

Summary: I was quite happy with our stay this weekend. Gladys at the front desk was very accommodating and professional. The room was clean and comfortable and the breakfast was above average. The attendant on Sun 10/23 (with a leopard bow) was friendly and very efficient, working hard to keep everything stocked and tidy. We chose to uber back after a long day at the park and it was $15. No big deal. To save money, look into the shuttle service from the hotel "awaywego". We didn't and were just too tired at the end of the day to worry about it. Great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious review. We were pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate. Thank you also for your kind compliments about the excellent service provided by our front desk associate Gladys and our breakfast attendant Sylvia, please be assured that we will pass on your comments to them. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon. -Front Desk Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is clean and in a good location. Even though you could walk to Disney (a little too long for us), it's a short ride-share ride, which is what we did daily. Typical "hotel" breakfast, but greatly appreciated when everything these days is so expensive!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your most recent stay. We sincerely appreciate the kind feedback regarding our prime location and the benefits of the amenities provided in our hotel during your stay.  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Nice and Clean Hotel with Friendly Staff
Summary: I love to stay at this hotel. The staff was awesome and accommodating. The room was spacious and clean to fit a family of 6. The hotel is located within walking distance to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. I enjoy the complimentary breakfast, especially the warm waffle with syrup.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone. I guarantee you, that you will love it here :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and for taking the time to share your experience with us. It is great to read that you appreciated our location, staff, and breakfast. We hope to see you again soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary: We held our business meeting here and it wad just fabulous  the people there are great friendly and very accommodating . The meeting space was great clean and very up-to-date and definitely  recommend this  hotel for all hotel needs the lobby was alive and clean and the smell of the food was great . Very close to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for posting such an amazing review regarding your experience with us. We are so thrilled to hear you enjoyed our meeting room and hope you get the opportunity to visit us again soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Warm and friendly hotel perfect for business travel
Summary: Such a great place to stay! Everyone was so accomodating - especially Randy at the front desk. He really seemed to care about my preferences! Very nice flexible work space in the rooms. Beautiful pool and lobby!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your time at the hotel! Thank you for giving me the opportunity to congratulate Randy for a job well done! On behalf of our entire staff here at the SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate, we thank you for your business and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary: I had the best stay at Springhill Suites! All staff was absolutely incredible and could not have been more helpful. Everyone was so cheerful and really made my trip. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your kind rating of The SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate. We hope that this is only one of many fun vacations we will host for you. Come again soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: A warm and friendly place to stay
Summary: I came with family for our annual Disney trip and we were treated to a warm welcome and a very clean hotel stay. Nina the Manager was so nice to us and ensured my family had a great time. She is an asset with her warm, friendliness, talking to my kids. Our room was clean and comfortable and this really was the best trip we had yet. Looking forward to coming back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star feedback on your recent stay with us at SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate. We are pleased to hear that Nina provided great customer service and was able to accommodate you through out your stay. We hope that you will stay with us again in the near future.  Sincerely, Front Desk Team

Summary: We really enjoy our stay at the hotel . In anehiem on ball rd. We had some very nice people.  Susie was so helpful to us every night we came in. She give us bands for our feet talk to us about our day.  We also had very nice experience  with Nina, Maria, Gladys, Edward, Emilia, and Aracely . Thanks for the wonderful experience.   Tom and Patty  Jorgensen and family ðŸ‘ª
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your recent stay with us. We are delighted to know that the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate was the right place to stay for you and your family. We will share your kind words with the entire Team, they will be proud of the good job they did to make your stay memorable, we are looking forward welcoming you back again soon.  -Front Desk Team

Summary: We are repeat guests and love the hotel which is why we always choose to stay here. The staff is great, but we miss Cynthia. There is nothing like coming back from your long day at Disney and sharing your day with her. She always takes an interest in your day, and we love being called young man/lady! She is also a wealth of Disney information and updates, and we miss that. We hope you recover soon and look forward to seeing you on our next trip. The Nickerson family definitely misses you, Cynthia!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your kind rating, It is greatly appreciated when we have guests letting other future guests know what a fantastic team we really are. We will pass on your compliments to Cynthia and let her know that the great customer service she provided you really made a impact on your previous stays. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Have a wonderful rest of the year. ï»¿ -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Our only complaint, the room coffee maker
Summary: We chose this hotel because we needed some place within walking distance to Disneyland for a "work" trip.  Such a surprise.  It was clean, the room was spacious enough for what we needed, the staff were awesome.  Our only complaint, and it seems to be the norm now, are those darn little "in-room" coffee makers that just spit a bit of water across a filter and call it coffee.  The coffee is nothing more than instant coffee.  I guess if that is our only complaint, then we ended up with a pretty good hotel.  Would we stay here again, absolutely.  Would we bring our own coffee-maker, absolutely .  The shower was one of the best I have experienced regards to water pressure, ditto the hair dryer's air pressure.    Defiantly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Please note that we have shared your comment so we can further improve our overall guest experience. We hope to see you again soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel especially when visiting Disneyland parks.
Summary: Great location if you are going to Disneyland parks. Disneyland is within walking distance - you could also walk to the California Adventure Park if you wanted to.  Pool and the hot tub is nice. I like that checkout is at 12p instead of earlier in the day - gives you time to sleep in, sip in the pool one last time and then leave.  They do have breakfast every morning, which is nice also. I do wish they were more mindful of plastic wastage though.  Breakfast is standard continental breakfast.  Great location  Plenty of parking  Easy to get to  Great for families  Great for couples  Recommend
Manager Response: Weâ€™re pleased to know we made such a good impression. Hope to see you again for a future stay at The Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate! Thank you for your review. -Front Desk Team

Summary: Great location only a few blocks walk from Downtown Disney.  The walk was easy enough to get back and forth safely. Walk via Walnut St and not Disneyland Dr for the shortest distance. Quieter street to walk on.
Manager Response: Weâ€™re happy that you gave us the opportunity to host you at The Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate, and weâ€™d love to see you again soon! thank you for sharing your rating.  -Front Desk Team.

Summary Heading: Love staying on this side of the park!
Summary: First, the staff were wonderful and helpful. Second, I loved staying on this side of Disneyland. I have been to DL numerous times and always stayed on the major hotel side (not the DL hotels).  We were able to bypass so much of the crowd on other side, and were able to get through security easier. We did have to walk through downtown Disney, but it was better than all the streetlights and cars.  I will always stay on that side of the park from now on!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 star review and the wonderful comments about the location of our Hotel and especially about our team, we look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thanks again,  Front Desk Team.

Summary: We arrived around noon for our 4 night stay from NJ.  Although our rooms (2) were not ready, as check-in was 3:00PM, they were going to tag and check our luggage so we could begin our Disneyland park visit.  While doing a quick freshen up in the lobby bathroom (7 hour flight from the east coast), rooms became ready and we were checked in around 12:30PM.  Actually, I was not expecting that, but a nice surprise.  Rooms were not adjoining, but right across from one another.  Rooms were clean and everything (AC, electric, shower, etc.) functioned well.  Lobby was great, clean and neat.  Front desk was curteous.  Maid service was every 3 days, so we got it once.  The room was freshened up with beds made and new towels provided (amongst other things).  Breakfast was great.  We love
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback regarding Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. We appreciate your positive compliments regarding our Hotel. We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and hope you will continue to choose Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate for your future travel needs.  Best regards,  Front Desk Team.

Summary: Great service. Front desk staff was really helpful. Room was clean and met our family needs. Will be happy to recommend the hotel to prospective customers especially those wishing to spend time at the nearby Disneyland parks
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so happy that you had an awesome hotel stay with us, It's also great to hear that our staff team was very attentive to your needs.  Looking forward to hearing from you on your next stay with us.  Sincerely,  Front Desk Team

Summary: Our family visited for Disneyland way back in October but never got to thank Cynthia for her great service before leaving! She was so genuine and kind, and addressed our concerns back when we had to get boarding passes. Because of her great advice, we were able to get boarding passes every day we were there! It was so nice being able to see her every night after a long day at Disney, and she was absolutely delightful! So sorry it took so long to leave a review, but we hope Cynthia sees this. Thank you Cynthia we loved our stay. Sincerely, the Haderlie Family
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, and for the special kind words regarding our Disneyland Expert Cynthia, It is great to hear that she made this trip both perfect and wonderful for your family, It will be our pleasure to be your gracious and friendly hosts the next time you're in Anaheim. See you next time and have a great rest of the year!  ï»¿Warmest Regards,  Front Desk Team.

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms, but a hike to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed 4 nights at the SpringHill Suites Anaheim Maingate. The rooms are larger than most hotel rooms, which is great for families. There's a big closet for storing luggage, too. Rooms were clean, comfortable, and had the basics. A/C (a must in Anaheim) was nice and cold, but comes from a wall unit so it is loud and blasts the person nearest the unit with air. We cranked it up for a while right before bedtime and then turned it off for the night, and that seemed to work best. Breakfast is complimentary and there's a lot of variety. There is both indoor and outdoor seating.  The pool closes at 10pm. If your room is facing the pool you'll hear noise up until it closes, but the hotel is pretty quiet after that. The Disneyland fireworks go off between 9:30 - 9:45pm each night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Warmest Regards, Front Desk Team.

Summary: We loved our stay very comfortable nice pool and just around the corner to Disney land also, a wonderful breakfast!! Our rooms were very clean  the hotel staff was so friendly and very helpful to answer any questions we may have. Canâ€™t wait to book again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing our hotel to escape the high temperatures a couple of weeks ago. We are glad you were able to enjoy our hotel amenities such as our outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms and complimentary breakfast buffet, along with our close proximity to Disneyland, We are so happy our staff provided your family with great customer service. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in your future travels.  Sincerely,  Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Family Friendly-As close as most other non-Disney hotel
Summary: Stayed here with two kids for a 3 day trip to Disney.  The rooms are small, but we did not use it for anything other than sleeping and bathing and it was perfectly fine. The sofa bed was very helpful for us as our two kids are used to not sharing a bed. If you have kids that can share a bed, you can easily sleep 4 kids and 2 adults using the 2 queen beds and the sofa bed. We requested service one of the 4 days.   We used the pool one afternoon, it was clearly used a lot and I could see people thinking it was dirty. We were not here for the pool, so it was fine.   The breakfast was fine. Simple, but it worked for us. Same thing every morning and enough to get us through the morning at Disney.  Parking is $20 per night at this hotel.  Getting to Disney is a trek. The walk from the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment and sharing your experience with everyone here on TripAdvisor! Iâ€™m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to make use of our pool to relax and rejuvenate during your trip to Disneyland. Aside from walking or driving in to the park, you can also ride the ART shuttle for a nominal fee daily, Thank you again for sharing, we hope to have you back again next time youâ€™re in Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: We really enjoyed our one night stay
Summary: Very friendly staff. Room very clean. Food was okay.  Wish I stayed an extra day to try the swimming pool and the small gym that was there. Beds were comfortable and pillows were great I asked for extra ones and they provided them.
Manager Response: Greetings 30clock,   Thankyou for your 5 star review, we are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff which makes you feel at home, Randy was friendly caring and generous with his time in helping me with some advice (appreciate this!) nice pool and gym facilities, one of the best breakfast buffets I have ever experienced too. Wish I could of stayed longer - next time...
Manager Response: Thank you Ms. Adams for your 5 star review, we are so happy to hear our front desk supervisor Randy was able to provide great customer service.  We hope to welcome you back soon. -Front Desk Team

Summary: My family had visited Disneyland earlier this year and stayed at this property. They raved about Cynthia and told us when we decided to come we need to meet her. I took the liberty of calling Cynthia ahead of time and explaining my plans. I was bringing my company of 18 with me. She spent a good hour and a half helping me with rooms, Disney tickets and local places to eat. Once we arrived she was everything my family said. Her warmth and smile is the best greeting entering the hotel. She loves her job and it shows! We spent another 2 hours back and forth at the desk with her as she personalized our trip. It was perfect! Thank you Cynthia! You are a true ROCKSTAR at your job.
Manager Response: Greetings! Thank you for your fantastic review and for our 5 stars! We are so happy to know Cynthia provided you with some great information and was able to help you plan out your stay, that is why she truly is a Rockstar around her, she definitely loves to provide the best customer service and her love for Disney! We hope to welcome you and your family back soon!  -Nina Solano

Summary: Welcome back Cynthia! Thank you for taking the time to help us with our trip while you were off work yourself. It was a great trip. We were glad we got to meet you before our trip ended. You are a delight and wonderful as a "Disney expert!" The hotel was clean and spacious. The a/c is extremely noisy. Breakfast was a great addition to our stay. We look forward to coming back at the end of the year!
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you for your feedback and 5 stars, we appreciate you and your time! Thank you for mentioning Cynthia, she sure does have some great Disney tips and tricks! We will look into the A/C in the room you were in, once again, thank you for your review! -Front Desk Team.

Summary: Outstanding place to stay for Disney. Very friendly staff, great room, good breakfast and less than a mile easy walk to Disney and walk home after a long day at Disney.   Sofabed was comfortable and bathroom was the best of our trip which included more expensive hotels, with lots of space, towels, and strong shower.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for your feedback, we are happy you had a good stay!  We hope to welcome you back soon!  -Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Cynthia @ Front Desk a huge Disney Info Plus!
Summary: We stayed here recently to do 2 days at Disneyland and CA Adventure!  The location is good.  A little long for walking, but the front desk was great and they were willing to waive our hotel parking, so that we could pay for Disney parking.  Alternatively can walk about 25 min back to hotel.   We agree with other reviews as we met Cynthia as well, and she was truly amazing and passionate in sharing all the info and tips she knew about the Disney parks and how to best and most efficiently visit and benefit.  She spent a good amount of time chatting with us and answered all our questions and how to use the app, etc.  THANK YOU SO much!   The rooms were perfect for our needs, comfortable beds and a/c.  We used the pool one afternoon.  It was well used and crowded, which probably
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for thank you for the 4 stars!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and was provided with amazing customer service by Cynthia! She is definitely passionate in what she loves to do, and that is sharing her knowledge and love for Disney! We hope to welcome you and your family back soon! Thank you,  Nina Solano

Summary: My family and I (group of 6 adults 3 kids) stayed at the hotel June 23-26th. Cynthia at the front desk was absolutely incredible. She was super helpful and responsive to all our needs. She gave us great info to help us enjoy our first ever trip to Disney. Even when we had issues with the hotel, all minor, Cynthia made sure all the issues were quickly addressed. Usually you do not get this kinda genuine hospitality from hotel employees but Cynthia went above and beyond so I HAD to leave her a review. She was always professional, happy and eager to help. She's a Rockstar! Thank you Cynthia for making us feel like family!!
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you for staying with us, we are so thrilled you had a great stay. And thank you for acknowledging our front desk agent Cynthia, she absolutely has the best customer service and we are lucky to have her here with us. We hope you had a safe travel back home and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The front desk night shift is absolutely the best. Cynthia and Randy to be specific. Theyâ€™re super nice & care for the customers. They truly go out their way to make sure you feel welcomed and have everything you need to be comfortable during your stay. Super nice people. Theyâ€™re super friendly and definitely the best. Aside from the front desk, the rooms are really nice and neat. Itâ€™s such a comfortable experience. I will most definitely come back here. Iâ€™ve had no problems while staying here ! 11/10 recommend.
Manager Response: Greetings sofs0110,  Thank you for your review and 5 stars! We appreciate your time and we are thrilled you had a great stay.  Thank you so much for acknowledging Cynthia and Randy!   We hope to welcome you back in the near future. -Front Desk Team

Summary: This is a great hotel if you are going to Disneyland. It is about a 20 minute walk to the parks. At the end of the night it cost us $10 to Uber back for a family of 4. Breakfast is good. It is back to buffet style and has a little of everything. Rooms are large and comfy with a sofa sleeper that is an added bonus. The star of the hotel is Cynthia the Disney Concierge. She knows everything there is to know about Disney. She spent about 45 minutes with our family planning out our agenda. Everything she taught us was spot on. My kids could not wait to tell her about their day each night. Cynthia is amazing at her job and we appreciate her very much! Mahalo Cynthia!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  we are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your next visit to Anaheim! Thank you for acknowledging our superstar Cynthia, she has some great knowledge about Disneyland!   Thank you, Front Desk Team

Summary: The staff is spectacular especially the front desk! Maria and Randy took care of my family during our stay and gave us great customer service! they were friendly nice and very professional. It was a great stay if you have the pleasure of meeting them just know that you will be in good hands and they will take care of you, our room was clean and the bed was comfortable, the breakfast buffet was awesome, this is a beautiful family resort hotel. I definately enjoyed staying there!
Manager Response: Q8767JVkristenb,  On behalf of the entire hotel team, I want to thank you for your feedback.  It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most â€“ you! We appreciate your time and thank you so much for acknowledging Randy & Maria, they sure do have wonderful customer service!  We look forward to your next stay with us!   -Front Desk Team

Summary: Moldy shower curtain, foggy windows, dark room, and no caffeinated tea. Would have had a nice view if I could have seen through the clouded windows. Need I say more? Wheeling itself is a beautiful place to visit.
Manager Response: Greetings Travel4Bizz,    Thank you for your review. We are sorry we fell short with our shower curtain, windows and selection of teas. We will have our maintenance team take a look at the room to prevent this from accruing in the future.   Best,  Front Desk Team

Summary: Cynthia you are a true Disney Expert. Our 3 day trip was perfect because of your tips. Although my son had done all the research to make our trip great, Cynthia's knowledge and kindness made our trip perfect. Thank you for sharing all your tips and tricks with us. I also want to say how Cynthia went above and beyond by sharing her phone number with us if we had any questions when she wasn't at work. That shows just how much she cares about her guests. Thank you, Cynthia. We will see you in December.
Manager Response: Greetings,   Thank you for your feedback and 5 stars! Most importantly, thank you for shining light to our front desk agent Cynthia! She is the best when it comes to her customer service and knowledge of Disney, we are thrilled she went above and beyond for you and your family..  We hope to see you again in the future!  We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for the weekend of the Star Wars Celebration. Our stay was great and we agree Cynthia was the star of the hotel. She is a wealth of knowledge and might be as big of a fan as us when it comes down to Star Wars. Her excitement and love for her job shows tremendously through her customer service. Each night she would ask us about our day at the event and was always so happy listening. We even joked about cloning her so there was more of her around. (no pun intended ;) ) Thank  you for being such a joy to meet Cynthia.
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire hotel team, I want to thank you for your feedback.  It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, we are so happy you had a great stay and our front desk agent Cynthia provided amazing customer service. Star Wars is definitely Cynthia's favorite movies, especially baby Yoda!  On behalf our our hotel, we look forward for your future stay!   -Nina Solano Front Desk Manager

Summary: A very special thank you to Randy at front desk. We booked a room for our son and daughter-in-law to celebrate their anniversary and Randy went above and beyond to make their stay wonderful. We wanted to send an anniversary gift and Randy researched online and called us back with the information and called us back a second time to say the gift arrived and was put in refrigerator with a special note left on their door for the couple to retrieve their gift. We are lifetime Marriott Platinum Elite members and have travelled for forty years staying at Marriott properties worldwide. Randy epitomizes the reason we love staying at Marriott properties. Thank you again, Randy. We need more Randy's !
Manager Response: Dear Skitey,  Thank you so much for the 5 stars, we appreciate your time and feed back. Thank you for shining light on one of our best front desk agents, Randy! I am so happy he provided excellent customer service for you and your family. And yes, we definitely need more Randy's! =)   40 years, wow! Thank you for your loyalty to Marriott! We look forward to your next stay with us and hope you had a safe travel back home.

Summary Heading: Rooms large enough for a family of 4 with teens.
Summary: The rooms were very large and accomadated our family with 2 teenagers. There was a separate sitting area with an L-shaped couch and desk area.  Breakfast had a  great selection and even had a waffle station! It set us up perfectly for a day at the park.
Manager Response: Jennifer,   On behalf of the entire hotel team, I want to thank you for your feedback.  It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most â€“ you!  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We recently stayed at this property for 3 days and 2 nights for a trip to the Disneyland Resort.  The location of the hotel is great because it is extremely quiet and a nice place to relax away from the parks but it is also a very close and convenient walk to get there.  The rooms are very large and easily accommodated our family,  The cleanliness was great and the hotel amenities were very nice.  I would definitely say that what really made our stay was the outstanding customer service that we received throughout our stay.  We were lucky enough to have Randy working the front desk all three days we were there.  He had a very welcoming and positive attitude every day and bent over backwards to make our stay as enjoyable as possible.  When we arrived there was a slight mix up
Manager Response: Hello 55camerons,   Thank you so much for our 5-star review, we appreciate your time and most of all, thank you for acknowledging Randy. Randy sure does provide excellent customer service and strikes for our guest to always fell welcomed and appreciated, I am so happy Randy was able to help you with your belongings on check out day, he is one of the best front desk agents here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate.   We all hope to welcome you back soon and once again, thank you for your time and feedback.  Sincerely,  Nina Solano

Summary Heading: Simple, convenient accommodations close to Disneyland and DCA
Summary: The Springhill Suites Maingate was a great option for our two-day family Disneyland trip.   The hotel is exceptionally close to the theme park, although not especially convenient for walking now that the former shortcut through employee parking to the Disneyland parking garage tram has been blocked by Disney. While the parks are reachable in a 25 minute walk, they can alternatively be reached in a 5 minute Uber/Lyft or 2 minute drive to the parking garages.  Our two queen studio room was spacious with a large bathroom, huge closet, useful desk, microwave/refrigerator kitchenette, and large couch. Our view was of the parking lot and a few trees, but the hotel was comfortably quiet despite being 100% full with lots of small children present. The AC was noisy, but pretty typical of
Manager Response: Greetings Cb4444,   Thank you for your review of our hotel and our 5-star score!  We are glad you had a great time here and we appreciate your feedback. I do apologize for the noise coming from the A/C, we will make sure our maintenance team fixes any issue with that a/c unit.   We hope to see you soon and had a safe travel back home, thank you for your loyalty to Marriott.  Sincerely,  Nina Solano

Summary Heading: Cynthia the Disney expert is the BEST
Summary: We read the reviews on this hotel and chose it in hopes to meet Cynthia. The first night she was not there but we had the pleasure of meeting her the next night. (Randy mentioned convincing her of wearing her Disney ears but she did have cute spirit jerseys each day) She is everything you read about. Cheerful, happy and loves her job! She is full of knowledge about everything Disney. Our trip went smoothly because of her tips. Even though I am a grandma I loved being called "young lady." She has such a beautiful and positive energy about her and each night she would ask us about our day. We love that she takes such an interest in her guests. Thank you Cynthia for a week of joy each day with you. You are everything we hoped for! Another bonus is her recommendation to Marris
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about Cynthia. She is amazing and goes above and beyond for all of our guests, we are truly lucky to have someone with her passion on our team!  Marris Pizza is delicious! We are happy to hear you enjoyed it just as much as we do. :)  We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Kind Regards,  Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary Heading: Didnâ€™t live up to all the rave reviews below
Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland like most patrons. I stayed in the only room that offered a king as my husband and I fit solely on king beds. Itâ€™s only offered in the standard sized rooms.  The standard suite isnâ€™t a suite, so be aware. Itâ€™s divided by a small half wall, and it slightly larger than a standard hotel room. I think itâ€™s fine for smaller children, but itâ€™s not enough room for my 11 and 13 yo, with just the pull out bed. The pull out bed isnâ€™t long. Donâ€™t be persuaded by the name â€œSuitesâ€. Also, if youâ€™ve stayed in the Springhill Suites hotels in other cities, I think these are smaller rooms.  Pros:  -Nice front desk, helpful and cheery. I didnâ€™t need much help, but my one ask was addressed quickly. Many patrons asked for directions and were helpful
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate the feedback you have provided.  In order to better uphold our commitment to deliver exceptional service to every guest, I have shared your feedback with the  leadership team. We will work to improve our arrival experience and do our best to prevent the challenges  you encountered from occurring in the future. I am disappointed to hear about the fluctuating water you encountered in your room, this is something that is not typical of our rooms our Chief Engineer is looking into this situation. I am pleased to announce that the hotel will be undergoing renovations starting at the end of this year, this will also include brand new lobby furniture. Thank you for the kind words about the front desk staff, we are truly lucky to have dedicated rock starts to ensure our guests have a magical stay.  Once again, we are very sorry for all the challenges you encountered and we hope  you will give us another opportunity  when your travels bring you back to the area.  Kind Regards, Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary Heading: Cynthia, your Disney expert makes this hotel even more amazing than it already is!
Summary: Best part about it was being greeted nightly after a long day at Disneyland by Cynthia at the front desk! Cynthiaâ€™s energy and ability to make guests feel like best friends is amazing. Cynthia is an asset you canâ€™t replace. This hotel was super clean, great beds, quiet and spacious. Nice breakfast to start the day.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  On behalf of the entire hotel team, I want to thank you for sharing about our Front Office Rock Star, Cynthia. . Our hotel aims to provide a truly unique experience, and we are thrilled that Cynthia was able to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future!  Kind Regards, Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, large rooms and brekkie included
Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. Cynthia is amazing. She is super helpful and welcoming. The rooms are big and clean and the beds were very comfortable. Weâ€™d love that there was a breakfast included so we were all full before heading into the park. The walk to the park is pleasant and only took 15 minutes. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  We are ecstatic that you had such a wonderful experience during your recent stay with us! Our hotel aims to provide a truly unique experience, and we are thrilled that Cynthia was able to exceed your expectations - we are very lucky to have her on our team! We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Kind Regards, Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary: Since we bought the â€œMagic Key Passâ€ from Disney we try to go back every other month to make the most of it. Every time we go we always choose this Specific Springhill Suites because of what they have to offer!  Number 1 is great service, the moment you walk in you are greeted right away by an energetic and lovable Cynthia! Who is very knowledgeable about the area and especially Disneyland! This is our second time seeing Cynthia and she always brings a smile to us and makes us feel safe and welcome! She gives the care and assurance that your trip will always go as expected and sheâ€™s an awesome person to talk to.   The room was also perfect although it do get really cold with the AC on. Due to covid youâ€™re going to have to ask the front desk if thereâ€™s a specific day you would
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your stellar rating and review! Weâ€™re extremely delighted to learn that you had a great stay and loved the overall experience. Cynthia is fantastic and we are extremely lucky to have her on our team!  We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.   Kind Regards,  Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary Heading: Thank you for the amazing experience!
Summary: 10/10 for the amazing experience. Breakfast was delicious all 4 days of our stay. Rooms are big and spacious. Cynthia was terrific. We are here for a final trip for our father as he is terminally ill. Cynthia took the time to get to know us throughout our stay and talk with us each day. She even took our family into a room where she could pray for us during this difficult time. There are not enough words to say thank you for going above and beyond for our family each day. And your Disney tips were spot on! Thank you Cynthia!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive feedback. We are very sorry to hear about your father,  I am pleased to hear that Cynthia went above and beyond to make your stay  comfortable, she is truly a gem. We hope you will choose our hotel again when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary: Dont forget the extra parking fee. Well our A/C was leakibg the first night and the room smelled musty. They had it fixed the next day but not the best start. Breakfast is ok but if your here for more then a few days it's the same so you'll want something else. Had to do laundry and they were out of detergent at the front desk so had to go to target and buy a big bottle so more cost. All in all I'd say go for a cheaper hotel as you will probably get about the same as here. To expensive for what you get. Parking should be included.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  We recognize your time is valuable and appreciate the feedback you have provided.  In order to better uphold our commitment to deliver exceptional service to every guest, I have shared your feedback with the  leadership team. We will work to improve our arrival experience and do our best to prevent the challenges  you encountered from occurring in the future.  I hope  you will give us another opportunity again when your travels bring you back to the area.  Kind Regards, Jessica Salazar General Manager

Summary: Shout out to Cynthia, who went the extra mi to combine my separate, different room type res into one and gave some great travel tips.  Roomwise, great room, which was clean, and the location is very conveniently located, quiet, and restful.  Much appreciated and many blessings.
Manager Response: Hello Elizabeth W,   Thank you for your 5 star review, we appreciate your time and feedback!  We are happy Cynthia was able to provide great customer service and helped arrange your reservation.  We look forward to your next stay here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate !  Thank you for your loyalty to Marriott,   Nina Solano

Summary: We've stayed at many Hotels in the Disneyland area, but this hotel was fabulous! Customer service was top notch and everyone working there was extremely friendly and helpful; Randy was the man of the hour. I was very impressed to see him out front greeting the guests as they arrived and left the hotel, he was welcoming and helpful with our reservation. The room was spacious with modern designs and furnishings, the breakfast selection was exceptional with lots of choices. This property is in walking distance of Disneyland; 18 minutes to be precise and for a good price. I highly recommend staying at this property.
Manager Response: Greetings StephanieCaldero,  I would like to thank you for taking the time for acknowledging our front desk agent Randy, he has great customer service and I can 100% agree he is friendly and helpful. We are so glad you and your family enjoyed your stay with us, thank you for your 5 stars, we appreciate you and most of all, thank you for your loyalty to Marriott!  Hope to see  you soon!  Nina Solano

Summary Heading: Cynthia, you are the face of the hotel
Summary: My Husband surprised me with a trip to Disneyland for my birthday. It was our first trip without the kids. Cynthia had some of the best tips for us going to the park.  Her suggestions on The Magic Key Holder foods and the Magic Key glasses were spot on.  The only thing that kinda left a bad taste in my mouth was the bald guy whom always seemed to be on his cell phone.  Sometimes he didn't even notice us. But meeting Cynthia was the cherry on the top of the cake. She really is as famous as they say.
Manager Response: Greetings ExecChefEllora,   Thank you for your 5 stars! We appreciate your time and feedback.  We are so happy Cynthia gave you and your husband some great customer service as she is such a rockstar with her Disney information, help and tricks!   We will also send this over to our management team in regards to our front desk agents using cell phone, I do apologize for our agent using his cell phone in front of you, our guest will always be our  #1 priority and that was not okay.  We  hope you think of us for your next visit to Anaheim!   Take care,  Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate team

Summary: The level of customer service from Cynthia is top notch. The energy and excitement she gives you welcoming you in, is the best! We stayed for 4 days and everyone and everything was crushing it. The housekeeping does a great job. Breakfast is delicious. A/C  is terribly loud but that is something the hotel says they are working on. The distance to the park is an ok walk. Overall the stay was great. We will be coming back! Keep crushing it Dudette Cynthia. You so totally rock ;)
Manager Response: Greetings Crushingitdude,  Thank you for giving us a 5 star review! We are pleased you had a great time here at our hotel.  And yes, our A/C's is something we working on, and I appreciate you for your patients.   We look forward to your next stay in the future.

Summary: If you are coming to the Disney parks this is your place to come. The reviews are right, magic happens right here. The front desk associate Cynthia will make your trip magical from beginning to end. It was our twins birthday and she made them special birthday pins and gave them each birthday treats. Then she spends all the time you need helping you plan your trip. It was truly magical how knowledgable she is. If you are lucky she is there every night to ask about your day when you get back. Thank you Cynthia for making our trip special. Your "kiddos" say hi!
Manager Response: Hello JosephMcGuire1357,   Thank you for taking the time to acknowledge our front desk agent Cynthia, she certainly has great Disney knowledge and we are so happy she was able to help plan your day!   Thank you for your 5 star review and we look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel was clean and pleasant and the staff was lovely. Randy at the front desk offered my rambunctious children some lollipops, which were very appreciated and quickly devoured!  We took an Uber the first morning at 8am to Disneyland - it was about 15-20 minutes for $17. Not a bad price but there was some traffic. We ended up walking the rest of the days - it's about a 20 minute walk from the hotel to the front gate.
Manager Response: Greetings Emily,   Thank you for your wonderful review, we highly appreciate your 5 stars!  Thank you for acknowledging our front desk agent Randy, as he has one of the best customer service here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate.   Hope to see you soon!

Summary: The staff at this hotel is top notch! Cynthia at the front desk is super helpful. She has great tips for Disneyland visitors and genuinely wants everyone to have a great experience. The security entrance at Downtown Disney is always less busy so we enjoy the walk from this hotel to Disneyland. Breakfast is also delicious!Great hotel!
Manager Response: Greetings rachelstraveling,  Thank you for your 5 star review we appreciate your time and feedback. Thank you for acknowledging one of our best Front Desk Agents Cynthia! We are happy to know she gave you those amazing tips!   Hope to see you soon!   Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary: NIce room, good location if you are visiting Disneyland. The breakfast is very good, the parking seems safe. We were 3 adult in a two queen bed room, it has a microwave and a fridge. The check in process was fast and the reception people friendly. We will consider to stay at the Springhill suites again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback! We are really happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you in the future :)

Summary: Had a great weeks long stay at Springhill Suites Main Gate. Cynthia provided some of the most outstanding service Iâ€™ve ever experienced, and went above and beyond to accommodate and made us truly feel valued. Simply outstanding!
Manager Response: Greetings Dadicus!  Thank you for the 5 star review, we are thrilled Cynthia was able to help you with your stay as she has some of the best customer service. We definitely hope to welcome your family back again in the future!!

Summary Heading: What, no beer and wine?! Cynthia to the rescue!!!
Summary: Shoutout to Cynthia at the front desk from when we first checked in. She was great. Super helpful and very knowledgeable with the surrounding area. She even made up for the fact they were in the process of renewing their beer and wine license. My wife and I have four boys and after a long day at the park, momma wants her wine and I can always enjoy a nice cold and refreshing IPA. Cheers! Rooms were clean, breakfast was as expected, I mean itâ€™s not steak and eggs, but with a family of six, weâ€™re losing money if we donâ€™t eat there. All and all, great experience. Weâ€™ll be back!
Manager Response: Dear eap2k1,   Thank you for the amazing review on Cynthia! She definitely loves her job! I am glad to hear she went above and beyond to make your experience at the hotel so wonderful. We really appreciate the time you took to send us your feedback. It is very appreciated. We look forward to seeing you in the future :) Hopefully we will have alcohol now that we got our alcohol permit ;)  Nina Solano and the front desk team

Summary: We have had the privilege of staying at this hotel several times. I love how itâ€™s super close to Disneyland, even walking distance. Cynthia at the front desk is always there to greet us and always has a smile on her face. She always updates us about the hotel as well as all things Disney! This is our home away from home. Hotel is always clean and well taken care of.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and 5 star review! We really appreciate the time you took to acknowledge your stay and our staff :) We agree Cynthia is great with her Disneyland tips and she definitely shines in her guest service! We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Magical moments at it's best when you meet Cynthia! We met Cynthia recently on our trip and her cheerful attitude was exactly what we needed to start our morning. Our room was not ready yet but she still gave us everything we needed to get to Disneyland. Spot on with tips. The best part of our magical moments with Cynthia is when we arrived late that night and got into our room she had a card and gift on our table with a special note thanking me for my service. I might have cried a bit to feel so acknowledged by her appreciation. Thank you Cynthia for such a beautiful thought. And wife says keep rocking on to Guns N Roses. ðŸ¤ŸðŸ¤ŸðŸ¤Ÿ We hope you enjoy working with Disneyland in your future. We will definitely be looking for you!
Manager Response: Greetings  BLUELINEPIRATE,   Thank you for your time and feedback, we appreciate your 5 star review!   This was such a wonderful review to read, Cynthia is simply the best ! Thank you for acknowledging her and her amazing heart!   We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We arrived at the hotel late on January 19 and we weâ€™re greeted with joy and excitement by the lovely receptionist Cynthia! She learned that it was my first trip and my first time being at Disneyland (my gf is always at Disneyland every year) and Cynthia decided to give us a pin from Disneyland! Very helpful and knowledgeable about the park too. We were only supposed to stay in the hotel for a night since we were going to move to a different hotel (because at the time we booked, there was only 1 room available and it was only available for 1 night). Cynthia learned about this and did her best to make sure that we wouldnâ€™t have to leave the hotel and drive another 20 miles! She managed to make our stay more comfortable and hassle-free. She also gave us the same rate that we paid
Manager Response: Greetings Sheane M!  Thank you for the 5 star review, we are thrilled Cynthia was able to help you with your stay as she has some of the best customer service. We definitely hope to welcome you and your girlfriend back soon!

Summary: Thank you for a perfect stay. Cynthia, you are practically perfect! From the moment you walk in the hotel you are greeted by such a warm greeting full of happiness and excitement from Cynthia. She has so much love for Disneyland and that is perfect for families coming to visit. Cynthia spent a good 45 minutes with us explaining everything she could to our group. We had 4 families with us and she took the time to answer all of our questions and then even go as far as setting us up with scooters for our parents. Every night we got our nightly recap with Cynthia and the kids couldn't wait to show off their new toys. Cynthia you are definitely part of our family now and we couldn't be more excited! We also want to thank the hard working breakfast staff. Our breakfast was delicious
Manager Response: candacemarie1949,   Thank you for acknowledging our wonderful front desk agent Cynthia, It is always great to know she provided you with her amazing customer service. She definitely goes above and beyond for our guest and we are happy to know you and your family were able to get some good tips and tricks from her.   We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Chose this hotel based on proximity to Disneyland and TA reviews. Location is excellent as the park is literally down the street from the hotel.   Giving 4 stars because:  1) the AC works too well. If you set it to even 72 or 73 your room will be an igloo in about 5 minutes. But if you turn it off then the room gets too stuffy. I spoke with other members of my party an ALL of their ACs had this same issue   2) calling the front desk proved to be a tedious chore at times. Many times the phone would ring and ring or we would be placed on hold than hung up on. Had to follow up an hour after an initial request for some items to be brought up.   Free breakfast included is mediocre at best. Rooms were clean and most of the staff members were cordial and helpful. If you need to have
Manager Response: Greetings briannC6991FY,   Thank you for your feedback, it is very much appreciated. We do apologize for the A/C units issue, I have took the time to go over this with our maintenance team so this will help prevent this issue for the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We really do apologize for our not answering the phone as all departments are still understaffed. We will do our very best to prevent this from happening again.   We hope to welcome you and your family in the near future.

Summary: I am so glad we chose to stay here for our Disneyland trip. The front desk was always friendly and accommodating and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The beds and pillows were great and the breakfast was just fine for a quick bite before heading out for the day. It is about a 15 to 20-minute walk to Disney, but you can certainly take the bus system or park a car. Honestly, I would say save the 25 dollar parking fee at Disney and walk.  Would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Hi Alisha D,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We appreciate you time and feedback.  We hope to welcome you and your family back soon!

Summary: This hotel is everything you need for a family trip. The staff, rooms, breakfast and distance to Disneyland are great! I want to give a special recognition for Cynthia. She is well worth the wait to plan your trip. She had a line of people waiting for her tips and help on how to spend their days at Disneyland. I waited about 45 minutes as she did a wonderful job answering phones, ringing customers up, checking in customers and still giving each of us plenty of time to help us all out with such enthusiasm. She clearly loves Disneyland and everything she set our trip up with was spot on. We had an amazing time. Thank you Cynthia! We will see you in March if you haven't left us for Disneyland. You will be a great asset wherever you go!
Manager Response: Greetings  raiderzfanz4lifez196,  Thank you for your 5 star review and for your time.  We appreciate your feedback and thank you for acknowledging of front desk  superstar Cynthia. It is always a pleasure to know we have a wonderful and hard work time providing our guest with the best customer service there is in Anaheim!   We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great clean and comfortable with great employees!
Summary: This hotel is in the perfect location for a family visit to Disneyland, especially because they have employees that love Disney and have so much knowledge about the Disney experience.  Especially Cynthia and Gladys.  They are the sweetest and have such a good personalities they make the hotel glow!  They actually remember your name and are so friendly to the kids, itâ€™s awesome. Rooms are kept super clean as well as the hall ways and gym.  The pool is very nice and has a great area to share a pizza.  They have a really nice fire pit out front and comfortable seating for everyone.
Manager Response: Greetings Pat E,   Thank you for your 5 star review, we were glad to have seen you and your family before the year end.  Cynthia and Gladys have such great customer service and i am thrilled they were able to help make your stay even better.  We hope to see you soon and happy holidays to you and your family!  -Nina Solano and the front desk team.

Summary: Hotel was clean and quiet but still close to Disneyland.  Staff was exceptional especially Cynthia at the front desk.  She gave us some great tips on food, places to visit and where to goâ€”all of them perfect!  Thank you for our terrific stay!
Manager Response: Greetings maryannlV3636EU,  Thank you for your 5 star review we appreciate your time and feedback. Thank you for acknowledging one of our best Front Desk Agents Cynthia! We are happy to know she gave you those amazing tips!   Hope to see you soon!   Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary: Wow what an amazing Trip, And Cynthia was the icing on the cake. My kids and I were all so excited to go see Batuu for the First time and Cynthia had all the tips on how to maximize our experience in the park. As we were checking in at the lobby they happened to of had on the warriors game. I am a HUGE Warriors fan being from the bay area. Cynthia was telling me how she saw Steph Curry in the park one time and didn't go get a picture. I could have died. She even shared with me how her Husband hasn't let her live that one down. Lol. Cynthia your amazing. My family and I will be back because of you!
Manager Response: Greetings GSWfan4Life,   Thank you for such an amazing 5 star review, we truly appreciate your time! We are happy to hear Cynthia gave you and your family a great experience here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate!   We hope to see you all soon, Curry back now! (haha)     Take care,   -Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team!

Summary: Cynthia at SpringHill was amazing! But everyone was so kind and helpful. Not only did they go above and beyond by decorating our room for my moms birthday but Cynthia  told me all the secrets for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Greetings ldennis1 !   We are so happy you and your family enjoyed your stay here with us, Thank you for acknowledging our front desk agent Cynthia! She definitely has plenty of good tips when it comes to Disney!   Take care,   -Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team!

Summary Heading: Couldn't have done it without Cynthia
Summary: My family and I stayed at your hotel during our trip to Disneyland. THANK GOD for your front desk person Cynthia. Because of her expert advice and knowledge of the park, We were able to get onto Rise of the Resistance and The Spider-Man Web Slingers without any problems. She has the best tips. The rooms were extremely spacious. And the cleanliness was superb, With Covid and all its Variants swirling around you can't be to careful. Its good to know they have taken precautions. This trip was magical and perfect in every way. Cynthia is a true breath of fresh air. We will be back for sure Thank you for making our stay Glorious and memorable.
Manager Response: Hello DisneysGeorgianPeach,   WOW!! We are so happy you were able to get on those rides!!! Cynthia is the best!! We are glad to know she was able to assist you and your family during your stay! Thank you for acknowledging our hard working team!   We look forward to your next stay with us!   -Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary: Hello Friends And MA 'Halo. Let me Take a moment to tell yall about my new sista Cynthia. She da Best. She went outta her way to make out trip Special And My Daughters Birthday Extra Special. When we got there we was greeted with the Biggest  heartfelt welcoming and happiness. She felt like a true islander and not one of your traditional howles. Cynthia asked us what we was there for and we had said my daughters birthday. She let her have a little ice cream from the freezer. To top if off even more when she found out we were going to Goofys Kitchen for her Birthday, she reminded us not to forget to get her da birthday pin. All Day my Daughter felt like a Princess, as everyone wished her a happy Birthday. She Felt Like Moana Herself. Sista Cynthia You Always gonna Be Ohana to us.
Manager Response: Greetings allisonserrano0853,   We are so happy to hear Cynthia gave you and your family great customer service!! You have mentioned so much appreciation, we know she will be overwhelmed with your review! We truly hope to see you next time you come to Anaheim! Thank you for your 5 star review and for acknowledging Cynthia!   Take care!  -Nina Solano

Summary: Randy saved the day - Marriott Bonvoy screwed our reservation up (twice) and our family of six was left with three day passes to Disneyland and no place to stay, during one of the busiest weeks of the year! Randy pulled through to make sure we had a place to play and stay! This location is safe, affordable and conveniently located just a twenty minute walk from the parks. As a bonus - we had a room with a view of the fireworks and our kids loved swimming every night.
Manager Response: Greetings Excursion438035,  Wow! Thank you for such a great review! We are so happy Randy was able to give you amazing customer service but most of all how is was able to fix the situation!  Randy is such a awesome front desk agent, thank you for acknowledging him and we truly hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim!   -Nina Solano

Summary: I kept reading wonderful reviews for this hotel & decided to try it. It is  about 1.25 miles, walking to the front gates at Disneyland/California Adventure, walking through Downtown Disney. It took our family about 15-20 minutes each way. The hotel is very clean, bright, & modern. The rooms are spacious & very well laid out. We had 2 queen beds, plus a sofa bed, walk in closet, kitchen nook, & huge bathroom. Our room had an incredible view of the fireworks that we enjoyed each night. The breakfast buffet is clean, well organized, & had a great variety. The breakfast attendants worked hard to keep food stocked & the tables clean. The hours worked great with the park opening hours too. We had plenty of time to eat breakfast & be at the front of rope drop. The beds were comfortable
Manager Response: Hello aliciaw1012, we are so thrilled you had a great time here at our hotel, thank you so much for such a great review in each department here!  Thank you for shining light to our breakfast team , they sure do work extra hard during breakfast.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I read reviews on multiple sites that mentioned this place was top shelf in price, location, breakfast, and customer service. There were many that complimented a certain staff member, Cynthia. I continued to read about her and the hotel and knew we could only stay here. I will tell you that the staff was extremely well trained in customer service. From the front desk to the housekeeping staff to the cooks, all wore a smile on their face. Cynthia was the cream of the crop. She was the very essence of a love for all things Disneyland. She showed it from the very first moment we came in. She made us feel at home. We frequently said, "Let's go home." when talking about Springhill. Cynthia earned the title of Aunty from my kids. It's safe to say that she is willing to go above the
Manager Response: Hello justinsM3054MM,   Wow, this was such a wonderful review to receive, we are thrilled to know our team members gave out great customer service, especially Cynthia!! We are so happy she made you and your family feel more at home with her customer service and love for Disney! Our team and aunty Cynthia look forward to your next stay here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate (home).  Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary: Every staff person went beyond the norm to make sure our stay was as comfortable as possible. They were very pleasant and accommodating. Our room was clean and well appointed. Free breakfast was a plus. We paid in advance for the ART shuttle to Disneyland and had no issues with it - just a short wait, but kept in mind that everyone is trying to get on track with COVID issues. We had a nice stay.
Manager Response: Greetings  barbaracD8673WG,  Thank you for your 5-star review! We appreciate your time and it is good  to know you had a great stay with us. Thank you for acknowledging our team member's, we aim high to give our best customer service to each and everyone of our guest! Hope to see you next time you visit Anaheim.  Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary: Hotel was clean, rooms generous, breakfast hot and ready. But by far Cynthia at the front desk was the best! She immediately greeted us, her knowledge of Disneyland was impressive. We only had a couple days to spend, but she made sure we made the most of it. Fireworks from the hotel parking lot, tips to get tickets, and a birthday surprise for our granddaughter!
Manager Response: Hello  Q2089NVfrankm,  We are so happy you and your family had a wonderful time here at the hotel, we appreciate your feedback and thank you for the 5 stars!! I can sure agree with you that Cynthia is the best!  We hope to see you on your next visit to the parks!\  Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary: First of all, I just wanted to thank Cynthia for making our trip to Disneyland so much more amazing than it already was! My fiancÃ© and I went to Disneyland to celebrate our anniversary and Cynthia was kind enough to give us a â€œhappy anniversaryâ€ button from Disney so we didnâ€™t have to go to the city hall to get a button. :) We weâ€™re also taught how to do the Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance queue the more RELIABLE way (I emphasize reliable because the influencer way has failed us before lol) and we were able to secure our spot! If you look up hospitality in the dictionary, you would see a picture of Cynthia. She is definitely a great asset to Marriott and such a lovely person. If you decide to stay here, please do because she will make your trip so much better with her Disney
Manager Response: Greetings Eipuwu !   We would like to thank you for your 5 star review and we appreciate you staying here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate.  This was a very sweet review about our Front Desk Agent Cynthia! She has one of the best customer service here and she definitely does have some great tricks and tips up her sleeve.  We are glad to know you encounter one of our best agents!  Thank you for staying with us and happy anniversary !! See you soon!  -Nina Solano and the Front Desk Team

Summary: I don't know where to start! Cynthia has been so amazing. My family and I went to Disneyland and Cynthia's customer service is the icing on cake and made our nights. The next time we visit Disney I'll definitely make a reservation with this hotel just because of Cynthia!  Thank you Cynthia!
Manager Response: Greetings J3584SGrichards !   Thank you for your 5 star review, we appreciate your time and feedback !   We are happy to know that our front desk agent Cynthia gave you and your family amazing customer service, she is the best!  We hope to see you the next time you visit Anaheim!  -Nina Solano and the Front Desk team

Summary: My 2 sons and I stayed here in July, We loved the hotel and the room was huge, with 2 comfy Queen size beds, with a room divider where there is a Couch that becomes a bed, a modern bathroom, microwave, mini fridge, coffee pot, walk-in closet, and a good breakfast buffet. We also had a perfect view of the fireworks from our room. The only thing that took me a few minutes to figure out was you use your room key to control the lights and air
