Manager Response: Greetings  mikemO5012CL!   Thank you for your wonderful feedback, we are glad you and your family had a great time here. We hope to  see you soon!  -Nina S. and the Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Great location for a family vacation to Disneyland!
Summary: My family and I went to Disneyland in September 2021. We really enjoyed our stay at SpringHill Suites by Marriott! The room was very well maintained and the breakfast was a great amenity! The hotel is in close proximity to Disneyland and was very manageable to walk to the parks everyday. The best part about our stay was the top notch customer service. Cynthia is the nicest person and she provided the most helpful Disney tips. She was always so positive, happy, caring, and willing to go above and beyond to answer questions. We would not hesitate in a decision to return to this hotel because of the positive experience Cynthia helped provide. Thank you, Cynthia for your Disney pro-tips and for your caring hospitality. We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Hello jeffsmith7,   Thank you for your feedback and your 5 star review!   We appreciate you and your family for staying here back in September and yes you are right, Cynthia does have amazing customer service! She definitely does have some great helpful tips for the parks! We appreciate your feedback and thank you for acknowledging our front desk agent Cynthia!  We truly hope to see you and your family back soon.   -Nina Solano and the front desk team!

Summary Heading: A Family Vacation to Disneyland and California Adventure
Summary: A caring hotel staff!  My wife and I, her twin sister, and her husband, their two adult kids, their girlfriends, and our nephew's girlfriend (from another sister), and her mother arrived at the SpringHill Suites in Anaheim on Monday, June 21, and departed on Wednesday, June 23 of this year.  My wife and I were celebrating our 40th anniversary (our 51st year together). The twin sister and her family were there to have their first vacation with their most likely future daughters-in-law. Our nephew's girlfriend and her mom joined us so they wouldn't miss out on the fun and left our nephew behind to work!  I hope you are still with me!  My wife and I were Disney Annual Passholders for eight years before moving from Anaheim back to our hometown of Lompoc, CA, in 2014. However, it
Manager Response: Greetings FrankL1946 !   Wow! Thank you so much for your amazing review, we appreciate your time and feedback! We are glad you and your family enjoyed your stay at our hotel! It is great to know our front desk agent Cynthia gave you all amazing customer service, she is a rock star here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate ! Thank you for acknowledging her and for giving us a 5 star review!  By the way, Happy belated 51st anniversary!! Congratulations !  Hope to see you soon!   -Nina Solano and the Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Best hotel Experience Iâ€™ve ever had !
Summary: My family and I went to Disneyland the beginning of October 2021 and we decided to stay at this hotel. Little did we know we would have the greatest experience. Mind you we havenâ€™t gone out on a family trip like this in over 2 years due to COVID so going out was sort of nerve wrecking for myself but the hotel was so clean and as soon as we walked in the lobby we felt like we were already in the Disneyland park because it was decorated so freaking cute ! My godson loved it he kept starring at it all and was in wow ! Definitely a nice touch And especially the receptionist CYNTHIA She was so warm welcoming ! She helped me with getting my tickets on the Disneyland app for the park the next day since thatâ€™s the new way, no question I asked was laughed at or made me feel like it was a
Manager Response: Greetings Vcluna626!  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel to stay at while visiting Disneyland, we appreciate your feedback and thank you for your 5 star review!  We are so glad you and your family enjoyed your time here and was able to receive some helpful tips from our front desk agent Cynthia, she is the best ! Thank you for acknowledging her and we thank you for all your kind words in regards to Cynthia and the hotel!  We hope to see you soon!  -Nina Solano and The Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Great location, spacious rooms and amazing staff!
Summary: We are just home from a 4 night stay at SpringHill Suites!  Upon check in we met the wonderful Cynthia!  Her knowledge of the park, tricks of the trade and tips were priceless!  It's really because of her tip that we got a large party (10 of us) on Rise of the Resistance!  She knew exactly where we should park, when to take an Uber etc...she also went the extra mile and added all the personal touches to our stay.  Breakfast was decent each day, always some hot food choices along with yogurt/fruit and waffles I believe.  You can easily walk to the park from this location, which we did in about 15 minutes.  Room was spacious, clean and comfortable!
Manager Response: Hello shannonhK3274PQ!  Thank you for your amazing 5 star review! We are so glad you enjoyed your 4 day vacation here with us! Thank you for your kind words about our front desk agent Cynthia!  She certainly does have some great tips and tricks for the parks!   We hope you think of us for your next visit to Anaheim!  -Nina Solano and the Front Desk Team

Summary Heading: Convenient location, clean rooms and friendly staff
Summary: My go to hotel for Disneyland. Large spacious rooms and very clean. Close walk to Disneyland. Friendly staff especially Cynthia. If you are going to Disneyland she is the one to see. She has a wealth of knowledge of everything Disney. Breakfast is good with many options.
Manager Response: Hello adrianyguzman83! Thank you so much for the 5 star review, we thank you for always keeping us in mind for your go to hotel in Anaheim!   We hope to see you soon!   -Nina Solano and the Front Desk Team !

Summary: This is our new hotel! My brother and family stayed here in August and raved about Cynthia. It's true, she is a delight! We came with another family who switched their hotel just to stay here because her reviews were amazing. Each night when we got back and came for snacks she remembered each of us by name and room number. She even left us a note on our door with a special Mickey key! It was a great trip and we want to thank Cynthia for everything she did. Thank you for helping us book our next trip. We will see you in 2 weeks. Mom can't wait to meet you! Thanks again for the tips for Disneyland. Breakfast was great as well. The walk to Disneyland was not bad. About 25 minutes with kids.
Manager Response: Greetings Sean725203 !   Thank you so for the 5 star review! We truly appreciate your feedback and thank you for acknowledging our front desk agent Cynthia! We are looking forward to your next stay with us !  -Nina Solano and the front desk team

Summary: My husband surprised me with a trip to Disneyland for my birthday and it was magical! From the moment you walk in those doors the evening lady Cynthia is so wonderful. She checked us in and immediately gave us all the information we needed for our trip. She is cheerful and definitely likes her job. One of our favorite things Cynthia did was give us buttons for our celebration. She told us she goes all the time to Disneyland and collects them for her guests. She let us take a couple and then personalize them for our trip. That was special. Thank you Cynthia for making our trip magical.
Manager Response: Greetings bellabella911!! Happy belated birthday! We are so glad you both had a wonderful stay and thank you for leaving us a  great review! Cynthia has such a big heart and we are happy she made your trip extra special, we hope to see you soon and thank you again for the 5 stars!! -Nina Solano and the front desk team.

Summary: My family and I will definitely make this our home hotel when traveling to Disney! Check-in process was easy, Cynthia was very helpful and knowledgeable. Rooms were clean and close to Disney. Overall great stay!
Manager Response: Hello Nicole!  Thank you so much for a wonderful review, we truly appreciate your time and feedback, thank you for the 5 stars, we hope to see you soon!  -Nina Solano and the front desk team

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for about a week. We were greeted by one of the hotel staff members, Randy, as we entered the hotel. Randy is friendly and he knows a lot about the area. Randy worked with us for about an hour planning our whole trip to Disney, the beach and the LA surrounding areas. Randy made our stay at this hotel really enjoyable! The hotel is centrally located and it is about 4 blocks from Disneyland (about 12 minutes walk) park. The rooms are clean and pretty spacious with a good sitting area. We have enjoyed our stay and cannot say enough good things about this hotel. We strongly recommend this hotel and we are looking forward for another stay next year. Sam A.
Manager Response: Greetings Sam A ! We would like to thank you for your amazing feedback  and for giving us  5 stars! Randy sure is very helpful and has great customer service, we are happy he was able to help plan your trip, he is the best!! We appreciate you for acknowledging our team member and hotel as we do our very best to make it one to remember! We hope to see you all soon!   -Nina Solano and the front desk team!

Summary: My family and I stayed here thru Get Away Today and got these cute lanyards. We booked for 6 days and had an amazing time. From the minute you enter the doors you are greeted by a friendly front desk worker named Cynthia. She is friendly and welcoming from the get go. She taught our whole family of 12 all about Disney. She definitely knows her Disney and loves to talk about it. She gave us all the suggestions on rides, virtual queue and foods. She was spot on! She worked with us about an hour planning out our whole trip and it was perfect. We made it on both virtual queue everyday. And PYM'S kitchen was delicious! Thank you Cynthia for everything. You are the best and this will be our home hotel because of you. We look forward to seeing you next time.
Manager Response: Hi Youhvebnmisinformed!  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us!! Thank you for  acknowledging our front desk agent Cynthia, she does a fabulous job at her customer service and she sure does love Disney! It is great to know she helped you all with Disney, she is the best!  Thank you so much for your feedback and we for the 5 star review, we look forward to your next home away from home!  Take care ,  Nina Solano and the front desk team!

Summary: I had never stay at this hotel before, but I will always keep coming back because of Cynthia. We spent two days at Disney and when we came back to the hotel, it was like we never left the park. That's how good she is at customer service! She knew who I was when I checked in and always made it a point to see how we were doing and if there was anything she could do to make out stay more enjoyable. 10/10 would recommend!
Manager Response: Greetings Coleman M,  We are happy you had a great first time here at our hotel! Thank you for the 5 star review!!  Cynthia is the best! Thank you for acknowledging her, she definitely has great customer service!   We hope to see you next time you visit Anaheim! Take care,  Nina Solano and the front desk team.

Summary: If you are headed to Disneyland I would highly recommend this hotel. We have enjoyed our stays over the years and cannot say enough good things about this hotel. The rooms are set up well with a good amount of space with a very nice, sitting area. The soundproofing is great and we have never heard other guests. We walked to the parks every day, the staff is fabulous,  Cynthia gave us all sorts of helpful details about both parks and about getting passes for the two rides that require them. She was a delight! Randy, one of the hotel staff members, went above and beyond for us during the breakfast rush. He assisted with our breakfast requests promptly and treated us like a valued customers. He really made the stay so enjoyable. We were well taken care of!
Manager Response: Greetings 411yogis, Thank you so much for such a pleasant review, both Randy and Cynthia do an amazing job with their customer service , we are happy you and your family enjoyed the time here at our hotel, we hope to see you soon!  Take care,  Nina S. and the front desk team.

Summary: All and all the experience was memorable. Cynthia at  the front desk was an absolute delight. Her happy go lucky attitude and her love of all things disney made our anniversary one for the books. The free breakfast was delicious and the room was up to marriott standards. We will definitely stay here again. Thank you again for everything Cynthia. You were simply amazing!
Manager Response: Hello 692alondrac,  Happy honeymoon!! We are so glad you both had a great time here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. Cynthia is truly an amazing person, she definitely does love all things Disney! Thank you for acknowledging one of our best front desk agents and for a great review,  we appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again!  -Nina S. and the front desk team

Summary: Cynthia & April were absolutely AMAZING! They made our stay a dream for our honey moon and made our whole experience perfect! We definitely plan on returning with our whole family! Thank you to you both! ðŸ’•ðŸ’•
Manager Response: Greetings CierraV629, Congratulations !!! We are so happy you had a great experience here with us and thank you for acknowledging our front desk agents Cynthia and April! We truly appreciate your time and leaving us a 5 star review! Hope to see you both soon, Thank you,  Nina S. and the front desk team!

Summary Heading: Cynthia will make your trip better!
Summary: I have never had better customer service than what my family received from Cynthia during our recent Springhill Suites stay for our Disney trip.  She genuinely wants her guests to have their best trip and she does everything she can to help!  What really impressed me though was her heartfelt interest in our experience at the end of each day - she truly wanted to know how our day was and hear about our highlights.  She is an amazingly kind lady who will help you have a better Disney trip! We also enjoyed the hotel in general.  Our room was spacious, and clean (it even smelled of bleach, which I found reassuring during the pandemic!).  The hotel layout and lobby were pleasant to return to. The location is walkable and I'd actually recommend walking rather than having the ART
Manager Response: Hello O1600DXmeganm,   We would like to thank you for acknowledging one of our best front desk agents Cynthia, she truly is a sweet and wonderful person. We are happy you and your family had a chance to meet her and  glad you enjoyed your stay here with us!  Our housekeepers sure do a fabulous job at cleaning rooms, thank you for the 5 stars and we hope to see you soon!   -Nina S. and the front desk team.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Springhill Suites
Summary: I almost changed this hotel to a â€œcloser to the gateâ€ hotel but am glad I stayed here. Itâ€™s about a 10-15 minute walk down a nice little street and it wasnâ€™t hard at all. As it turned out, I had friends that stayed closer to the park and they all had a long walk to the park anyway.  Our hotel was clean, staff friendly. The breakfast buffet was a huge plus and it was replenished frequently. Itâ€™s just so nice to go downstairs with my child and get them eating right away. Also, there was a gas station/food mart on the corner which was great to stop at on the way to the park for water, sodas, snacks.
Manager Response: Greetings HappiTravelerchicago,  We are glad to hear you chose to stay here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate! I personally enjoy that little walk to Downtown Disney, it's such a nice walk. We hope you and your family will have a future stay with us next time you visit Anaheim! Thank you for a great review and the 5 stars!  Take care,  -Nina S. and the front desk team

Summary: My 3 girls and I stayed at the Marriott Maingate in Anaheim CA. From the moment we walked in Cynthia was wonderful to us. She made us feel right at home and was a pro at Disneyland tips. She always made sure we went to safe areas when exploring the LA areas. Once I mentioned I was also going to visit San Francisco, she was kind enough to give me advise on what places to visit. Even though we had just met, I felt that I knew her for a long time. The hotel was very clean and spacious and will definately stay there again when visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello Semachado, Thank you for acknowledging our front desk agent Cynthia! We a happy to hear she made you and your family feel comfortable and welcomed, she is amazing!!!  We hope you have a great time in San Francisco and hope to see you guys next time you visit Anaheim =) We appreciate you for the 5 stars and a great review, thank you!  Safe travels, -Nina Solano and the front desk team

Summary: I took my family to Disneyland for their first time and needed to book a hotel that was relatively close. The front desk agent, Cynthia, really made our stay an absolute blast!  Upon checking in, we were greeted by Cynthia's professionalism and enthusiasm (you could tell she loves Disneyland & helping people plan their first Disneyland trip). She was giving me all of these pointers on how to secure a spot for the Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance experience, in addition to various transportation and parking tips for Disneyland.  She always greeted me with a smile every time I walked by - but what surprised me the most was when I came down to the lobby one evening to ask Cynthia for some plastic utensils, she remembered my name and even double-checked to see if I was still
Manager Response: Hi JTran99  We would like to thank you for taking the time to give us a 5 star review and for highlighting our amazing front desk agent Cynthia!  Her knowledge of both parks is simply amazing, she definitely does have the best tips and tricks for Disney! But most of all we are glad she made you and your family feel welcomed and comfortable ! We truly appreciate your review and hope to see you soon!   Take care,   Nina S. and the front desk team.

Summary: This hotel is a great choice for visiting disney if you donâ€™t mind a little walk or taking a uber. The hotel was very clean, the excellent staff  was very helpful and attentive. They offer a very good hot breakfast with a lot of choices.  Definitely one of the best!
Manager Response: Hello fxkj,   Thank you for taking the time to send us some great feedback as well as a 5 star review, we truly appreciate you for choosing Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate ! We hope to see you soon!  Nina S. and the front desk team

Summary Heading: Excellent Family Option close to Disney
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 days so we can visit the local attractions.   Randy, one of hotel staff members, continuously went above and beyond for us. He knew us by name and greeted every time, assisted with our requests promptly, and treated us like a valued customer. He really made the stay so enjoyable. We were well taken care of!   The hotel is close to Disney, is right on the Disney bus line, and also has a heated pool and spa that we used frequently. Early breakfast was helpful with our two kids.
Manager Response: Hello  Abcdpreston,  Thank you for the 5 star review and for acknowledging one of our amazing front desk agent Randy! It is great to know Randy went above and beyond to make your stay welcomed and enjoyable, he sure does have great customer service here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. We appreciate you choosing us to visit Anaheim and we look forward to your future stay!   Take care,   Nina S. and the front desk team!

Summary Heading: Fabulous Hotel in a Great Location
Summary: I cannot say enough good things about this hotel.  If you are headed to Disneyland or California Adventure, I would highly recommend this hotel.  We walked to the parks everyday, the staff (particularly Cynthia) is fabulous, and we had an amazing view of the fireworks each night. Cynthia gave us all sorts of helpful details about both parks and about getting passes for the two rides that require them. She was incredible.  The rooms are set up well with a good amount of space and a very nice, large closet. The soundproofing is great - we never heard other guests.  The location of this hotel means that if you walk to the park you come through the Downtown Disney side which opens at 7 a.m. while the opposite end opens between 7:15 a.m. and 7:20 a.m. so if you are early birds you
Manager Response: Hi ThoughtsFromAPage!  Wow thank you so much for this 5 star review!!! Thank you for also acknowledging our amazing front desk agent Cynthia !!! she is a Rockstar here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate especially with her Disney knowledge, she is the best! Our rooms are quite spacious indeed! We hope to see you soon and glad you and your family had a great time here at our hotel!!   We appreciate your review =) thank you!  -Nina S. and the front desk team

Summary: Cynthia is the best! She is an expert of Disneyland updates, changes, and new information. It was already a lot to read on the Disneyland website but having someone go over the information with us just made everything go more smoothly. I am not quick with the app and understanding of the virtual queue system, so having Cynthia answer my questions and sharing her tips really made the whole experience more enjoyable and less stressful. Customer service all around was pleasant, the room was clean, and the walk over to Disneyland wasn't as bad as I thought. I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Hi Lulu4726 !   We would like to thank you for your 5 star review!! I can 100% agree with you about our fantastic front desk agent Cynthia! She knows her Disney pretty well , she is the best!  We all do our very best as a team to give out great customer service in each department, thank you for noticing our #1 priority!   We hope to see you soon  Nina S. and the front desk team!

Summary: We stayed here in July and the hotel was wonderful! My 4 kids and wife and I had a great time at Disneyland. We were able to get our tickets to the rides because of the help of Cynthia. Thank you Cynthia for taking the time to explain to us how it works and answering our many questions. Although a line began to form she never rushed us through the process and even continued to answer our questions throughout the night. Trust me we had a lot but because of her expertise our trip was perfect! The hotel was very clean as well which was very important to my wife and I as our kids suffer from severe allergies. Thank you to the housekeeping for picking up our room each day! I know it wasn't easy with 4 kids but they always left it looking wonderful!
Manager Response: Hello Adrianann2008!  Thank you for a wonderful review, we appreciate your time and feedback.  Cynthia sure does have amazing tips and tricks when it comes to Disney! We are so happy you and your family were able to get on the rides! Our staff dose a great job at keeping our hotel clean and spotless! We hope you stay with us next time you visit Anaheim!  Take care, Nina S. and the front desk team

Summary: Randy at the front desk provided exceptional service for my customers directing them  where to go and what to paperwork to complete prior to our meeting.  Top notch customer service.  He went above and beyond to ensure out time there was a success.
Manager Response: Hey there patrickkM5320HK !   Thank you for taking the time and acknowledging our front desk agent Randy! He really does have amazing  customer service and we appreciate him for being great! Thank you so much for your 5 star review! This feedback will definitely help him shine here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate!  We hope to see you soon!  Nina and the front desk team.

Summary: This hotel is amazing and not to far from Disneyland. It is about 1 mile to the parks so not to bad for walking distance although our kids were exhausted by the end of the day. Keep that in mind for the walk back but no complaints on our end. The service is amazing from the minute you walk in from Cynthia. If you are here for Disneyland Cynthia is your go to. She gives you every tip you need to get around the parks. She is very pleasant and welcoming and loves to talk about Disney which is good because that is why we were there. She has a plethora of knowledge for Galaxy's Edge and it is spot on. We made it on both Rise of the resistance and webslingers. Thank you Cynthia for all your help. Breakfast was ok. Staff had a hard time keeping up with with the amounts of people coming
Manager Response: Hello  Tourist08130744735! Thank you for your amazing review! We are glad to hear our front desk agent Cynthia gave you and your family her fantastic customer service, she has some great tips and tricks when it comes to Disney!!  I see you were able to get on Rise of the Resistance and Web Slinger two thumbs up on that one as we know it is hard to get on the list!  We will definitely work with our breakfast staff on keeping up with the crowd. Again, thank you for your great feedback! we appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. We hope to see you soon!  -Nina and the front desk team.

Summary: We had an excellent experience at this hotel. Cynthia check us in and just made our stay magical from the minute we walked in. We were heading to Disneyland to celebrate my sons birthday. She gave us tips on how to secure a spot in the virtual queue for Rise of the Resistance, THE main reason for our trip. She also spoiled my son rotten our whole stay with treats. The hotel itself was comfortable, clean, and the breakfast was really delicious. But itâ€™s the staff for me!
Manager Response: Hello  207cherh !   Wow, thank you for your 5 star review!!! Thank you for acknowledging our amazing front desk agent Cynthia! We are so happy to hear your son and family had a great time and made it on to the Rise of the resistance! we know that was a lot of pressure to get on the list and happy Cynthia was able to give you her helpful tips and tricks =) We appreciate you for taking the time and giving us a awesome review!   We hope to see you soon!   -Nina and the front desk team

Summary: Stayed at Springhill Suites Marriott Anaheim Maingate for 2 nights for our sonâ€™s 16th birthday. This was our first time staying around this area. We usually stay at the high end hotels in Katella and S. Harbor side. We love this area as its secluded from the crowd and traffic. They have a great spot where you can view the Disney fireworks at night. The room is super clean and bedding is so comfy. They serve full breakfast and had a variety of choices.  Valerie kept the area clean and had enough food for everyone. Customer service was excellent. Nina and Cynthia went above and beyond to ensure that we got on to the ART bus on our first day here and they even surprised our son with a small birthday gift and put up a birthday sign up in our room. Canâ€™t thank you enough on how you
Manager Response: Hi mjilaga1122 !   We are so glad your son had a blast and his wishes came true, his happiness was very important to our team and we are excited you all had a great time here!  I sincerely apologize in regards to our housekeeping opening your door as there was not a reason to go in there, we will work on communicating with our team  members and making sure they are all aware of the DND sign. But we appreciate your feedback and it was a pleasure meeting you and your family! We hope to see you guys soon!   Take care mjilaga1122 =)  -Nina S. and the front desk team

Summary: Overall, a great place to stay if visiting the parks. We walked to the parks daily and it only took about 15-20 minutes. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. We did have one problem with our room during our visit, but it was handled very quickly. Covid protocols are lacking in the breakfast area. The breakfast was good, but served buffet style with no cleaning or changing of the utensils that we saw. Also, tables were not wiped down during our visits to the breakfast area, so finding a clean table was difficult. The room was very spacious, but did show some wear and tear (ripped and stained carpet by the fridge area). Beds and pillows were very comfortable. They currently do not do daily room cleaning unless you ask for it, but weâ€™re very accommodating when we did.
Manager Response: Good afternoon cmoore87,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review, we do appreciate any feed back.  We do apologize our breakfast protocol was not in control during your stay and we will definitely go over our training with the breakfast team as well as getting tables cleaned a bit faster. We hope to see you soon cmoore87 !   Nina S.  and the front desk team.

Summary Heading: Drunk Couple had Access to My Room
Summary: In June, my family of four stayed on this property for two nights. At 1 a.m., a drunk couple had access to my room. When I called downstairs, the employee said he did not give them the card key and asked me to come down to change my keys. I was startled so my husband went down to talk to him and security. He witnessed the employee get bought off by two men to use to the pool until 3 a.m. My family didn't get much sleep as we were startled as well as those two men spoke loudly at the pool. My husband spoke to the manager in the morning. They took off the second night from our bill. When I wrote to upper management, several calls and emails were made to me. They offered a two night stay in the future. This company fails to take action on their mistake. Safety is the utmost
Manager Response: none

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay here because of the front desk ladies Gladys and Cynthia. My wife and two young daughters felt very welcomed. We will come back when we go to Disneyland again which was a quick, clean, and safe walk to the park.
Manager Response: Greetings Ccgrove13! Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great review. We are so happy that our team was able to deliver that Disney magic for you and your family!! They couldn't wait to tell her about the day and share everything they did. Each time we came to see her she always sat with us and talked to us about our day and helped us prepare for the next day. Pool was over chlorinated and water was not clear.  Downside of our stay â€œ wasnâ€™t anything majorâ€  The housekeeping staff gossiped way too much in the hallways in Spanish. We understood everything that was said and I donâ€™t think it was kind of them to talk like that. There was a guy pushing a blue cart down the hallway in a rush and did not let us walk by ( you would think he would stand by the wall and let us walk by). Summary Heading: Clean, Affordable and full of Disney Magic
Summary: We booked a trip to Disneyland with two other families and we booked our stay here at the SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate. This was my first time staying at this hotel so I was worried about what the experience would be.   It started off with me calling in the night before our check-in. I had general questions about our stay as well as a couple Disney-related questions that I wasn't expecting to have answers to. Well, i'm so lucky that I was able to speak with Cynthia. Not only did she answer all my questions regarding our stay at the hotel, but she also was able to answer all my Disney questions. Including one that was specifically about the Disney App. She didn't have the answer on the phone, but when I checked-in, we got to chatting and she asked if I called in
Manager Response: none

Summary: After driving for about 7hrs from the bay area, we finally got to our hotel. I was greeted by Joseph M, working the front desk, super nice guy. He went out of his way to explain everything to us; he explained how to get to the park or use the bus and the apps to download to help us.   The location is perfect for walking to Disney. The room was greatâ€”overall excellent stay. Bed was perfect, room was very clean.   Not sure if Marriott reads these or not. But I wanted to take the time and write a review for Joseph. He went above and beyond to help my girlfriend and I. You can tell he loves helping out people and enjoys his job. I just wanted to say thank you, Joseph.  I canâ€™t wait to come back to the hotel in December for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff and a short walk to Disneyland
Summary: Weâ€™re here with our three little ones on a trip to Disneyland and this hotel is very clean, modern and about a mile walk to the park. I was very impressed with the hotel staff, especially Leilani who was so kind and super helpful. She was very professional making sure we knew our way around and helped us gain access to the pool when we were having trouble with our key cards. Such a sweet and helpful person and we were happy with our stay here!
Manager Response: Hello lauriejh!,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review of our hotel!  Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort is definitely a plus when staying with us.  We are super happy to hear that our team members made an impact on your stay.  And thank you for recognizing our FD Supervisor Leilani, she is definitely an asset to our team.  Thank  you for staying at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate and we hope to see you again in the future!  -Joe and The Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team

Summary: Stayed 1 night in the 2 queen suite, very clean and comfortable, easy to access, close to the theme parks/Downtown Disney. Complimentary breakfast was great!  Cynthia and Gladys were wonderful, pleasant and very professional!
Manager Response: Hello 150ashlynd!,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our hotel!  We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort is definitely a plus when staying here.  Also thank you for the kind words for Cynthia and Gladys!  We love hearing feedback from our guests especially when its to compliment one (or two) of our team members.  We hope to see you again here at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate!  Take care.  -Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team!

Summary: At around 3 am I had no where nearby to go stay and I was lucky enough to find this hotel for a great price. And as I went in I knew I was either way too late or early to check in. Thanks to the clerk, Leilani at the front desk; I was able to get a perfect room to meet my accommodations and budget. Thank you to her and the hotel for helping me the way they did. It was a great stay, very clean, hospitable and the employees will go above and beyond.
Manager Response: Hello MG00714,  We are delighted to hear that we were able to accommodate you last minute.  Leilani is definitely an asset to our team and we thank you for the kind words!  We hope you stay with us again here at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate.  Take care and stay safe.  -Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team!

Summary: stayed for 1 night in a 2 queen room for quick overnight trip for Touch of Disney event & this hotel met our needs. i loved that the hotel still offered comp bfast (to-go) which included fruit, yogurt, pastries/bfast sandwich, juice, coffee/tea!! To be honest, i actually prefer the to-go style, they bagged everything you ask for & I went back to the room to enjoy it on my own leisurely time before checkout. Hope they continue w/the to-go bfast option because pre-covid, the bfast 'buffet' was a madhouse & that was annoying. self parking was a decent price ($15/night) & this location was easy to get to.  Just a note-this location is a 30 min walk (1.5 mi) to the Disney Esplande (where the theme park gates are located) vs. Springhill suites on Harbor (1.2 mi)--so that extra 10 min
Manager Response: Hello Yolandl200!,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our hotel!  We are definitely talking about exploring more options for breakfast for all of our guests.  We appreciate all feedback to make sure all of our guests needs are made.  Thanks for the kind words about our team members as well.  Customer Service is always our top priority here.  We appreciate you staying at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate and we hope to see  you again!  Take care.  -Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team!

Summary: This hotel was amazing. I have never stayed in a hotel anywhere that was so clean and open. It was professionally put together and thought out. I have stayed in lower cost hotels in the area and I will never do it again! The hotel staff was so inviting and accommodating! We got a great hot breakfast and even though the hotel was booked we still felt like we were the only ones in the hotel! It was unbelievably clean and the beds were comfy. All of the necessary product was well stocked and we never felt uncomfortable! I 100% recommend this hotel and I will not stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Hello SusanR!,  Thank you for the fantastic review of our property!  Travelling during the pandemic is definitely different right now but we appreciate you choosing the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  We are doing our best to make sure our Guests and our Staff are being safe as possible during these times so we are happy to hear that you felt safe and comfortable.  We hope to have our buffet style breakfast back in the future as we are sure you will enjoy that as well.  Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Joseph and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team

Summary: The stay was great and the staff was nice. The room was just like any other Springhill Suites room. It was all great until I took a shower and opened my towel that had dried up blood stains on it.   For the most part the stay was great, and I'm not one to say that I will never stay at a location again unless I gave them a second try, but dried blood on a towel, I don't know man.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about your recent stay in Anaheim.  Our hotel prides itself on great service and cleanliness and I am very sorry we fell short on one of those during your stay.  It is unacceptable to find that on a towel in your room.  I have already had a meeting with our Housekeeping team to discuss the importance of clean towels and we have put in additional procedures to ensure we are doing a better job checking not only our towels but our rooms in general.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention

Summary Heading: This hotel is handling COVID amazingly!!!!!
Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel, my first stay was Pre-COVID, my most recent stay was last weekend. I stay at a lot of different hotels and this hotel is hands down handling the COVID situation better than any other hotel I've stayed at. Not to mention, I actually enjoyed my stay more this time than I did when I stayed here Pre-COVID. The Front Desk staff was incredibly accommodating and nice. Joseph at check in was amazing!!! So friendly, you can tell he really loves his job. The gentleman that checked me out (idk his name) was also very accommodating and nice. The grab and go breakfast that they have is surprisingly good with multiple options. My room was very clean and spacious! I would absolutely stay here again in the future!!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your kind words about your recent stay in Anaheim.  The team works diligently to ensure our guests are safe while still giving the same level of service you would expect of a Marriott hotel.  We are happy to hear our hard work is paying off.  I will be sure to inform Joseph that he is amazing, he will be so happy to hear it.  We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best front desk staff and strict Covid adherence
Summary: My son and I and his father came out from Palm Springs to escape 115-120Â° weather with high humidity. We have worked through the pandemic and it's been an extremely tough time and we needed a break.The front desk staff was amazing! They were always extremely friendly and the hotel was very clean relating to Covid issues. We felt very safe. We will definitely be going back and often.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so happy that you choose our hotel to "Beat the Heat".  Thank you for working through the pandemic!  I know that is not an easy task and we are glad we could be a part of the break you needed.

Summary: Stood here with my family and we had a great time. Room was nice and clean, even though the hot breakfast was unavailable during covid their breakfast to go bags were good my children loved them and had so much fun in the pool. Front desk Nina, Nyshon and gladys were so nice and friendly, they even brought up a luggage cart to my room for check out so i wouldn't have to leave my kids alone in the room! Rooms were nice and big my daughter didn't want to leave! Managers Erik and Charlie were so kind to us too!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are so happy to hear that you and your kids had such a great time at our hotel.  Come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: Hotel was nice and clean! All front desk staff were friendly especially Nina had the best customer service! Pool was open and breakfast togo was a good selection! Every time we went downstairs they were always disinfecting and cleaning! Would stay again!
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying at the Springhill Suites Anaheim-Maingate.  I am happy to hear that Nina's service was "the best".  She is a great team member and we are lucky to have her.  We work hard on keeping the hotel clean and we are happy you noticed.  We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: We absolutely loved this hotel and plan to stay there again next year. From the warmth of the staff who greeted us, to the spotlessly clean, large and well-appointed rooms, this hotel surpassed our expectations. The breakfast that is included was excellent, with plenty of variety for everyone. The pool and hot tub were lovely, and the lobby was bright and clean.  The front desk staff answered all of our questions and greeted us warmly every day during our seven-night stay. The ART bus stop was right outside the front doors and we were able to purchase our bus tickets at the front desk. We also were close enough to walk to and from the parks, although at the end of a long park day, the bus was usually the preferred option!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear we surpassed your expectations.  The team here is great and puts in a lot of hard work.  We are happy to hear you plan on coming back next year.

Summary: Excellent service from check in to check out. Room was clean and fresh and made up nicely when we returned from the park. One of the two elevators was out of service but the wait was never very long. Breakfast was very nice and food was always fresh and well prepared. Convenient location to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We want to give a shout out for the fantastic way we were treated for our stay. We were celebrating several occasions and we were welcomed the first day with Happy Birthday banners and gift bags for the 5 year old birthday girl and anniversary couple. Elisa went the extra mile by leaving a Build a Bear with a heart for my husbands 5th Anniversary of his heart bypass surgery. Nina and Luis were always friendly and willing to answer all our questions. We were there when Disneyland closed for the Coronavirus and the entire staff looked after the needs of the guests. All of us that stayed highly recommend Maingate Marriott and will stay every time we go now! Thank you for making us feel important to you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently stayed over the weekend and had a fantastic stay. Joe at the front desk was behind helpful.more hotels need employees like him. We will definitely stay there again. We would definitely recommend staying here to friends.
Manager Response: Hello Pugs8869!   Thank you for the 5 star rating and review of our hotel!  I appreciate your kind words as we all do our best to make sure our guests needs are taken care of.  We appreciate your recommendation to others and can't wait to host you again here at the SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  Sincerely,  Joe and the SpringHill Suites Team!

Summary: SpeechlessðŸ¥° my husband and I decided to just get out of the house for the night! This hotel was amazing from start to finish! The staff is very friendly and welcoming!! The hotel is fresh, modern and very well kept!!! I enjoyed everything about this property. The room was so modern, we watched the fireworks from Disneyland right outside our window. The bed was SUPER comfortable! The pool area is quaint and the jacuzzi was relaxing! I enjoyed the sitting area in front of the hotel with the fire pit. We will definitely be back!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Guide29566!  Thank you for the 5 star rating and awesome review of our hotel!  It looks like to you got to take advantage of all the amenities the hotel has to offer!  The view of the fireworks is just as enjoyable from watching in the park except a lot less crowded.  Thank you for the kind words for our team members.  We strive to make a difference to make sure all of our guests have the best experience.  We can't wait to host you again here at the SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  Sincerely,  Joe and The SpringHill Suites Team!

Summary: The staff was great and very helpful our room was good in size for sleeping and heading back to Disneyland. Great location good choices for restaurants near by, and on site. Would definitely stay here again !!!!
Manager Response: Hello Grace!  Thank you for the 5 star rating and amazing review of our hotel!  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious rooms.  We can't wait to host you again here at the Springhill Suites!  Sincerely,  Joe and The Springhill Suites Anaheim Team!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel when we visited Disneyland. Everyone was great but especially Nina at the front desk. Would recommend this hotel and would stay again. The pool and hot tub were also very clean.
Manager Response: Hello Alastair!  Thank you so much for the great review of our hotel!  We appreciate your kind words on our pool and spa area.  But most of all thank you so much for recognizing Nina our front desk agent!  She is definitely an asset to our property and will be rewarded for her great service!  Thank you for choosing SpringHill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and we cannot wait to host you again!  Sincerely,  Joe and the SpringHill Suites Anaheim Team!

Summary Heading: amazing staff and location. But no hot water
Summary: This hotel is at a great location, short Uber ride to Disney.  Staff were very helpful with almost all the issues. Big or small.  The one thing they could not help with was the lack of hot water.   Temp was at best Luke warm to down right cold some mornings.   Talked to the desk daily.  They sent a personnel up and he deemed it warm enough.   Not according to my standards.  You could bath a very small child without issue in the warmest of waters.
Manager Response: Hello kimdS6488GZ!  Thank you for staying with us we do appreciate your business.  Our location is certainly ideal when traveling to the Disneyland Resort area!  We sincerely apologize for the issues with your room when it came to the water temperature.  I will make sure my maintenance crew looks into it immediately.  We are delighted to hear that our staff was able to take care of most of your needs!  Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you back in the future so we can provide that 5 star level service next time.  Sincerely,  Joe and The Springhill Team

Summary Heading: Clean nice hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We chose not to stay at Disney properties for this visit to Disneyland. This hotel was clean with friendly service throughout our stay, and very close to the parks.  We took a 5-10 minute Uber each morning to the park. We werenâ€™t in the hotel much since we spent all day & evening in the parks, but when there our experience was positive.  Hotel stored our luggage for us on our last day while we were at Disney. Overall, reasonably priced, clean, good service and close to Disneyland. Weâ€™d stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello JuliesS7418MM!,  Thank you so much for the great rating and review of our hotel!  Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort is a plus and a fraction of the cost compared to their properties!  We are glad to hear that our team members provided the service we expect from them.  We appreciate you staying with us and can't wait to host you again at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  Sincerely,  Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Team!

Summary: It was my first time going to Disneyland so I decided to stay here. I really enjoyed staying here. Breakfast was limited but it sure did the trick. Being right next to a bus station helped as I used the ART a lot. Room was great. Parking fee a day (even though I had a car for one night) was a problem but no issue. Will return later in the year to use my final day park hopper.
Manager Response: Hello Edward W,  Thank you for the 5 star review of our hotel!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast during your stay.  You'll be happy to know that most hotels charge over $20 a night for parking so we are the lowest in the area but we understand.  We are excited to hear that you'll be back and we hope you choose the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate again!  Sincerely,  Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Team!

Summary Heading: Family going to Disneyland?  Stay here.
Summary: We loved this place.  Spacious rooms with comfy pillows and bed.  Awesome, large, free breakfast buffet.  Nice pool, jacuzzi, and fitness center.  Really great location, we just walked to the park.  Nina, Luis, Nyshort and Logan at the front desk were so kind and helpful.  Can't rate it high enough.
Manager Response: Hello 50stev!,  Thank you for the amazing review and rating of our hotel!  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our clean spacious rooms as well as our other great amenities!  Also thank you for the kind words of our front desk team members, they will be definitely be rewarded for the amazing service they provided.  We hope you choose the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate whenever your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Joe and the Springhill Suites Team!

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay for a family of 6
Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at the SpringHill Suites. This place has a great price point, value and comfort!! We found our room extremely clean and comfortable. Queen/Queen beds and a sofa couch were the perfect fit for our four kids. The bathroom was spacious and modern. The added bonus was the in room fridge which helped us keep things cold to take into Disneyland the next day. I especially loved the proximity to the gas station at the corner for mornings when we walked to the park, we grabbed drinks and treats on our way. The walk isnt short but 20 min is do able (walking through downtown Disney is a highlight for us). There is a ART shuttle out front which is convenient, if you prefer not walking. The pool was heated and the hot tub was clean and marvelous at the end of a
Manager Response: Hello Eden B!,  Thank you so much for the detailed review of our hotel!  We are so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and glad you got to enjoy our clean spacious rooms!  Thank you for the kind words for our team members and we are happy they made an impact on your stay.  We can't wait to have you back here at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!    Sincerely,  Joe and The Springhill Suites Team!

Summary: Pleasant surroundings for our three generation family!  There was a "blowup Minnie" in the lobby that my, Minnie obsessed 22 month old granddaughter hugged every time we came or went.  When they took "Minnie" down on Jan. 1st, my granddaughter was bewildered...the friendly, front staff and manager felt so badly that they put her up for another day, a very kind, but unexpected gesture for even their littlest customer!  Thank you!  The breakfast was delicious and the team were attentive, kept all foods fresh and tasty in an attractive setting.  Housekeeping quietly and efficiently kept the rooms attended.  The location is close to Disneyland Park (by car).  They do not have an airport shuttle, but the Uber car was quickly available.
Manager Response: Hello GrandmaBabs!,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your 11 nights with us just as much as we enjoyed hosting you!  The look on your granddaughters face when Minnie left broke our hearts so I am super happy Minnie made another appearance.  I hope the stuffed Minnie we gave her reminds her of the stay here as well.  Please come back to us soon here at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  Sincerely,  Joe and the Springhill Suites Team!

Summary: What a fabulous find when I booked this Marriott for our Disneyland trip. I chose this  location because it was away from the freeway, yet still within walking distance to Disneyland. However, to our surprise the RideART shuttle picks you up right in front of the hotel if you are not in the mood to walk or have little kids. This hotel also has ample parking, a great continental breakfast, a nice pool/spa, and great rooms. Our queen/queen room came with a  fold-out couch bed as well as a huge bathroom and walk-in closet. The beds & pillows were very comfortable. The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars was because of the bathroom lighting, it is very dim. If you are a woman you will need to bring extra lighting to put on makeup and for a man the same to shave. The decorative light
Manager Response: Hello dandksmommy!,  Thank you for the amazing review of our hotel!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you also got to enjoy our wonderful amenities like our breakfast and pool area!  We are currently in the process of scheduling upgrades for the hotel and we will definitely take the bathroom lighting into great consideration.  I love hearing that our staff did an amazing job during your stay.  It truly is the best compliment we can receive!  Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  Sincerely,  Joe and the Springhill Suites Team!

Summary: I've stayed at 4 or 5 different Disney-adjacent hotels and this one is my favorite.  Clean and comfortable.  They only charge $15 for parking, AND they'll let you keep your car in the lot the entire day of checkout (we checked out on a Monday morning and kept our car in the lot until 11pm that night).  A ~$6 Uber ride to the Disneyland main gates, plus a pretty decent free breakfast.  I'll be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Walker!  Thank you so much for the great review of our property!  Our location to the Disneyland Resort is definitely a great perk here.  We are happy to hear that we will be your go to hotel when staying in the Anaheim area and thank you again for staying at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!  Sincerely,  Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team!

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff; great location to Disney
Summary: Joe and the team here were amazing! Minutes from All things Disney. Clean and beautiful updated rooms with a great office and couch area. Great pool to enjoy with the family on a sunny California day. Nothing more you could ask for.
Manager Response: Hello Aubrey!,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review of our hotel!  I appreciate your kind words about my team and I.  Hopefully you've finally made it to Tampa after all those long delays.  Whenever you make it back to the Anaheim area we hope we are your go to spot to stay at.  And remember John Wayne Airport ;).  Take care and have a great holiday season.  Sincerely, Joe and the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate Team.

Summary: Beautiful hotel! Super friendly atmosphere. PRISTINE room! We checked in two days ago. Walked in and within 5 min was in our room.  This hotel is not fancy. Its bright and fun. Just what you expect for a place next to disney. The room has everything we need for two kids age 6 and 8 and two adults.  I am super impressed with the noise suppression. I can tell there is a kid upstairs but hardly. Most of the time I think its my kids.  The free breakfast is yummy. Something for everyone. Cereal, bacon, sausage, eggs, waffles, pastry, Iâ€™m probably missing something.  At 930 we can see the fireworks from our hotel room. Was going yo ask for this at the desk but we didnâ€™t have to.   We are here for 5 more days. Will update again after. But so far totally recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Stickynikki!,  Thank you for the amazing review of our hotel!  We sincerely hope the rest of the stay went just as well if not better.  The firework view room is pretty awesome so we are happy that we were able to accomodate that for you.  We hope when you are back in the Anaheim area that you choose the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate again!  Take care.  Joe and the Springhill Suites Team!

Summary Heading: Short walk to Disney for a lot less
Summary: The clan was in Anaheim for  Disney wedding. Even the discounted rooms at Disney were $400 and more. Add breakfast and it became even more outrageous. Several family groups all ended up here after I told them of the rate of about $160/night,with a very nice breakfast. They had been looking at various other options. An safe, easy 15 minute walk to Disney or a $6 Uber ride. Nice property.Very clean and the staff were attentive and smiling.  I booked on the Marriot site for the best rate.
Manager Response: Hello EdS8491!,   Thank you for the wonderful review of our hotel!  The Resort Hotels can be a bit pricey but we are very excited to hear that we were able to accommodate the party at a reasonable price and still be a short walk away!  We appreciate your business and hope to see you back at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!

Summary: Great location for visiting Disneyland.  Clean, updated, excellent housekeeping, breakfast was lovely every morning and really offset our food costs.  Staff were friendly.  Quiet, even with tons of families visiting.  Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello hopper188!,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel!  We are so happy to hear that you got to enjoy our wonderful breakfast.  Our team members here definitely like to make an impression on our guests and make their stay enjoyable.  Thank you again for choosing the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel - I will tell you all about it
Summary: Room 403 - Top floor Queen suite. HUGE room. Full size fridge, micro, sink and two burner stove. Only one bathroom, BUT it worked out just fine. There are TWO couches that pull out into beds, one in the main living room with a TV and one in the double queen room. Ample enough space for a larger family or just to have room. I hear there are only three onsite so if you want a room this size you have to plan. The other rooms are also very large and roomy (I peaked into one as I walked by). Nice breakfast in the morning, anyone who complains about this FREE meal is a jerk. Waffle stand, oatmeal, various milks (including almond), juices, eggs - a ton to choose from. We took uber home from the park and it cost at the highest 7.00 for a family of four. The cheapest was a Lyft at 4.00.
Manager Response: Hello Finkydinky!    Wow is all we can say.  Thank you so much for the amazing review of our hotel!  We are extremely happy that you enjoyed every aspect of our hotel.  The one bedroom suite is a hot commodity like you said due to the fact there are only 3 of them as you know.  Our housekeepers are a huge part of what keeps this hotel running smoothly.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and we hope to see you again at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!

Summary Heading: We were a family of 4 adults and 2 children
Summary: from the front desk to the housekeepers were so helpful and friendly, the room was wonderful 2 queens and a  hide a bed, large handicap bathroom. It was too far for us to walk and push wheelchair but we had an amazing Yellow cab driver and he gave us his number so we used him the whole week (MR Shah) we were there for 6 nights and it was amazing great pool for the kids and adults
Manager Response: Hello Scapmom73!,  Thank you for the awesome review of our property!  We are so happy to hear that our entire staff made an impression on your stay.  Our pool area is definitely a great place to relax in as well!  Thank you for choosing the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and we look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: We stayed here during our trip to Disneyland.  I had a broken leg and they worked hard to find a handicapped accessible room so that I could shower and get around easily.  Rooms were spacious and very clean.  Staff were friendly and extremely helpful.  Will stay again.
Manager Response: Hello KathleenT288!,  Thank you for the awesome review of our property!  We are delighted to hear that our team members were able to accomodate you in the best way possible.  Thank you for choosing the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and hope to see you back when that leg is fully healed!  Take care!

Summary: This property is your basic SpringHill Suites. The rooms are clean and spacious and provide the basic amenities that you'll need for a short stay. The property is well maintained including the pool area and small fitness center. There is a complementary breakfast which is decent but I wish they served better coffee. As mentioned, there is a pool area and a small fitness center which includes 5 cardio machines and rack of dumbbells. The lobby area has a marketplace where you can purchase snacks and beverages. The property is also located half a block from a gas station and convenience store where we purchased water and snacks. There is free parking on the premise and a bus stop located in front of the hotel where you can take a bus to the Disney entrance as well.   The best
Manager Response: Hello SteveP22!,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel!  We are glad you were able to enjoy our clean and spacious rooms!  Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort is definitely a plus when staying here.  Thank you for choosing the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Good breakfast, walking distance to Disney, view of fireworks, when requested, from hotel room. I like the separation between beds and couch seating area so kids can sleep while we watch tv. Used Uber and Uber eats, worked out well.
Manager Response: Hello gwar099!,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our hotel!  We are excited to hear that you got to enjoy our wonderful breakfast and spacious rooms!  That view of the fireworks is definitely a nice perk here.  Thank you for choosing Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Nice and clean, the staff is very conscientious and friendly. The hotel is quiet and located within a walking mile of Disneyland and very close proximity to a trolley stop. Breakfast is a typical hotel breakfast. Rooms have a microwave, fridge and single-serve coffee.
Manager Response: Hello MizKChandler!  Thanks you for the 5 star review of our hotel!  We are so happy to hear that our team members made an impact on your stay!  Our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort is definitely a plus.  We hope to see you back soon at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate.

Summary: Right in front of Disney land resort and next to the convention centre. Good choice of restaurants at walking distance and a pharmacy below. Rooms are big and they also have special beds for kids. Decent breakfast too. Recommended
Manager Response: Hello signonsameer!  Thank you for the great review of our hotel.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was a good hotel. We stayed here for 5 nights in August while we visited Disneyland and other attractions in the area. The beds were comfy and the room was always clean when we got back from our daytime adventures. The little fridge in the room was a big plus. We could take cold drinks with us during the day, but also have snacks for nighttime when we returned from the park.  My one complaint would be that the pool closes at 10:00. It's hard to make it back from the park and have any time to swim with it closing so early. I understand it's probably to prevent noise complaints, as the pool has rooms surrounding it, but a little later closing time would have been nice. There are nice laundry facilities with two washers and dryers, which we found  very helpful. You can walk to
Manager Response: Hello Go2theZoo!,  Thank you for the wonderful review of out hotel!  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious clean rooms!  Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort is definitely a perk here.  We hope to see you again soon at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!

Summary: I just wanted to say: From the time I drive up to the front of the hotel, Mo the front guest valet employee is great, happy,  Just very helpful. Iâ€™m coming from Hawaii, and Mo, ( hotel employee ) has the Hawaii spirit. Thank you. I will be here at this hotel for 5 days,  If anyone checks in, or needs help at this hotel, as for Mo at the front, you will get great service with a smile...
Manager Response: Hello HenrySchucht!,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel!  We appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Polite Workers, Good Beds, Not the Best Location
Summary: We stayed at the Springfield Suites by Marriott in room #430 during the last weekend of August for 3 nights.  The room faced the pool and back area of the property.  We were attending the D-23 Convention at Disneyland and had waited too late to book a hotel closer to the Anaheim Convention Center.  The Springfield Suites worked out fine, but is too far to walk to the park entrances or convention center.  Lyft worked good for us here.  The rooms were sizable and laid out nicely.  There was a sofa area away from the beds and plenty of space to work at the desk provided by the sofa area.  The beds were really comfortable and came with 4 large pillows for each bed.  This was really nice.  There was only one television which worked out okay for us but had to be swiveled between the
Manager Response: Hello Chris F!  Thank you for your recent review of your stay with us!  We are always to hear back from our guests on how we can improve our property and will take everything into consideration when we discuss our upgrades in the near future.  We are super happy that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and comfortable beds!  With the upgrades at the Disneyland Resort they did take away our closest walking route making it a tad bit longer so may we suggest the ART shuttle which picks up in front of the hotel every 20-25 minutes dropping you off directly in front of the park entrance!  We apologize about the tourism/resort fees but those are taxes regulated by the city and state which are unfortunately out of our control.  Next time we hope you get to take advantage of our wonderful pool and spa area as it is a great place to relax!  Again thank you for your feedback.  Joe Front Office Manager

Summary: Pros: canâ€™t get much closer to Disney parking garage, spacious rooms, clean, comfy bed, nice staff, ample parking  Cons: road side rooms are very noisy, AC is ridiculously loud, 1 tv shared between bed and sitting area  I came back from the park at 10:30 at night to no hot water. I called front desk and they wanted to send maintenance. I told them to late and that I would like a new room. I was moved from my quiet room to a roadside room that was very very loud. That was a bummer; luckily it was for only 2 days.
Manager Response: Hello rbkranch!,  Thank you for the review of our wonderful hotel!  We are happy that you enjoyed the proximity to the Disneyland Resort and our spacious clean room!  Being near Disneyland we do have a lot of traffic that strolls through the neighborhood.  We thank you for staying at the Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate and hope to see you in the future!

Summary: Worst experience ever.  Scheduled a business stay here a month ago with confirmation code.  Reservation made on Marriott website.  Showed up day of (at 3p) and the front desk informed me they were full and I would have to go to another hotel (many miles away).  I even have Gold status with Marriott.    Moral of the story, do not trust your confirmation code!  It means nothing.  Now I wonder if I can charge Marriott for my missed stay as they WILL charge you if you no show.  Would hate to see a family with little kids show up expecting to have a great time at Disneyland only to find out their reservation was no good and they had to stay somewhere far away!
Manager Response: E B  Thank you for your recent review of our hotel.  We certainly apologize for the inconvenience of having to move your reservation to another location.  Sometimes things happen that our out of our control.  We certainly value you as a Marriott Bonvoy member as we value all our members and appreciate the loyalty.  Although this situation is very rare, we do take it seriously and will use the feedback to better each guest experience.

Summary Heading: Solid experience! Convenient, very clean, and family-friendly!
Summary: Very clean, courteous staff, close to Disneyland, but not an easy walk. It's a 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney, then another 8 minutes to get into the parks, so the ART shuttle a better option.   Excellent breakfast! Typical Marriott breakfast, but hotter and replenished quicker than other Marriott properties. Our five night stay was great! Five minute drive to Anaheim's Packing District, which has food options for all people in your party and is cheaper and better than eating in the Disney parks. Our room had a view of the fireworks at Disneyland. Pool and hot tub were very clean. Outdoor pool is in the sun, but has plenty of shaded lounge spaces to relax in.  Would definitely stay here again! In a very quite area of Anaheim. Other hotels near Disneyland have a lot of foot
Manager Response: Hello Kenneth K!,  Thank you for your 5 star review of our hotel!  We are glad that you were able to partake in our wonderful breakfast!  We are also glad you got to visit our local Packing District so with many great varieties there.  We look forward to your visit back to Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate!

Summary: Cannot say  enough about this hotel. Affordable, sparkly clean, comfy beds, modern decor, stellar staff and we got to watch the Disney Fireworks up close in our room! Best seats ever!! There is a full, hot breakfast every morning that is included in your stay! Disney land was a 10 minute, $6 uber away. This will be the go to for our family.
Manager Response: Hello Dejay D!,  We appreciate your kind words on our hotel here!  That fireworks view is definitely one of the best seats around!  Thank you again for choosing Springhill Suites by Anaheim Maingate and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Take care!

Summary Heading: Very family friendly and clean hotel
Summary: Weâ€™ve had an amazing week here so far! When we first arrived they gave us an early check in and Mayra put us in a room that viewed the fireworks and made the check process easy! The housekeepers are very quiet and respectful! The pool area is clean and offers a lot of sun and shade. Guest laundry was convenient. Breakfast is the only busy time so get up early if youâ€™re relying on that to feed your family. Other than that it is a very quiet hotel! We walked to the Disney and Friends tram which is very clean and with quick access into the Park. We would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Trisha W!,  We appreciate your kind words about our hotel and staff! I'm glad we were able to set you up with that early check in and wonderful view! One of the great things about our hotel is the proximity to the Disneyland Resort! We hope to see you again in the future here at The Springhill Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate!

Summary: We had a great experience staying at this hotel for the first time.  We stayed for 7 nights.  The staff was very friendly.  Our room was ready for early check-in.  Breakfast was good but very crowded if you went later. I would recommend going early 6:30-7:00am. We were greeted everytime we entered the hotel and they told us to have a great day every time we left the hotel.  Walking distance to parks but if you have small kids, I would recommend the bus transportation.  Very clean, beds very comfortable.  One day the housekeeper made us a rose out of the washclothes.  Such a personal touch.
Manager Response: Nicsha,  Thank you so much for your recent stay here at the Springhill Maingate.  We are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience from the early check in, to the breakfast, comfy beds and proximity to Disneyland.  Our staff is what truly makes the difference and I'm glad you got to experience our housekeepers and the fun things they make with towels and washcloths.  Hope that you enjoy the rest of your summer and we will you see you again soon.

Summary: Costco package with Disney tixs and other items included. Right on a main corner but very quiet. Underground parking-cost 24 a day- but get there early or it fills up. CVS next store. Grounds very clean, lobby and dining area clean. Liked that you have to have a room card to make the elevators work. Room was good sized, very clean and comfortable. Could hear upstairs and out in the hallway too easy. Breakfast was always packed.  Very short walk to the parks.If you get a package like we did stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent response and stay here in Anaheim.  We pride ourselves on our excellent service and clean and comfortable property.  We hope that you enjoy the rest of your summer!

Summary: I stayed with my family to go to Disneyland. It is a 5 min drive. They have a shuttle but didnâ€™t use it. The hotel was very clean. Staff was friendly. The free morning breakfast is the usual Marriott fare. The only problem was that they have 2 dryers and 2 washers for entire building. One dryer was broken and the other was not good at all. Bring enough clothes so you donâ€™t have to wash. I recommend this hotel if you wish to visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wanted to say thank you for your recent stay with us here at the Springhill Maingate.  Glad to see you had a positive experience at the hotel.  Thank you for your feedback as it always helps us to better ourselves for each guest that visits us.  We hope you have a great summer and hope to have you visit us again soon.

Summary: I donâ€™t think I have ever had a better experience at a hotel. Everyone has been extremely helpful. Manager Eric has been fantastic to myself and our team, always accommodating anything we need. Gladys at the front desk always welcomes you with a smile and will help you with anything at all. All of the employees and I mean all of them never are caught without a smile and a helpful hand. The rooms are spacious and spread out well, breakfast is delicious and FREE! If you are going to be in the Anaheim area I highly recommend staying here. Thank you Springhill, I will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Dakota, It has been such a pleasure to have you all staying with us!  Glad to hear everything from the rooms to the staff has been great.  Our staff is always here for anything you need during your stay.  Thanks again for staying at the Springhill Maingate.  Happy to have you back anytime!

Summary: Good size rooms with very good beds. Location  is walking distance to Disneyland. If you can't walk there is a shuttle bus at the door. Breakfast is available and is adequate. The waffles were delicious. Several eateries nearby as well as fast food places
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our spacious rooms and comfy beds.  We are glad to see you were able to enjoy the morning breakfast as well.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, spacious suite.
Summary: Easy check in, although we arrived early to hotel, we were able to check in to room early which was very helpful. Staff very friendly, answered all questions and directions to Disneyland. Breakfast was great. Suite and room were very spacious and comfortable for our family. We had family from New Zealand who were very impressed as well with hotel stay.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your stay here at the Springhill Maingate.  Glad to see you had a positive experience with our spacious rooms and daily breakfast.

Summary Heading: Great stay, mild disappointment with service
Summary: This hotel was exactly what my family has come to expect from Springhill properties over the years.  Room was comfortable and the sitting area of the room helped space-wise in a room with four people.  Location was convenient to Disneyland, but a bit too long to be walkable with kids.  Breakfast was good, and the hot option varied day to day.  The outdoor pool was nice as well.  My only frustration is that the staff told me I'd earn points for the stay even though I booked as a partner hotel through a Disney package.  In the end, I didn't get the rewards credit.  Other than that, no complaints, and I'd probably stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Delivered The Best Customer Service Experience  , Above Expectations!
Summary: Thank you Mayra , for giving my 5 Yr Old Son A Spectacular Birthday Experience at your Hotel !  We came to our room , to our surprise , there was a Mickey Mouse Birthday Banner Hanging over his bed , with Complimentary Birthday Goodies , his Reaction was Priceless! We will be recommending your Hotel For Everyone. Especially Birthday Celebrations! Highly Recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at the Springhill Maingate.  We love to celebrate with our guests and make magical memories for our guests whenever possible.  It is heartwarming to know our staff went above and beyond to make your stay a memorable one.  Hope to have you back for your next vacation.

Summary: Enjoyed this hotel very much when we visited for the 2019 NCAA West Regional Sweet 16 games. The hotel was very clean, friendly, efficient and had a great breakfast. Everyone was attentive and they even came out with defoamer for the jacuzzi. Pool and spa made for an excellent unwind.  Close to everything Anaheim
Manager Response: Hey gjl6285,   I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while you were visiting the Honda Center. Our team takes pride in having a clean and efficient property with friendly team members as well. We'd love to host you again if your in the area!  Sincerely,   David Dumond Front Desk Supervisor
