Our only complaint has nothing to do with the actual hotel but with the shuttle to Disney.  We bought our tickets at the hotel and took the shuttle from hotel to Disney (about a 7 min trip).  Problem was there was only one shuttle it seemed.  The wait time were horrendous, especially on the way back to hotel from Disney.  At one point there were about 50 people waiting for the shuttle which could only take so many and had to leave the remaining people behind until they took us to hotel and came back.  Not worth the money-we should have walked but bought a three day pass and didn't want to waste our money.
Manager Response: Lindsey T,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our hotel is conveniently located about a half mile away from the Disneyland Resort. When traveling to and from the park, our guests prefer to utilize two main options. The first being the ART shuttle, which picks up every 20-25 minutes in front of our hotel and will take you to the main entrance. Sometimes it can be very busy with a lot of people waiting for the shuttle, so if this option isnâ€™t the best fit for you, we do have walking directions to the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure where you can take the complimentary Disneyland tram. Our breakfast gives our guests many different food offerings to ensure everyoneâ€™s needs are met, even gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again.  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great location - 10 minute walk to shuttles to Disneyland
Summary: Very nice new hotel.  Great breakfast.  Very clean rooms & only a 10-minute walk to the parking & shuttle station to board a 3-minute shuttle to Disneyland.  You can also walk another 8-10 minutes to Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Paul B,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear you had a great stay with us! Our hotel is only a short walk to the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance. If you walk a little further, Downtown Disney has a lot of restaurants and shopping options, only a short walk from the hotel. Our complimentary breakfast gives our guests many different food options to get your day off to a great start! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again.  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: My family and I have just returned from a 2 week stay at the Springhill Suites and we were very impressed.  The room was very clean and spacious, staff were all really friendly and helpful.  There is easy access to transport to Disney but we walked there, it's takes about 15-20 mins to walk and is about a mile away. There is free Wi-Fi in the rooms and the complimentary breakfast is great. The pool area is clean and relaxing with lots of fresh towels. My husband was also impressed by the fitness room. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Jeanette P,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! On behalf of all of our staff, we are glad to hear your vacation with us was great! Our hotel is perfectly situated only a short walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance and Downtown Disney. Our complimentary buffet-style breakfast is a big hit with our guests in the morning, as we have many different breakfast food options, as well as gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again.  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Great little  place. Staff very friendly. Room clean..... beds comfy...great location. Even had towel art after the room was made up....2 TVs.  Within walking distance to DL. We did purchase ART bus transfers as at night too tired to walk back. Only complaint was the Buffett breakfast...it needed to last longer than 930, and the selection of foods were not great. Could of used more fruit, omelette station, and ran out of some items. Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Gaye M,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our property prides ourselves on delivering the very best all-around guest experience for our guests. On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear we met your expectations and provided you and your guests with a great, all-around guest experience! Our property is in perfect proximity of Disneyland, where our guests can either take a short walk and hop onto the complimentary Disneyland tram, or pick up the ART shuttle right in front of our property. To see which option best suits you just ask any of our friendly front desk associates. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great value, friendly staff and walk to Disneyland.
Summary: I have stayed here 3 times in the past year and you can't beat the value in staying here for a family vacation to Disneyland. Something I found out on this trip was you can see the Disneyland fireworks from the 5th floor deck! I actually got to reading the handy flyer they gave out telling everything about the hotel, activities and things to know. I ended up reading that the fireworks were visible from the roof top deck! We got in late evening and did not have time to go to Disneyland and ended up at the deck and it was very nice! Lots of room and seats set up for viewing. You can also see them from the roof top swimming pool! Although they are a short distance away, it was a great site to see and not have to fight the people to get out of the park! The deck is very nice too.
Manager Response: 12YearTravels,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a roof-top pool or a pharmacy attached to our hotel. But it does look like you and your family had a wonderful stay! If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Near Disney...not so fairy tale like...
Summary: It was our family's summer vacay kick-off.  We had a great stay at Residence Inn Las Vegas Airport.  This hotel could not hold its own against the Residence Inn.  - The property look good from the outside, very modern and cool views. - We were greeted with warm regards...very pleasant. - I requested an additional room...and the staff (reservation) worked to get it done. - They only had three luggage carts; and when we asked where and when we can borrow one, our request fell on deaf ears...no effort - The pool was good--again, the kids loved it - Breakfast was a traffic jam; ran out of eggs and bacon--long wait times...just like Disney--not so good. - Didn't see the effort of appreciating our stay and patronage...we will not return to this property.
Manager Response: Hello D3_Vega, Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim. I am happy to hear that you found your arrival experience to be so pleasant, but Iâ€™m sorry to hear that my Team was not more accommodating in assisting you with you requests. Our goal at this hotel is to provide exceptional service to each and every one of our guests, I apologize that we fell short of that goal during your stay with. I have shared your feedback with our Team in effort to improve and provide better service to you in the future, and I hope that we have the opportunity to have you as a guest again in the future. Please feel free to contact me directly if I may assist you in the future. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing staff very clean and modern hotel
Summary: Great hotel for the price! Very modern and clean. The only downside was it was not located near any restaurants or places to get a quick bite to eat.  It is a good 20 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland  although they do have a hotel shuttle at a small cost.  There is also a "free" tram you can take but you can no longer take the shortcut through the employee gate to get there.  By the time you walk to the tram you may as well walk the extra 10 mins to the Disney Gates.   We enjoyed the walk so it was no problem for us. The staff at the checkin desk were great.  We especially found Tyler to be very helpful and lots of fun.   I was there with my 13 year old Granddaughter and she thought the hotel was great too.  It's clean and new!  Loved the free wifi !!!!!!
Manager Response: Ronandcathy,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is in great proximity of the Disneyland resort which is great for all of our Disney travelers. Our hotel offers two main options of getting to Disneyland. We have the ART shuttle that picks up right in front of our hotel every 20-25 minutes and will take our guests to Disneyland, for a small nominal fee. Another option is to walk to the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure and hop onto the complimentary Disneyland tram. As an added convenience, we do sell the ART shuttle tickets and have complimentary walking directions at the front desk. Just ask any of our front desk staff and they would be happy to assist you! On behalf of all of our staff, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse  Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here recently and it was awesome.  The rooms are big and very clean.  The staff is very friendly and the free breakfast was fantastic!  They provide a shuttle to Disneyland for a very small fee.  I think we paid $14.95 for 3 days and we could take it as much as we liked and it came every 20 mins.   I would totally stay here again.  Oh and free Wifi!!
Manager Response: Teekillya,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are happy to hear your stay with us was great. Our location from Disneyland is great for guests wanting to go to Disneyland as we are only a half mile away. Our guests utilize two main options when traveling to and from the Disneyland Resort. The first option is the ART shuttle, which picks up every 20-25 minutes right in front of our hotel and will bring you to the main entrance, for a small fee. Another great option is to walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where you can catch the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it to the main entrance also. To make it easier on our guests, we even sell the ART shuttle tickets and provide walking directions to the tram as well! Our complimentary buffet-style breakfast offers our guests a wide range of food options to ensure there is something for everyone. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!   Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Reasonably priced, very clean, new modern furnishings.  Walked through the employee gate to get into the Parking Structure to take the trams to the Maingate.  It was very convenient.  There was a fitness faciity, free breakfast buffet (which personally other than the fruit, looked horrible), but many were eating there.  The rooms were very large and comfortable with all new furnishings and an extra desk area for business.  They had a refrigerator, television and the couch folded down into an extra bed.  I had an end room and it was pleasantly quite, so I slept very soundly.  The staff were all very helpful and friendly.  The price was extremely reasonable and I would definitely stay at this hotel when visiting Disneyland for more than a day.
Manager Response: Jlfaa,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are excited to hear your stay with us was great. Our location is in perfect proximity of the Disneyland Resort, which is great for our guests headed to Disneyland. We are only a short walk from the Mickey's and Friends Parking Structure, where our guests can hop aboard the complimentary Disneyland tram and ride it to the main entrance. Another option our guests can utilize is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel every 20-25 minutes and will take you and your guests to the main entrance as well, for a small fee. To see which option is best for you and your family, or to purchase tickets for the ART shuttle, just visit our front desk and we will gladly assist you! We pride ourselves on our excellent guest service and we are ecstatic to hear we upheld our commitment to providing you and your family with an excellent all-around guest experience! Thank you again for staying with us, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!   Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Modern, clean hotel. Very pleased with our stay.
Summary: We are local Disneyland annual pass holders. We have never stayed to see the Electrical Parade or the fireworks, so we decided to find a nearby hotel for one night during spring break as a short stay-cation. That way we could get a mid-day break and return to the park for the nighttime events. I spent hours on line checking reviews of the properties by DL. There was no way we were going to pay the high rates at one of the 3 DL hotels. It seemed that many of the nearby hotels, while very convenient, were described as "tired"--old and in need of refurbishment. We finally decided on the SpringHill Suites. We were very happy with our decision.  It is a short drive from the Mickey & Friends parking structure where we parked the first morning before check-in and following check-out
Manager Response: Karatemom17,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear you a great stay with us. Our hotel is perfectly located near Downtown Disney and the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking structure where our guests can take a short walk and hop onto the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it to the main entrance or walk to Downtown Disney, where there is many different restaurant options and shopping options. Our buffet-style complimentary breakfast offers many different breakfast food options to ensure there is something for everyone, as well as gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us, and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great location walking distance to Disney
Summary: Spacious clean room. Staff is kind and helpful. Excellent alternative to on resort hotels. You can walk a minute to free shuttle busses if 7 minute walk is too much. Nora huge fan of the decor in the room, but that is a taste thing. Hotel is quiet so you can get a good night sleep. Beds and pillows are comfortable. Lots of outlets to charge your devices but some of the wall ones are filled in so you can't use them. Found that odd.
Manager Response: Louis P,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear you had a great experience at our hotel. Our hotel is comfortably situated only a short walk from Mickey's and Friends Parking structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram to the main entrance. Another option our guests can utilize  when getting to Disneyland is the ART shuttle, the ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel every 20-25 minutes and will take you to the main entrance as well, for a small nominal fee. To see which option best suits you and your family just ask any of our friendly front desk associates and they will be happy to assist you. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, remember "our doors are always open" and we would love to accomodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This hotel was very disappointing. The room had a bad smell and I got a rash over my body from something in the room. It did have a renovated bathroom which was good but old carpets which didn't feel clean. It was probably the furthest distance away from Disneyland than any of the surrounding hotels. Nothing close by you have to get the shuttle to Disneyland plus we also had a car and had to pay parking at the hotel.  Breakfast was very ordinary too.  Would never stay there again and would not recommend to others.
Manager Response: Hello Nicole M, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and share your feedback. We pride ourselves in maintaining exceptional cleanliness and delivering memorable service at our hotel, I apologize that was not your experience while staying with us. I have taken this opportunity to share your comments with my housekeeping team to ensure that this was an isolated issue and corrected moving forward. I do hope that you were able to enjoy your time here in Anaheim and hope that youâ€™ll give us another chance if you are ever in the area again. Thank you again for staying with us. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location for a Disney Vacation
Summary: We Visited Disneyland for 2 days and spent 3 nights at Springhill Suites.  The location is great for the Disneyland visit but there are a couple of things to be aware off. Traffic on Ball rd can get get heavy and if you wish to go out for food there is not much wishing walking district from the hotel To get to Disneyland you can either walk through the Disneyland employee parking a catch the tram or take the Anaheim Shuttle to the Disneyland Transportation Center.  If you opt for the shuttle watch their schedule and buy a day ticket from the hotel front deck. The breakfast at the hotel was the standard fair but was hot and fresh. Get down for breakfast before 8:30 when it gets really busy. All the staff were super helpful and friendly and the rooms are fresh and very
Manager Response: Les H,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our property is a short walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram to the main entrance. Another great option for our guests is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up every 20-25 minutes right in front of our hotel, for a small fee. Downtown Disney, which has numerous restaurants and shopping options, is only a short walk from our hotel as well. Just ask any of our staff for walking directions as well as tickets for the ART shuttle as we sell them at the front desk! Our breakfast offers guests lots of different food options, as well as gluten free options to ensure our guestâ€™s tastes are met! Once again we are glad to hear you and your family had a wonderful stay with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again.  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Family of 5 Travelled on long flight from Aust arriving @9am, we were offered breakfast and early check in while our room was being finalised which was so such a nice gesture considering it was about 1am oz time and we were all jet lagged.  Room was on top floor and had views of Disney fireworks. Room serviced daily and was impeccable every time we arrived back. Staff were very friendly and went out of their way to make sure we were looked after. Rooms were clean and beds and comfortable pool was nice to.  Breakfast had plenty of variety to kick off your day and easy 5min approx walk to Disney free tram to main entry
Manager Response: Andre D,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our property is a short walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram to the main entrance. Another option our guests use to get to Disneyland is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel every 20 to 25 minutes and will take you to the main entrance as well, for a small fee. To see which option is best for you, just ask any of our friendly front desk associates and they would be happy to assist you! On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled you and your family had a wonderful stay with us. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Amazing staff - they made our stay more "magical".
Summary: Our room was clean, updated and spacious.  Great for a family, especially the free breakfast.  Walking distance to Disneyland which saves you the parking fees and long parking lot lines,  Would certainly stay here again!
Manager Response: Jan G,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear we upheld our commitment to providing you and your family with an outstanding guest experience! Our short walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking structure and Downtown Disney make our hotel an ideal fit when deciding to visit Disneyland. Our buffet-style breakfast aims to cater to all of guests tastes to ensure we have food options for everyone, including gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!   Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Second time we've been to this hotel and I'm pretty confident this will be our go-to destination hotel in Anaheim from now on. The rooms are spotless and they are cleaned every day! We even had a towel animal awaiting us one evening. Very nice touch! Loved the view (I believe the west side), a great view of the fireworks! I love that the Disneyland tram is a short distance walk from the hotel and the continental breakfast has plenty of options. My children loved the addition of chocolate chips and powdered sugar for their waffles. ;) Very friendly and helpful staff. Great stay, once again!
Manager Response: Liz M,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are pleased to hear you had another great stay with us! Our location is perfect for Disney travelers as we are located conveniently right behind Downtown Disney, and we are in very close proximity of Disneyland. We offer our guests a complimentary buffet-style breakfast with many different food offerings and even gluten-free options. Once again, thank you for coming back to see us, and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great accomodations for a large family
Summary: I really appreciate the large rooms which can accommodate up to 6 people...very helpful for my husband, me and our 4 kids. Breakfast was bountiful with a waffle bar, eggs, bacon, sausage, bagels, oatmeal, cereals, juices and coffee.The staff kept the breakfast bar continuously stocked and they open early for Disney go-ers. The pool area is nothing fancy but comfortable.  The walk to Downtown Disney or to the tram is very convenient.  Great location for the parks.  I do wish there were more restaurants/stores nearby, but we'd stay here again. Friendly staff!
Manager Response: Sharon H,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are excited to hear we upheld our commitment to providing you and your family with an excellent all-around guest experience! Our location is perfect when deciding to go to Disneyland, as we are only a short walk away from the Mickey's and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can utilize the complimentary Disneyland tram. Another option our guests can utilize is the ART shuttle, which picks up every 25 minutes or so right in front of our hotel for a small nominal fee. Our complimentary breakfast gives our guests many different breakfast options to ensure there is something for everyone, including gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Clean and spacious rooms, helpful staff
Summary: Our family stayed here for 4 nights while we visited Disneyland.  We had arrived early afternoon and we were able to check in straight away.  The rooms were clean and spacious and there was also a small sitting area which we could keep out luggage and bits and pieces. The rooms are clean and modern, the beds were comfortable. The Disney tram is a short walk and we also caught the ART shuttle which can be caught in the driveway.  This was handy especially at night when going out for dinner. The hotel is not located close to any restaurants but using the shuttle overcomes this. Breakfast was good, the first morning we came down too late and the staff were cleaning up.  They generously provided to us some of the left overs which was ample for what we wanted.  The staff were
Manager Response: holidaymarch2017,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! On behalf of all of our staff, we are glad to hear you and your family had a wonderful stay with us. Our hotel is comfortably situated only a short walk from the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can hop aboard the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it to the main entrance. Another option when deciding to go to Disneyland is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up in front of our hotel every 20 -25 minutes and we do sell tickets right here at the front desk! Our breakfast, complimentary with your stay, offers our guests a wide variety of breakfast options to ensure all of our guests tastes are met. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, remember "our doors are always open" and we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Extremely clean and friendly hotel in a perfect location!
Summary: We stayed at SpringHill Suites Anaheim Maingate and had such a positive experience! My husband and I have 6 children together. We wanted to stay at the SpringHill Suites because it's our favorite Marriott hotel chain. I knew we'd have to book two rooms for our family because their rooms only sleep 4 or 6 and was concerned because our family would be separated at nights. Either my husband and I separated each night or us separated from some of the kids. I contacted the hotel and obtained the name and email of the sales manager, Dinah, and told her our situation and she said she'd do her best to get us in adjoining rooms so we booked this hotel. True to her word, we arrived at the hotel and found we had adjoining rooms. We loved having adjoining rooms so our kids were close and we
Manager Response: Lisa M,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! Our hotel is in perfect location of the Disneyland Resort. The first option when deciding to travel to Disneyland is to walk to the Mickeys and Friends Parking Structure where you can take the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance. Another option is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel every 20-25 minutes, for a small fee. We provide walking directions as well as sell the ART shuttle tickets at the front desk, just ask any of our associates which option is best for you! On behalf of all our staff, we are thrilled to hear you had a great experience with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again.  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The hotel was really nice and clean. It is so quiet, yet within a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney and The Disney Hotel. Breakfast could use some variation but I would stay there again. Our room was huge and the layout was fantastic- studio with 2 queens.
Manager Response: Aimee G,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear you had a great stay with us. Our location is in perfect walking distance of the Disneyland Resort. Our breakfast aims to cater to all of our guests' tastes and fluctuates daily! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: My family and I stayed here in February of 2017 and although we thought we booked at the other Springhill suites, we ended up at this location. The staff was extremely professional and friendly, they let us check in early after driving for 18 hours, breakfast was great every morning and the walk to the park was incredibly short through the parking structure. We also had a room with a full view of the fireworks at night, we will surely stay again!
Manager Response: Meranda H,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is perfectly situated only a short walk from the Mickey's and Parking Structure, where our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram right up to the main entrance. Another option our guests utilize is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel and drops off at the main entrance, for a small nominal fee. We even offer detailed walking directions and sell the tickets right here at the front desk! Our staff always goes out of their way to ensure our guests needs are met, and I am very pleased that our staff took very good care of you and your family by getting you guys into a room as soon as possible after driving over 18 hours. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: stayed there on a business trip, newer and clean.  It does attract the Disney crowd so plenty of traffic in the morning at breakfast. Overall a good location, breakfast choices were very good, lobby appeared new or remodeled.  The location is very close to Disney property, exercise room had basic equipment (tread mills, elliptical, free weights) and was adequate, would stay there again.
Manager Response: 75Matt,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear you had a great stay with us! Our hotel has a nice blend of business travelers as well as Disney travelers, so breakfast can be hectic at times, but our staff does a tremendous job of making sure all of our guests needs are met. Our complimentary buffet style breakfast gives our guests a wide variety of breakfast options to ensure all of our guests tastes are met. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!    Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: My family and I stayed here in October to attend Mickey's Halloween Party.  We stayed a full week.  The free breakfast was a plus which saved us a lot of money.  The location was convenient because you could take a 5-10 minute walk to the Disney parking structure and take the free shuttle straight to the park and Downtown Disney.  The room was very spacious but the only downside was the frosted glass door to the bathroom.  At night the light shines through and could wake everyone up.  Request a fireworks view room, the view was amazing.  The staff was very friendly and overall I would stay here again and recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thomas M,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear you had a great stay with us! Our location is perfect for our guests going to Disneyland, as we are a short walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, where our guests can hop on the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it right up to the main entrance. Another excellent option our guests utilize when traveling to Disneyland is the ART shuttle, which for a small nominal fee, our guests can pick up right in front of our property and take it the main entrance of Disneyland as well. For an added ease factor for guests, we even sell the ART shuttle tickets and have walking directions for the Disneyland tram right at the front desk, just ask any of our friendly associates! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, remember â€œour doors are always openâ€ and we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We really liked this hotel. It was clean and the breakfast was comparable to the free breakfast of hotels in the area. Only downside was location, it really is a distance from the parks. We probably won't stay again just because of the proximity to the parks, but would recommend if someone doesn't mind paying extra for the bus and wants a quiet and clean room.
Manager Response: Lcady9,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is located about a half mile away from Downtown Disney and the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking structure, where our guests can take a short walk and catch the complimentary Disney tram right up to the main entrance. We apologize that this did not work for you and your family, but another option would be to take the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel every 20-25 min, for a small nominal fee. As an added convenience, we even sell the tickets right here at the front desk and offer walking directions if needed, just ask any of our front office associates and they would be glad to assist you! Our buffet style breakfast aims to cater to all of our guestsâ€™ individual tastes. From traditional breakfast options, to gluten free options, we ensure all of our guestsâ€™ tastes are met. Thank you again for staying with us, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The hotel location is good. We were a very short bus ride away from the front gate. The cost one way was $13 for all of us.  The accommodations were spacious with plenty of room for us all.  The biggest problem was the lack of water pressure and hot water. With two girls and one boy with thick curly hair water pressure is an issue. The pressure here is pretty low and should probably be addressed. The lack of hot water was a real bummer. The water was probably less than 95 degrees.  With these problems fixed this is a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Tom S, Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Disneyland, Iâ€™m glad that you found our rooms to be spacious for your family and I agree the ART shuttle is a very convenient way to get back and forth to the Parks. I apologize for the issues you had with the water pressure and temperature while you were here, I can certainly understand how that would be frustrating while trying to get ready in the morning. I have shared your feedback with my maintenance team and they are working on solutions to improve this in the future. I hope that you and your family enjoyed your time here in Anaheim and will come back and stay with us again next time youâ€™re in the area. Thank you again for choosing our hotel! Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights, the room was clean and the beds were comfortable! The bathroom is located in a odd area of the room. If you have to get up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom you do disturb others sleeping. The breakfast was very good with many choices to choose from. The walk to the theme parks was about 20 minutes!  The staff was friendly and the hot tub felt great after a long day at Disney!
Manager Response: Michelle T,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! Our hotel is conveniently located a short walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance. Another option our guests can utilize is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel and drops off at the main entrance, for a small fee. To decide which option best fits you, simply ask any of our friendly front desk associates! Our breakfast, complimentary with your stay, offers our guests many different breakfast options served in a buffet style. Just pick up a plate and serve yourself! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed in room 405 and found it very quiet (far from the elevator) and comfortable. This was a very nice, clean hotel with very friendly staff and a great breakfast. I would note that the walk to the tram at the Mickey and Friends parking garage is really not that short and is also a bit convoluted (it seemed a bit like a maze with poorly marked signage, leaving us feeling like we were somewhere we were not supposed to be) but we followed the crowd and made it. If you're doing Disney you'll be on your feet so much that we found it is just a better plan to take the ART shuttles. Also, we were surprised the lobby did not have an all day coffee/tea service set up. This was a small detail in an otherwise wonderful hotel but it would be a nice addition for guests. Next time we do
Manager Response: Her M,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is in perfect proximity of the Disneyland resort, as we are only a short walk away. Our guests utilize two options when traveling to Disneyland. The first option our guests utilize is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel and drops off at the main entrance, for a small nominal fee. Another option our guests can utilize is to walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, which our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram to the main entrance as well. Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Nice hotel. Nothing fancy but big suites. Clean and adequate bathroom. Lunch ok - nothing special though. Good for a stay for a few days.   Shuttlebus to Disneyland just outside the lobby. But think twice before you go. Disneyland park has become a waste of time and money. Long long cues and very expensive.
Manager Response: Hello torbenDenmark,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim and for taking a moment to share your feedback here on TripAdvisor. I was happy to hear that you found our hotel to be clean and that we were able to provide value to you while you were here visiting Disneyland. I hope that you will come back and stay with us again should your travels bring you back to the area, weâ€™d love to have as a guest again! Thank you again for staying with us, I hope you enjoyed your time here in Anaheim. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for an Anaheim Stay
Summary: We reviewed a number of hotels in the Disneyland area of Anaheim and chose the Springhill Suites for a few reasons.  Having stayed at a few of the local hotels in the past, it was refreshing to have a newer hotel as some of the competition is showing its age.  Location was also a plus, far enough from the freeway noise but still a comfortable twenty minute walk to the park.  We used a shuttle on one of the days which left from the hotel parking lot and had us in the park in a few minutes.  We were very warmly greeted upon check in and received a smile and a hello each time we entered.  Staff were helpful and pleasant.  Breakfast was lovely each morning, cereals, eggs, sausage or bacon, plenty of breads and muffins, yogurts and juices.  The pool was clean and refreshing.  The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent stay for family Disney trip
Summary: First of all, I have to say that when it comes to hotels, I'm kinda picky- especially when it comes to the cleanliness of my room and the feel of the bed.  I can honestly say that our entire stay here was fantastic!!   We arrived at the hotel early (8-9 am), and since we had skipped breakfast for our early flight, I was concerned about finding a place to eat breakfast.  Mayra at the front desk was super accommodating by letting us check in early AND eat the complimentary breakfast before we even checked in!  Check in was fast and efficient.  Sinces we were there before check-in time, we chose a room that was check-in ready above the pool, instead of waiting for a room to be cleaned that had a better view.   Walking through the hotel, everything looked and smelled clean (I have a
Manager Response: Swill02,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! First off, on behalf of all of our staff here, we are ecstatic to hear your stay was fantastic with us. Our hotel is dedicated to providing our guests with an excellent all around guest experience every time. As we say here, â€œevery guest every timeâ€. Our property is situated in perfect proximity of the Disneyland Resort where our guests can either walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends parking structure, which is about a 10 to 12 minute walk from our hotel, or use the ART shuttle which picks up right in front of our hotel. When deciding which option is best for you and your family, just ask any of our front desk associates and they would be happy to assist you. Our complimentary buffet-style breakfast offers our guests many different breakfast options so you will be sure to find something that suits your tastes. We even offer gluten free options as well! Once again, thank you for staying with us, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, remember â€œour doors are always openâ€ and we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed mid January for our family Disneyland trip. The hotel is very well maintained. It was clean and inviting. We had a king room with a sleeper sofa.  Pros: The distance to the parks is great if you take the Art or some other shuttle, it seemed to far to walk to me. The breakfast was good, it had enough of a selection for us and there was always enough. The layout of the room was nice, it felt pretty spacious. The bathroom was one of the better bathrooms I have had in a hotel. There is no tub but the shower is large. The bathroom was very good sized and there was plenty of counter space for toiletries.  The staff was ok, no one I had contact with was overly nice but they weren't rude either.   Cons: The beds are extremely firm. For me this is a deal breaker. I didn't get a
Manager Response: Hello Lindsay J, Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim and for taking a moment to share your feedback with us here on TripAdvisor. I am very happy to hear that you found our hotel to be so clean and inviting! Our Team takes great pride in keeping the hotel neat and maintained for all of our guests and Iâ€™m glad to hear that is showing. I am sorry to hear that you were not comfortable on our beds, we understand how important a restful nightâ€™s sleep is and strive to offer that for each and every one of our guests. We will certainly take your thoughtful feedback under consideration and would love to have you come back and stay with us again in the future. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist you in the future, and thank you again for choosing our hotel! Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: I chose this hotel because of the location.  I am very impressed!!!  Upon our early arrival our room was ready. Checking in was a breeze. The manager followed up to make sure the room was to our liking. The shuttle to Disneyland stops in the drive-way.  The breakfast has a nice selection of hot and cold items. I am most impressed by the cleanliness of the entire hotel. While we did not use the pool, fitness center or on-site laundry it is worth mentioning that all of those areas were spotless too. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Porschegal03, Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our unique location makes our hotel an ideal choice when considering a vacation to Disneyland. We are only a short walk from Downtown Disney, where guests can enjoy a wide variety of restaurants and shops. Also, within walking distance is the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where guests can take the complimentary Disney tram right up to the main entrance. We even provide a detailed walking map right here at the front desk for an added convenience to our guests, just ask any of our friendly front desk associates! Our breakfast offers a wide variety of breakfast food options in order to serve all of our guests tastes, as well as gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again! Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: My family of four stayed at the SpringHill Suites (Maingate) this past weekend for the DisneyRun race, and we had an excellent experience.   Lobby - very lively and clean.  It looks like the staff does an excellent job of maintaining the hotel lobby, which was our first great impression of this hotel.  Rooms/Cleanliness - We had two queen beds and a couch with a hide-away bed.  It was perfect for our family.  The rooms also had a small refrigerator, a microwave and a nice seating area.  The bathrooms were nice and Paul Mitchell products were supplied (hair, bath, etc).  Very clean as well!  The cleaning staff should be commended.   Staff - EVERYONE was so nice.  Check-in was easy and efficient.  We were supplied with walking instructions on how to get to Disneyland (if we wanted
Manager Response: MBLanda,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! On behalf of all of our staff, we are all ecstatic to hear your stay was great. Our hotel is in great walking proximity from Downtown Disney as well as the big Mickey and Friends Parking structure where our guests can ride the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance, or visit one of the many stores and restaurants in the Downtown Disney area. We pride ourselves on giving our guests an excellent guest experience in every aspect of your stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for four nights during the second week of December. 2nd stay at this hotel since May for mini  vacations to Disneyland. No complaints during either stay. Only about a 20-25 minute walk to the entrances for Disneyland and the California Adventure (only 15 minutes to Downtown Disney). We just walk down Walnut Street to Downtown Disney and then another 5-10 minutes to the parks. Very good service from all the various employees, nice pool area, and plenty of room for the breakfast service. Can get a bit crowded but they do a good job of clearing tables and keeping the food area stocked. Nice fireplace area in front of the hotel that you can watch the fireworks from Disneyland.  Nice sized room, very clean. We had a king bed and a separate living area.
Manager Response: John B,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff here, we are pleased to hear your stay was great! Our hotel is in perfect walking distance from Downtown Disney and the big Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, where our guests can enjoy a bite to eat at one of the many restaurants in Downtown Disney, or walk to the parking structure and take the complimentary Disney tram right up to the main entrance. Another option we give our guests when traveling to Disneyland is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up every 20-25 minutes right in front of our hotel and it will take you right up to the main entrance, for a small nominal fee. We even have the tickets for sale right here at the front desk. Our complimentary buffet style breakfast aims to cater to all of our guests tastes. We offer different breakfast varieties as well as gluten free options to ensure all of our guestâ€™s tastes are met. Once again, thank you again for staying with us, and if your travels take you back to the Anaheim area we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Good solid hotel within walking distance to the main entrance to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here the week before Thanksgiving in a Kids Suite.  Know the Kids Suites face Disneyland so if you want a park view this is a good option.  They offer a complimentary breakfast every morning...good selection for everyone but very busy!  Good layouts of the rooms.  We had 2 adults and 4 kids and the room never felt crowded.  Enough luggage space and 2 TV's with plenty of space to lounge.  The only downfall  is that the bathroom should have 2 toilets with that many people in one room.  Comfortable beds and decent wifi.  They do have washing machines/dryers on the same floor as the pool and gym, which is convenient.  The pool is on the roof and is tiny.  Really only a few kids can fit in it without it being too crowded and now jacuzzi for the adults.  The rooftop does
Manager Response: mariad,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a CVS pharmacy near us and also do not have a rooftop pool. But it does look like you and your family had a wonderful stay! If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Nice, modern hotel right by the maingate to Disneyland. The first night we walked to Downtown Disney for dinner and the next day we walked to Disneyland. Nice comfortable walk. The rooms are very modern and clean. Nice pool area for the kids. Nice workout room. Great hotel if you are visiting.
Manager Response: KimCarlKids,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is perfectly located a short walk away from Downtown Disney and the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure, where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram right up to the main entrance of Disneyland or grab a bite to eat at one of the many different restaurants. If you need a walking map just ask any one of our friendly front desk associates. Another option our guests utilize while getting to and from Disneyland is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel and drops off right at the main entrance, for a small fee. For an added convenience to our guests, we even sell the tickets right here at the front desk! To see which option best suits you and your family, just come to the front desk and talk to any of our front office associates. On behalf of all of our staff,  we are excited to hear your stay with us was great and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to have you stay with us again!   Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Our family stayed here for a week on our Disneyland trip. The property is new and elegant looking lobby and rooms. Our room is big equipped with two comfy queen beds, small walk-in closest and a sitting area with sofa/bed(so you got 3 queen beds if you need it for a big family). There is a safe in the walk-in closet, a refrigerator and a microwave that is nicely placed. The hotel is one block away from the Disneyland's tram pickup area so it is a plus for us. Breakfast is decent with the normal scramble egg, bagels, danishes, oatmeal, milk, yogurt, fresh fruit, etc... Meat items changed each day, bacon one day sausage the next. There also two waffle machines that make a plate size tasty waffle. The hotel also has a laundry room and a small exercise room. I would have given the
Manager Response: FNguyen,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear you and your family had a excellent stay with us. Our hotel is perfectly located only a short walk from Downtown Disney, where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance. Another option our guests utilize when getting to and from Disneyland, is the ART shuttle. Which picks up in front of our hotel and takes our guests to the main entrance as well, for a small nominal fee. For a convenience to our guests, we sell the tickets right here at the front desk. Our breakfast, complimentary with your stay, has different food offerings for all of our guestâ€™s tastes! Again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, our doors are always open and we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Who is designing these hotel rooms? I would like to understand why the decision makers think its a great idea to have a bathroom in the middle of the room with a glass door. Do these people not stay in rooms with other people? Clearly they must not stay in rooms with people that turn the light on the bathroom at night and blind those that are sleeping in bed. Plus, they must not make noises when using the toilet. If you think you're getting privacy in the bathroom, think again. Marriott go back to building rooms with bathrooms at the far end of the room with a solid metal bathroom door, so if people have to use the restroom at night or use the restroom in general they can have privacy and not disturb others in the room. If I was to have designed these hotels and rooms, I would
Manager Response: Hello BagpiperCraig,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Anaheim and for taking the time to share your feedback with us here. We strive to provide extraordinary service along with clean, modern accommodations at our hotel. I am terribly sorry to hear that our room design did not suit your needs, I have shared your feedback with our development team in hopes that we can better serve our guests in the future. I do hope that you enjoyed your time in Anaheim and would love for you to give us another opportunity if you ever come back to the area. Please feel free to contact me directly if I can be of assistance in the future.  Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: We stayed Friday to Tuesday, and WOW! What a fun trip. Large, extended breakfast and eating area. Comfy and large rooms. Plus, the bartender on staff Sunday and Monday night was SO AWESOME!!!! She was the coolest bartender ever, and she needs a raise! The one downside is the hotel is packed full of kids, and we were there for a business trip. They woke us up pretty early every morning screaming and running in the halls.
Manager Response: Mindy M,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a bar at our location. But it does look like you had a wonderful stay! If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The hotel lobby & dining area were clean and nice. Their free breakfast was pretty good, and I really enjoyed their coffee every morning.  They gave us a room on first floor since we had three kids. The room we checked in was great & clean. There was a microwave and a mini refrigerator. However, I quickly noticed that the bathroom sink drain was badly plugged. A front desk agent assisted by quickly providing a room nearby for us to move. The room wasn't as nice as the previous one (although very similar) and we could hear next door through a connecting door.  Other than that, my family really enjoyed staying there. The beds were comfortable. Every front desk agent was friendly.  The hotel has a big parking lot, and it's about 15 min. easy walking distance to a tram station to
Manager Response: Syphone,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our property is in an ideal location for guests wanting to go Disneyland as we are a only a short walk away from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where you can take the complimentary Disney tram to the main entrance. Another great option our guests utilize is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel every 20-25 min for a small fee. For added convenience to our guests, we sell the tickets right here at the front desk! On behalf of all of our staff, we are delighted to hear we took care of your guest issue and you and your guests had a great stay! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great Place for a Disney Stay
Summary: We stayed for four nights and found the Springhill Suites to be a great hotel near Disneyland. It is a bit of a walk to the parks but there is a free tram that takes you to Downtown Disney only two blocks away. Although the tram can be busy, it comes every few minutes and only stops at the Mickey and Friends Parking lot (where you catch it) and Downtown Disney. The hotel was clean and the continental breakfast was very good. The room was quite large with two queen beds and a siting area that had a couch that could be pulled out to make a sofabed. The bathroom was large. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: IslandTraveller132,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear we upheld our commitment to providing you and your guests with an excellent guest experience. Our hotel is perfect for our Disney travelers because we are only a short walk away from Downtown Disney and the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can hop aboard the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it right up to the main entrance.  Another option our guests take advantage of is the ART shuttle. Which for a small fee, our guests can pick it up right in front of our hotel and take it to the main entrance as well. To make it even easier for our guests, we even sell the ART shuttle tickets and provide detailed walking instructions, just ask one of our friendly front desk associates! Once again, thank you so much for staying with us, and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!   Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near the Convention Center
Summary: This is a very new, updated and chic hotel that is only a short distance from the Convention Center, rooms are huge so if you're sharing room you have lots of space, great breakfast, nice workout room and helpful staff-- what more could you ask for?? How about also right above a CVS and close to a great little Mediterranean  take out place! (Tanor- separate review). I asked for a quiet room and got Room 520, which was blissfully quiet- I would definitely ask for that room again if I came back....
Manager Response: SydneyB,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a CVS below our hotel and we are not next to the convention center. But it does look like you and your family had a wonderful stay! If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights while visiting Disneyland. Very close to the park. Rooms were extremely comfortable and large. Free breakfast was good but does get very busy.  I suggest getting up a little early to beat the crowd. There is a shuttle for $5 that can take you to Disneyland which is very convenient. All of the staff was extremely friendly and helpful! We enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Els217,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! For our guests making a trip to Disneyland, our location is ideal. We are only a short walk away from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram to the main entrance. Another option our guests take advantage of is the ART shuttle, which for a small fee, can take you to Disneyland. We even sell the tickets at the front desk! Our complimentary buffet style breakfast fulfills the tastes of all of our guests. We offer a wide variety of breakfast options and even gluten free options. On behalf of all of our staff we are delighted to hear you had a great stay with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This hotel is very modern and comfortable. My room was clean and good sized. It had a sofa bed, nice bathroom with sliding door, large TV with many HD channels. Lots of comfortable pillows on the bed. The breakfast buffet was typical fare with make your own waffle station, oatmeal, cereal, breads, eggs, and a different meat selection each day. Juices, milk and coffee also with some fresh fruit. The pool area was also nice with a hot tub. The best thing about this property is its proximity to the park. It is literally on the same block as Disneyland and you could easily walk to the entrance each day. There is a $14 daily fee for parking but I'm sure most nearby properties have the same. Overall, I would highly recommend is as an option for your stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Darin O,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our proximity to Disneyland is ideal for our guests going to the Disneyland resort. We are a short walk away from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where you can hop aboard the complimentary Disney tram and take it to the main entrance. Another great option our guests take advantage of when deciding how to get to Disneyland is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our property and drops off at the main entrance, for a small fee. We sell tickets at the front desk and offer walking directions for an added convenience to our guests! Our complimentary buffet-style breakfast offers a variety of different foods and even gluten free options to ensure all of our guestsâ€™ individual tastes are met. On behalf of all of our staff we are delighted to hear your stay with us was great and we upheld our commitment to providing you and your guests with an excellent all-around guest experience! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Nice stay with a clean room. Walking distance to Disneyland. About 1/2 mile. A little over a half mile to Downtown Disney. Safe area. Good breakfast. I would recommend. Good parking area. Not valet. Refrigerator , small coffee maker and microwave in room.
Manager Response: MIZER,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our property is in perfect proximity of the Disneyland resort where our guests can either take the ART shuttle or walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking structure. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel and drops off at the main entrance, for a nominal fee. Another great option when looking to get to the Disneyland resort is to walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram right up to the main entrance. When deciding which option works best for you and your family, go ahead and stop by the front desk and ask any of our friendly front office associates and they would be happy to assist you! Our complimentary breakfast offers a variety of different food options to ensure there is something for all of our guests, as well as gluten free options. Once again, thank you for staying with us and if you return to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Modern big room, awesome beds. Good breakfast buffet, something different every day of the stay.. Tyler on front desk couldn't do enough to help, will be back. Didn't get a chance to use the pool but it looked really good.. walking distance to all the parks and downtown disney.
Manager Response: Riceyaus,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear your stay with us was great! Our hotel is great for families looking to go to Disneyland as we are a quick walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, where our guests can take the complimentary Disney tram right up to the main entrance. We even provide walking directions for your convenience! Another great option our guests take advantage of when looking to get to Disneyland is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel and brings you up to the main entrance, for a small fee. Our hotel offers a complimentary buffet style breakfast every morning that aims to cater to the tastes of all of our guests. We offer a wide variety of breakfast options and even have gluten free options! Once again, thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area,  we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Quiet and Convenient Disneyland Area Hotle
Summary: We stayed here for four nights for my 3 year olds birthday and Disney vacation. The hotel was very clean and well kept. It is on Ball road the less crowded area so it was quieter and the walk to the tram to Disneyland was only about a 10 min walk how ever with strollers and younger kids the ART shuttle was better for us. The pool was a little small but just big enough for us nothing special. The staff was very knowledgeable and helpful the rooms were extremely big with 2 queens and a sectional sofa bed the only thing I didn't care for was the bathroom door was rolling with a white glass so if someone had to go to the bathroom in middle of night you can hear them go in and out and the light also came threw the glass also breakfast was not that good not enough selection and fake
Manager Response: Brian C,  Thank you for writing us a review on our property! Our location is perfect for guests deciding to go to Disneyland, as we are only a short walk away from Downtown Disney and the Mickey's and Friends Parking Structure. The Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure is where our guests can catch the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it right up to the main entrance, we even provide a detailed walking map for your convenience at the front desk! Another option to get to the Disneyland resort from our hotel is the ART shuttle. For a small fee, the ART shuttle would pick you and your family up right in front of our hotel and bring up to the main entrance. We even sell the tickets at the front desk, as there are one, three, and five day passes. Our staff always prides itself on the knowledge of not only the local area, but the surrounding area as well. We even provide pamphlets at the front desk if you and your family are looking to do more than just Disneyland! Once again thank you for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again.  Warmest Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Reviews and pictures of this hotel look great; but beware. Maingate has a bug problem.  The morning after our first night while getting ready for Disney my 7 year old son spotted a bug on the fold away sofa bed. At first I thought it may be a small gnat as my wife found a few of those in the sink that morning. NO. Bed Bug! I found three after an inspection of where my son was sleeping that night.  Staff handled the situation well. We packed up our things and while we were at Disney they moved us to another room. Which I gave a look over to include the fold away couch. Did not see anything in this room. But sleep and comfort for the remainder if the trip was shot. On top of this my family had two other rooms. One adjacent to our initial bed bug room and one further down the hall
Manager Response: Hello R3012SBjasons, Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Anaheim and for sharing your concerns both here on TripAdvisor and personally with me while you were here. We care deeply about each guestâ€™s experience and take hotel cleanliness and sanitation very seriously at our hotel. As a result, Marriott has established very strict standards of cleanliness for all of its hotels that either meet or exceed public health department regulations, including pest control. Our staff is trained to routinely inspect and monitor all areas of the hotel including guest rooms for any evidence of bed bugs in conjunction with our independent pest control company. In the rare instance that bugs are identified, our protocols call for, amongst other steps, to immediately remove that room from inventory until such time that room has been treated by our experts at the pest control company and re-inspected to ensure they have been eliminated. We understand that this issue is of great concern to our guests and are actively doing everything we can to prevent and eliminate this problem if it occurs. I would like to thank you once again for staying with us and I will be happy to discuss this matter with you further should you wish. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: This was such a comfortable place to stay. The pool was fantastic. The property was clean. The breakfast better than one would expect. It is so close to the Disney property that we walked each day. There was a gate that allowed us to go through the employee parking and then we took the parking garage shuttle to the main gate. It was easy and we felt safe. You could take a bus that goes around the town and picks up in front of the hotel as well. I think it was $5/person per day, I think. The rooms were comfortable and we slept very well. I would use this place again.
Manager Response: Texincolorado,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our location is perfect for our Disney travelers as we are a short walk to the big Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can take the complimentary Disneyland tram right to the main entrance. For an added convenience to our guests, we even offer a walking map right here at the front desk! Another option if walking does not fit you and your family, is the ART shuttle. For a small fee, you and your family can take this shuttle right to the main entrance as well. For an added convenience, it stops right in front of our hotel and we sell tickets right here at the front desk. On behalf of all of our staff, we are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We were staying here on business, but this is a prime location for a stay at Disneyland and very family friendly.  The room was large, clean and comfortable.  Each room has a large sitting are with a large sectional couch and a bedroom area.  The couches could easily be used for children sleeping area.  Nice hot water and good water pressure.  Free  and fast Wi-fi.  The pool is small made for a great place for down town.  I would encourage staff to put a sign on the chair lift allowing for handicap access to the pool, encouraging children not to sit or swing on the chair.  I saw several children using this as a toy, jumping on and swinging from it and had to say something to ignorant parents who were allowing this behavior.  There is a large breakfast included.  Breakfast is a

It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a CVS pharmacy and an IHOP beside us. But it does look like you and your family had a wonderful stay! If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Spacious room for our Family of 5, comprising of 2 queen beds and a set of bunks. Clean, new and tidy, 10 minutes walk to Disney. Hotel doesn't have restaurant but Marri's pizza and pasta took care of that. Kids loved swimming in pool. Great hotel beside pharmacy which was convenient.

If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here while on a trip to Disneyland. It was really clean, the front desk was super helpful, and each room has s mini fridge. Walk to the park in 10 minutes is perfect, and able to see fireworks on the roof at night!
Manager Response: Otg8rgrl02,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a rooftop pool. But it does look like you and your family had a wonderful stay! If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property. If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: I am starting to really enjoy the business model SpringHill Suites offers. The staff are friendly, the decor and rooms edgy contemporary and breakfast always really good. The rates are reasonable depending on location, this one being an easy walk from Disneyland was a bit more but worth it. We walked all around after checking in and not a lot of places to eat without a car but that is not a big deal for me. Had a really good experience there, would stay again and recommend it for families especially given its proximity to Disney and free breakfasts.
Manager Response: ProMetalSales,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel prides itself on providing our guests with a superb guest experience.
