For restaurants and shops, Downtown Disney is also a short walk away, so our guests can take advantage of our proximity to Disneyland! On behalf of all our staff, we are thrilled to hear we upheld our commitment to providing you with a great overall guest experience. Once again thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you in the near future!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We were very impressed with the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate from the moment we checked in until the moment we checked out!  The girl (I wish I knew her name!) was so friendly and helpful when we arrived, and after discovering our room didn't have a bathtub, she immediately found one with a tub and switched our room no problem.  The room itself was huge, with two queen beds, a separate sitting area, and a small counter area with a fridge and microwave.  Everything was immaculate and in good working order.  There were lots of plugs for charging electronics. The free Wifi worked well in our room.  The breakfast was great, with a few hot items, and plenty of typical continental type breakfast items.  There was always plenty of room for guests to find a table.  We used the
Manager Response: Lynn D,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is perfectly located only a short walk away from Downtown Disney and the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can hop aboard the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it to the main entrance. Another great option our guests utilize when getting to Disneyland is the ART shuttle, which for a nominal fee, will pick you up right in front of our hotel and bring you and your guests to the main entrance. Our complimentary buffet style breakfast caters to the tastes of all of our guests. We offer a wide variety of breakfast options as well as gluten free options, to ensure there are breakfast options for everyone. On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear you and your guests had a great stay! Thank you again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Optimized for Disney Access, But There's More
Summary: Location is ideal for walking to Disney properties.  There is an independent bus service that stops at the hotel every hour or so.  If the hotel is full, breakfast can be a bit crowded as well as the parking lot.  The rooms are nice, clean, and up to date.  Security is good and the staff is friendly and helpful.  Safe, microwave and refrigerator in the room, similar to other Springhill Suites locations.  There are a few restaurants in the area that deliver, in case you're not in the mood to go out.  Ball Rd is also good for access to Knott's Berry Farm.  Accessing the hotel from the East requires a U-turn but is easily manageable.
Manager Response: Mike U,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our location is ideal for guests deciding to go to the Disneyland Resort, as we are a 15-minute walk away from the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can get on the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it to the main entrance. We even provide our guests with directions right here at the front desk, just ask any of our wonderful front office associates! Another great option to get to Disneyland, if walking is not for you, is the ART shuttle. The ART shuttle picks up in front of our hotel every 20-25 minutes and will bring you and your guests to the main entrance, for a small fee. We even sell the tickets right here at the front desk as an added convenience! On behalf of all of our staff, we are delighted to hear your stay was excellent! Thanks again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you and your guests again.  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: I really liked staying there. It had great service and nice rooms. I felt very safe in that hotel and the breakfast was great. It was only a 7min walk to the Disney trams and a 15min walk to downtown Disney. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to other people.
Manager Response: Isabella B,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Our location is perfect when planning a vacation to the Disneyland resort, as we are a short walk from the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure where our guests can hop aboard the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it to the main entrance. If walking is not a plausible option for you, we do have the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel and will take our guests to the main entrance as well, for a small fee. We even sell the tickets right here at the front desk, for an added convenience. On behalf of all of our staff, we are delighted to hear you and your guests had an excellent stay with us! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: New, clean, modern hotel.  Large breakfast area that is well maintained, cleaned during breakfast rush. Breakfast items are typical cereal, muffins/breads/waffles/eggs/etc... The spinach, shredded cheese & salsa offered was a welcomed variety. We were able to view the pool/hot tub area from our room, which was great for keeping and eye (and ear) on the older kids. The ART bus picks up right in front of the hotel and tickets are available to purchase at the front desk. Front desk personnel are friendly and very accommodating.  The rooms are advertised as "spacious" which we disagreed with.  There was barely enough room for one person to walk between the bed/wall. The shower/vanity/toilet are in one room, which may be a challenge for some families.  The barn style door between the
Manager Response: MSB623,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our property prides itself on creating an all-around great guest experience that not only has our guests coming back, but also provides memories that last a lifetime! On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear we upheld our commitment to you and you guests. Our breakfast is served daily and is complimentary with your stay! We always provide different breakfast options to cater to the tastes of all our guests! Thank you again for staying with us, and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland.  Rooms are modern and clean. Rooftop pool is nice and provides a few of fireworks.  Breakfast is good but can get crowded. Customer service is the best I have experienced at a springhill. A shuttle to Disneyland would be a great addition as the walk is long for smaller children.
Manager Response: 350zr1,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor! It looks like you may have stayed at the Springhill Suites Convention Center, since we do not have a rooftop pool but it does look like they took good care of you and your family. If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!   Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This hotel is great for families. It has a great breakfast in the lobby. However, if you are going to Disneyland and plan to walk this place is not on the closest road. It's a "good" walk to the parks. We took the shuttle on day 2 because our daughter was tired for the walking. The rooms were clean and modern.
Manager Response: mercypharmd,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Thank you again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The hotel and everything associated with it is 5 stars all the way.  I had to give it an overall 4 stars though because of location.  I'll explain.  The hotel has everything a family, a couple, or someone staying for business would need.  Excellent customer service, rooms were clean, roomy and well appointed.  There's a pool, free breakfast, exercise room, and everything looks great.  My hesitation on a 5 star rating is based the location of the hotel, just north of the Disneyland Resort. While you are at the hotel it is quiet, peaceful, not a lot of traffic passing by.  For those who like to get away from the Disney madness, this is a good thing. The walk did take awhile each day, and this is coming from someone who walks and runs a lot.  You walk a couple of blocks to the cast

Summary: Location is nice. The front desk officers are extremely friendly and helpful , specially Cindy. No valet and no room service. Rooms are clean. I would say the hotel is perfect for families with young kids . Complementary breakfast is offered daily.

We cater to all of our guestsâ€™ individual tastes, even providing gluten free options, ensuring our guests needs and tastes are met. Thank you so much for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: I haven't stayed in hotels for several years due to a fear of contracting stowaway insects. When I had to make good on a promise to take my daughter to a Disney Park,  I found this hotel through Trip Advisor. I take other other people's reviews seriously.  The rooms are well-designed, with marble counters where you can store your luggage. In addition, the linens are all-white, so that you can inspect them for any potential problems. Some aspects of the room are a little worn, like the wallpaper and grout in the shower. Overall, it was a pleasant experience. I decided to pay a bit more for a hotel room in hopes of avoiding some issues that have been written about other facilities.  It is close to CVS and Walgreens, so you can get supplies at reasonable prices. It is an easy to

If you happen to read this TripAdvisor response, feel free to write a review on their property! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give our hotel a try and stay with us!   Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Stayed here for Disneyland Half Marathon...perfect!
Summary: We live fifteen minutes from Disneyland.  But for the Half Marathon, which starts at 5:30am, you have to be at Disneyland, if you are driving in, you have to be there really early.  We have run in this race most of the last eleven years.  In 2015 while trying to make our way into the parking lot, the traffic was horrible and we drove by this hotel and I said to myself, "Next year, we are staying there."  This year we did.  It made such a difference for us on race day.  It is around a fifteen minute walk to the Disneyland Hotel, which was very convenient.  The room was large with two queen or king sized beds and a sofa bed.  There was a desk, refrigerator and microwave.  Unlike another Spring Hill Suites I stayed in recently, there was a chest of drawers and ample space in the

Summary: I totally enjoyed staying at this hotel. It is about 15-18 minutes walk from Disneyland. I didn't walk because of my babies, but I saw a lot of people leaving and returning to the hotel on foot.  Here are things I loved about this hotel: 1. It has a CVS right next to it 2. The breakfast was delicious. Without doubt, they need to keep that chef. My kids really enjoyed the food. 3. It is close to the roadside, but we did not hear any noise from our room. We booked a room facing the convention center. 4. Customer service was awesome.  What i did not like 1. The bathroom design did not work for me. Am just being picky here.  Overall, it was a great experience. I recommend this hotel.

Summary: This hotel is fantastic..we were greeted warmly by Tyler when we checked in..our room was beautiful, beds comfortable..perfect .The complimentary breakfast was much appreciated and delicious..everyone was so friendly..if we come to Anaheim again ..we will stay at Springhill Maingate on Ball Road! The pool was lovely too!

Summary: If there hadn't been hair in my shower,  they would have gotten a great rating. The staff was wonderful and the breakfast had a lot of options. I reached out to the front desk and they offered to move me,  but I'd already unpacked and was very tired so I asked them to send someone up to clean the bathroom. They were there right away and very apologetic.
Manager Response: Hello Chantel P, Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim and for sharing your feedback with us here on TripAdvisor. Iâ€™m glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast in the morning and that my staff treated you well. Iâ€™m very sorry to hear about the issue you had with housekeeping. We pride ourselves on maintain an exceptionally clean hotel, but have fallen short in this instance. I have shared your comments with our housekeeping Team to ensure this was an isolated incident and corrected moving forward. I hope that you enjoyed your time in Anaheim and thank you again for sharing your feedback. We hope to have you come back and stay with us again next time your travels bring you to the area. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a great location: 5 minutes from Disneyland Parks by bus and a 10 minute walk from Downtown Disney. The rooms are very clean and spacious. The usual sofa bed for an extra bed but everywhere seems to do that. The staff are polite and helpful. Breakfast is buffet style but with the added bonus of a waffle making machine which our 9yr old adored! It gets busy but we all want to get going  at the same time so no surprise. I can't get my head around disposable plates and cutlery - seems very Eco unfriendly to me but I guess they have their reasons. Swimming pool and spa are a great addition especially after a hard day's rollercoastering at the House of Mouse
Manager Response: Becky F,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our hotel is perfectly situated only a short walk from Downtown Disney and the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure, where you can ride the complimentary Disneyland tram right up to the main entrance. For a small fee, the ART shuttle picks up right in front of our hotel and takes you right up to main entrance, and to make it easier for our guests, we even sell tickets right here at the front desk. Our breakfast caters to all of our guestsâ€™ tastes. We offer gluten free options, as well as a wide variety of breakfast options to make sure all of our guestsâ€™ individual tastes are met! Once again, thank you so much for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great family hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: This is a great place to stay if you are going to Disneyland. The hotel is clean and the room slept five people comfortably. They have a great breakfast. The only complaint was the bathroom was in an odd spot and it had a glass door so when someone went to the bathroom it woke people up.

Summary: Good clean and quiet hotel close to Disneyland only 5$ for a unlimited bus ticket each day that drops you off rite out front I would stay hear again  we went early to catch all the rides while they weren't as busy then went home for a rest and went back at night

Summary: stayed for four nights really good location,opposite Disney park,able to enter park without going in to actual park.cinema,food places all available from this area.the hotel and facilities were all good.

Summary: We enjoyed staying here for 4 nights during our Disneyland Vacation.  It is on Ball Road close to the Mickey and Friends parking garage. The hotel was quiet and clean. The Continental Breakfast is hot and filling. We found options for our family members who are required to eat gluten-free. The in-room fridge and microwave were great for snacks and a mid-day meal when we didn't want to eat out. The staff is helpful and happy. The walk to Disneyland is longer then the hotels on Harbor, but the staff gave us directions to the Tram at the Mickey and Friends Parking Garage which worked great for us. We enjoyed our stay and our children set their hotel standards by Springhill Suites now.

Summary Heading: This Springhill Suites will be one of your favorites
Summary: Springhill Suites is one of our 'go to' hotels for stays.  This particular one is by far one of our best stays ever.  You can definitely go by all the great reviews.  Every single staff member we talked to was attentive, caring, helpful. friendly, pleasant... We arrived a few hours early a took a chance to see if a room would be available.  The front desk was very accommodating and was able to get us into a room.  Lucky we know.  They were also very helpful with directions and Disney questions. Easy walk to Disney tram, very convenient location.  Room was great and loved the larger bathroom.  We will definitely return to this Springhill Suites.

Summary: We had booked reservations way in advance for the last week of July. When we arrived at Springhill Suites, we were greeted by Jimmy who manages the front desk - and yes - he is as professional, helpful and kind as everyone has said on tripadvisor. --In fact, every staff member we came in contact with was great.-- He, Jimmy, told us that our room had sprung a leak and they were overbooked. However, he could get us into the Holiday Inn next door (100 feet away!) and would comp our night. We took the room at the Holiday Inn, were able to check in early and still use the facilities at Springhill. We had wanted to stay at Springhill Suites when we were in Anaheim in February but waited too long to book the double room we needed at the time. We will definitely return to Springhill

If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give us a try and stay with us.   Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We have stayed at several Springhill Suites but this one in particular is quite impressive. The studio 2 queen bedroom is large, modern, and very clean. The housekeeping staff does a fantastic job in making our room so tidy and neat. We appreciate how they do not come knocking at 9 am to clean our room but usually comes late afternoon when we are out. We greatly appreciate their thoughtfulness and timely service!  Our two queen beds are quite comfortable; however, a little too soft for me as I prefer firmer beds. We liked the duvet on both beds iso those wool blankets found in some hotels.  A big thank you to Mr. Buettner who ensured our room on the top floor (4th) corner room had a spectacular fire works view! (Room 420) The only minor caveat is that the room is directly across

Summary: Beautiful hotel, clean, professional and courteous staff.  Very helpful with questions.  I was a bit leery because people on the TA forum page said the hotel was not walkable to the Disneyland tram.  It absolute was.  I'm a WDW veteran and the walk from our room to the tram for DL was quicker and shorter than walks I've had from my room at a WDW resort to the bus stop.  Warning, there are not a ton of people walking and it is down the sidewalk of a boulevard but we had no issues at all.  If I had little kids walking, I may have been a bit nervous walking down the road but there is an ART bus that picks up for a fee right in front of the hotel.

Summary: We chose this hotel because of relatively low parking fees ($14) and the inclusion of free breakfast.  (ironically only one person took advantage of the buffet) The buffet is typical of any hotel sausage and eggs, cereal oatmeal etc. Nothing Fancy.  They got excellent angles of the "market" which is just a little corner next to the front desk, and the gym which is just a hallway sized room. They say you can walk to Disneyland from the hotel and will provide you with directions. We didn't go because of time constraints. (Average age of our group was over 20 years old so we went to Universal instead) Be aware because of the proximity to disney there will be a lot of kids. Kids going down the elevator to the pool, kids running in the halls, kids cutting in line at breakfast. We

Summary: We (myself, wife, son) stayed here on a recent vacation to Disneyland/California Adventure. This is a newer property located about 2-3 blocks from Disney, on Ball and Walnut (streets that are not near as crowded as Harbor or Katella). You can take the shuttle ($5 per person) or just walk (either thru the Disney parking garage or down the back way on Walnut to Downtown Disney. Only about 10-13 minutes either way). Quiet, well maintained property. Nice pool and spa with towels by the pool.  It can get a bit crowded for breakfast but there was always places to sit and they did a very good job of keeping all the food choices available. You can also watch the fireworks at night from Disneyland from the hotels patio and fire pit outside.  Hotel parking is $14 a day (which is now very

Summary Heading: "AS CLOSE TO DISNEY WITHOUT PAY A HEFTY PRICE"
Summary: Springhill Suites is the place to go while going to Disneyland and is located 2 blocks from the main gate to Disneyland.The rooms were spacious and clean and the staff was excellent. The morning breakfast buffet was a zoo but worth it if your on the go and theres ample parking ($14.00) per day. If your thinking about taking the shuttle to Disney forget about it!They use an outside company for a fee of $5.00 per person to go a 1/2 mile into the park.....Take your own car and pay $18.00 for parking at Disney and make sure you leave early to go to park because the lines are long. Nice Hotel overall and great price with nice spacious rooms.

We are always trying to perfect every aspect of our guestsâ€™ stay, and are always striving to be the industry leader when it comes to the overall guest experience. Our hotel is a great fit whether you are heading to Disneyland or here for business as our brand caters to a wide variety of guests! We are only a short distance from the Disneyland resort, so are guests can either walk if they want to enjoy the beautiful California sun or take the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel, for a small nominal fee. Our front desk staff has directions for our guests that want to get outdoors and walk and if the ART shuttle is a better option for you, we have a detailed description of the ART shuttle service, and sell tickets right here at the front desk for your convenience! Our breakfast aims to cater to our guestsâ€™ individual tastes and we offer a wide variety of breakfast options that no matter what your food preference may be, will cater to you. Thank you so much for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: We recently stayed here (Jul 28-Aug 1) and really, really enjoyed our stay. The rooms are fantastic with bunk beds for kids, modern, and clean. We loved the rooftop pool/lounge - yes you can see the fireworks from the roof. Also every one of the staff were friendly and cheerful - these folks are working hard for our business and it shows!  Good breakfast buffet options - get there early as it can get really busy. 10 minute walk to the parks (with a 5 year old) made coming back to the hotel to escape the mid-afternoon heat and crowds very easy for us.
Manager Response: charlenedfell,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor. It looks like you stayed at the other Springhill Suites that is fairly close to us! We do have a pool, but it is located on the first floor, not the rooftop. In addition, we do not offer bunk beds inside our rooms at this location as they do at the Springhill Suites Convention Center. If you happen to read this response, please feel free to write a review for the Springhill Suites Convention Center because it looks as though they did a great job of taking care of you and your guests! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you give us a try and stay with us.  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Location was excellent for us. Complimentary Hot Breakfast each morning. Room was laid out nicely for 2 adults and a 10 year old. Beds were very comfortable. Bathroom was well lit with lots of room by the sink. The shower was one of the best hotel showers we have had. The outdoor swimming pool was not over crowded. Lots of supplied towels at the pool. Front Desk Staff were all very friendly, informative and accommodating. Shuttle Bus (ART) for a minor fee stops at front door and drops at the entrance to the parks. The fee allows on and off privileges all day. We would definitely stay here again when visting the area.
Manager Response: Derek E,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our hotel is perfectly located only a short distance away from the Mickey's and Friends Parking structure, where you can take the complimentary Disney tram right to the main entrance, and Downtown Disney. We even offer directions right at the front desk if you need them! Another great option to getting to and from Disneyland is the ART shuttle, which will pick you up right in front of our hotel and take you to Disneyland, for only a small fee. Our breakfast caters to all of our guests, but giving our guests lots of different food options as well as gluten free options. Our hotel is always striving to give our guests the utmost best guest experience that will have them coming back, and giving them memories that will last a lifetime. On behalf of all of our staff, we are thrilled to hear we achieved our goal! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed one night here while visited Disneyland. Our room was at the corner room and it was nice and clean. Great size and comfy bed. It was a large room than i expected. We left Disneyland before fireworks but watched it at outide of hotel near fire and sat at couch. It was nice and cosy.
Manager Response: Keiko O,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! When it comes to our guests, we always strive for perfection in every aspect of their stay, and we are ecstatic to hear we accomplished our goal! Our hotel is in a perfect location for guests traveling to the Disneyland resort, as we are only a short walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure where you can hop aboard the complimentary Disneyland tram and take it straight to the main entrance. We are also located right on the ART shuttle line, which for only a small fee you can take to the main entrance as well! Thank you again for staying with us, and if you come back to the Anaheim area remember, â€œOur doors are always open.â€  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We have four kids, so fit right in at this hotel.  It is clearly popular with the Disney crowd.   There were definitely non-families here, but it felt like the teenagers, college students, and retirees were all there for Disneyland, and probably 2/3 of the people had at least 2 kids.    It's hard to give too comprehensive a review because we were rarely in the actual room (since Disney is open 16-17 hours a day), and we have not stayed at other local hotels.  It's quite possible the room deserves a five star rating compared to other local hotels given the price, so perhaps view our rating as 4+.  Here are some things we learned:  1) Unless you have many small kids, skip the hotel shuttle (which is really a city bus).  You wind up waiting for 20 minutes and you get there about
Manager Response: Jasper_Walker,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! We always strive for guest service excellence in every aspect of your stay. On behalf of all of our staff, we are delighted to hear we achieved our goal of providing you and your guests with a memorable guest experience! Our hotel is conveniently located only a short walk away from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, from there you can take the complimentary Disney Tram right into the main entrance. Another option when traveling to Disneyland is the ART shuttle, which will take you to Disneyland for a small fee. Our breakfast is a great amenity for all our guests. We offer a wide variety of food including gluten free options, so we can cater to the tastes of all of our guests! Thank you again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: As a business traveler I stay in many hotels, and frankly, after a while they all seem the same.  Not this hotel.  From the moment I checked in to the moment I checked out the front desk staff were, helpful, attentive and friendly.  No request was too big or too small.  They went out of their way to make my stay pleasant, comfortable, and for a business traveler....even fun!  The suites were exceptionally spacious, the hi speed internet was always reliable and I appreciated the microwave and coffee-maker in the suite.  The work area was separated from the sleeping area, which made it a bit cozier and more like home.  Breakfast in the morning was adequate, although, staying during the summer, there were lots of families and a bit of a line up for breakfast.  Always a hot
Manager Response: Kicia60,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel! Here at the Springhill Suites, we are always striving for perfection and delivering that industry-leading guest experience that has our guests coming back time after time! On behalf of all of our staff, we are all thrilled to hear that we upheld our commitment to giving you and your guests that guest service excellence. Our breakfast is always a huge hit with our guests, as we offer different breakfast varieties for all of our different individual guestsâ€™ tastes, as well as gluten free offerings. Thank you for staying with us, if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Stayed back in December of last year for our trip to Disneyland. Fabulous room (although I would have preferred a higher floor and theme park view instead of right over the entrance to the hotel). We were able to a pre-check in and leave our luggage with the front desk so we could walk to a nearby place and get lunch. And the front desk clerk called us when the room was ready (right when we sat down to eat, so less than 15 minutes from the time we left). We did have to request extra towels every day, but that's not a huge deal to me. I was a little worried about breakfast every morning with everyone going down at the same time to eat before hitting the theme parks, but it worked out nicely. Slightly disappointed that there weren't more laundry rooms (just one, on the top floor
Manager Response: Senaci,  Thank you for writing us a review on TripAdvisor. It looks like you stayed at the other Springhill Suites that is fairly close to us! We do have a laundry facility, but it is located on the first floor, not the top floor. In addition, we do not offer valet service at this location as they do at the Springhill Suites Convention Center. If you happen to read this response, please feel free to write a review for the Springhill Suites Convention Center because it looks as though they did a superb job of taking care of you and your guests! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us.  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here for disney.  This was our second stay.  Way cheaper than a disney hotel but still a little pricey.  But the price can be seen when you get to the room.  Lots of space.  Pull out couch bed if you have extra people.  Bathroom is very nice.  Beds are comfy.  Pool is small but good.  Small fitness center with cardio and little bit of free weights.  Walking distance to disney or you can buy a bus Pass from the hotel.  Bus pickups in the parking lot of the hotel.  Bus runs every 20 minutes until 30 minutes after park close.   If you drive here you will pay for parking per night.  It's 14 dollars a night.   The continental breakfast is probably the best one out there.  They got eggs bacon biscuits gravy and then everything every other continental has.   I will book here
Manager Response: 327kevanm,  Thank you for writing an honest review on our property! Here at the Springhill Suites, we always strive for excellence and we are ecstatic to hear we accomplished our goal of providing a superb guest experience to you and your guests! Our hotel is only a short walk from the Mickey and Friends Parking structure; from there you can hop aboard the complimentary Disney tram and go to the main entrance. In addition, we are on the ART shuttle line, which for only a small fee, you can take to the main entrance. Our buffet style breakfast caters to all of our guests tastes and we offer gluten free options as well. Thank you once again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, remember, â€œOur doors are always open.â€  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This hotel was really nice and the rooms were brilliant. The only thing I would say is that it is more of a hotel for families rather than couples. Its located 10 minutes from disneyland so all the restaurants and bars are mainly aimed at families. We felt the staff at the hotel were good but there was one memberof staff who seemed to really try to push us into buying tours etc. I dont know if she was working on commission or not but we didnt really like how everytime we wanted advice on something she would always try and sell us something and it usually was the most expensive thing. The other members of staff we not like this. That being said, there was a gentleman called tyler who worked on the front desk and he was so friendly and helpful, he really made our stay alot more
Manager Response: Rajgogna123,  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Here at the Springhill Suites we always strive for excellence and giving our guests the memories and experiences that have them coming back time after time. On behalf of our staff, I apologize for feeling as if you were pushed into booking a tour; we just love to give our guests as many options as possible when coming to the Southern California area, so you can get the very most out of your trip! Thank you for staying with us, if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: I must say, this hotel far exceeded our expectations. It was very easy to find and had ample parking. The rooms were very clean, comfortable beds, and great bathroom set up. The sitting room was well positioned and provided some work privacy. It was our best Disney stay to date!
Manager Response: Stevespock,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on our hotel! Our staff always strives for excellence and we are thrilled to hear we met our goal of providing you and your family with a superior guest satisfaction experience! If your travels bring you and your family back to the Anaheim resort area, just remember, â€œOur doors are always openâ€ and we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This is a terrific hotel. Close to Disneyland. Couldn't do better. Wonderful staff, great value. Marriott is always good. This hotel is wonderful. Helpful, great breakfast. Staff recommendations were all excellent. Breakfast staff handled large numbers easily, keeping food plentiful.
Manager Response: Dbraden8,  Thank you writing a review on our property. Our staff prides itself on delivering the industry leading guest satisfaction that has our guests returning! Our location is only a short walk from the Disneyland resort and we do offer the ART shuttle that stops right in front of our hotel, for only a nominal fee, when looking to get to Disneyland. Our breakfast has many different varieties and gluten free options to satisfy all of our guestsâ€™ tastes.  On behalf of all of our staff, we are ecstatic to hear you had a great stay, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This is literally a right turn from parking for DisneyLand. We loved the closeness of everything and the big spacious rooms, bathroom, and walk in closet. I was meh about the air unit but turned out great. Also, breakfast was decent, nothing to write home about but perfect for quickly getting up and gone in the mornings. Everything was clean and housekeeping was stellar!
Manager Response: Staci B,  Thank you for writing an honest review about our hotel! Our proximity to Disneyland and Downtown Disney is a huge factor to our guests. We are only a 10-12 minute walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure and only a15 minute walk away from Downtown Disney, when you are looking to walk to the Disneyland Resort. Another option is the ART shuttle that picks up every 20 to 25 minutes right in front of our hotel, and for a small fee, our guests can take this straight to the main entrance. On behalf of all of our staff, we are delighted to hear your stay was memorable and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The room was great. The staff was super friendly. It was a nice short 10 minute walk to Disneyland and friends parking tram. The only downside was the breakfast wasn't as good I would have wished. We definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Foster L,  Thank you for writing a review about our hotel! We always aim to deliver a superior guest experience from the time you check in to the time you check out. Our hotel is located a quick walk from Downtown Disney and the big Mickeyâ€™s and Friends parking structure tram, we even provide a detailed map at the front desk if you need one! We are delighted to hear that we upheld our commitment to delivering a superior guest experience to you and your family! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate 5/14-5/19 for our family Disney vacation.  We did purchase the costco package that includes hotel, park tickets, and a few other great perks.  The Hotel meeted all of our expectations.  The staff was extremely friendly, and imformative.  Our room was spacious for a family of 4, super clean, had nice paul mitchell products, microwave, fridge, and comfy beds.  We also had an awesome view of the fireworks!!  The breakfast was great!!!  We filled up before visiting the parks which saved us a lot!!  The breakfast included bacon or sausage, eggs, fruit,  yogurt, oatmeal with toppings, and waffles which we smothered with nutella and bananas... yum!   We walked to the disney tram which took 5-10 min... we noticed other guests just cutting
Manager Response: Hollie G,  Thank you so much for writing an honest review on our property! Our hotel prides itself on our superior guest service and experience! Complimentary with your stay is our buffet style breakfast that meets all of our guestsâ€™ individual tastes. The complimentary Disney tram is a great option to getting to Disneyland! We offer a map here at the front desk and with only a short walk to the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure, our guests can ride the Disneyland tram right into the main entrance. Thank you so much for staying with us, and if your travels bring you to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you!  Warmest Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The room that I am in is great! It's big enough for all 3 of us. The only  negative Thing that I have to say is that they use plastic for everything. Plastic cutlery, plastic bowls, this is the only place that we have stayed at so not sure about anywhere else?  Also I am disabled and need to use a wheelchair. Breakfast gets pretty hectic, but I guess the main reason for that is Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hello mel_wilson,  Thank you so much for staying at our hotel on your recent trip to Anaheim. Iâ€™m glad to hear that the room worked out great for you and the rest of your party and that you had plenty of room for all 4 of you. Iâ€™m sorry that the breakfast was difficult to navigate for you and yes it does get rather busy in the mornings with everyone trying to get ready before heading over to Disneyland. We would always be happy to assist you if needed help getting some breakfast and a good start to your day! Thank you again for staying with us, I hope you enjoyed your time in Anaheim and that youâ€™ll come back and stay with us again next time you are in the area. Thank you. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: The best thing I can say about our room was that it was clean.  The bed was not comfortable.  There was no balcony.  The fridge was the smallest mini fridge I have had in a room ever with no freezer.  There was only a shower no tub in our room for three kids.  I may have been able to overlook the room because we were there for Disneyland but the complimentary breakfast was terrible.  It was the worst breakfast I have ever seen in a hotel.  And the shuttle to Disneyland that they say runs every 20 minutes actually runs every 20-60 minutes.  Even at that in the evening one night we waited 30 minutes for the shuttle and then there was not enough room for everyone so we had to wait an additional 45 minutes for another one.  Over an hour at night with 3 kids waiting for a shuttle is
Manager Response: Hello reyamarieg,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Disneyland and for sharing your feedback with us here. Iâ€™m sorry that our rooms did not meet your expectations, unfortunately none of rooms have the balcony you wanted so we were not able to meet that request for you. We do have a large portion of rooms that do have the tub shower combination though, I apologize that you did not get one of those rooms. If you notify us when you are making the reservation we can always add that as a request to prioritize getting you a room with a tub for the little ones. I was disappointed to hear that were issues with the ART shuttle during your stay with us, I will certainly be sharing your comments with the companyâ€™s dispatch team. While the ART shuttle is city run transportation and we do not have control over the timeliness of their schedule, they are a partner of ours and I realize how frustrating it can be to our guests when it is not running on time. I do hope that you and your family were able to enjoy your time in the Parks and hope that if you ever come back to Anaheim that youâ€™ll give us another shot at making your stay enjoyable. If I can be of any assistance in the future please feel free to contact me directly. Thank you.  Sincerely, Darrell Buettner  General Manager

Summary: The rooms are very nice with plenty of power points available, really super service all the staff were more then helpful. Wonderful breakfast buffet available good variety   The hotel is a walkable distance to Disney land and down town Disney
Manager Response: Kasspper,  Thank you for writing an honest review on our property! Our hotel is always aiming to achieve our goal of delivering a superior guest experience the second our guests walk in the door! On behalf of our entire staff, we are delighted to hear we achieved our goal on delivering a superb guest experience to you and your family. Our complimentary buffet style breakfast always provides our guests with a wide range of food offerings, to cater to each individual guest, because we understand that no two guests are alike! Our unique location gives our guests multiple options when traveling to and from the Disneyland resort. The first option is to walk a short distance to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking Structure, then take the complimentary Disneyland tram right to the Maingate, and just ask any of our front desk staff for directions and we have those available for you! Another option, if our guests didnâ€™t want to walk, would be to take the ART shuttle. For a small fee, the ART shuttle picks up and drops off right in front of our hotel every 20-25 minutes starting an hour and half before the first park opens all the way up until 30 minutes after the last park closes for your convenience. If this option fits you and your family, we have tickets available for sale right here at the front desk! Once again, thank you tremendously for staying with us if you come back to the Anaheim area, â€œour doors are always openâ€ and we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse

Summary Heading: Great room, friendly staff, but VERY chaotic and NOISY
Summary: We really loved our room.  It was spacious, well laid-out, and had all the amenities we wanted.  The bed was reasonably comfortable, but not the best we've experienced.  The front desk and breakfast staffs were friendly and professional.    Perhaps I shouldn't have been surprised due to the proximity to Disneyland (it's close enough to walk there, by the way), but it was TERRIBLY noisy, with children and teenagers coming, going, and playing in the halls all night (and I mean ALL night).  This made it difficult to sleep.    They have convenience items for sale at the front desk, but they were prohibitively overpriced.  There is a Shell station convenience store nearby which was also overpriced, but with a much larger selection of items to purchase.
Manager Response: TennTexTommy,  Thank you so much for writing a review on our hotel! Our hotel is only a quick walk or shuttle ride away from the Disneyland resort. Our guests usually choose between walking to the Mickey and Friends Parking Structure or by taking the convenient ART shuttle. The parking structure is only short walk from our hotel, and is where our guests hop onto the complimentary Disneyland tram and ride it to the main entrance, and we even provide a map at the front desk! Another option is the ART shuttle, which for a nominal fee will take you to and from Disneyland. On behalf of all of our staff, we are happy you and your family stayed with us! If your travels bring you or your family back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!   Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here and walked to. Disneyland. The room was spacious and luxurious. The beds were comfortable with sparkling white linens. We would definitely stay again.  Good free breakfast.  The sofa in the suite was very nice and made into a bed. There were two flat screen televisions, microwave, frig and coffeemaker. There was a parking garage.
Manager Response: Jill B,  Thank you so much for writing a review on our property! Our property is conveniently located only a short walk from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking structure where our guests can take the complimentary tram right to the main entrance or go to Downtown Disney, where there is lots of entertainment offerings and dining options! Our staff goes out of the way to make sure our guests get that â€œhome away from home" feel and we are tremendously glad that we achieved our goal of providing a superb guest satisfaction experience! Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, like we always say, "our doors are always open!"  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We first visited this hotel right after it opened and really liked it. Two years later, we came back to Disneyland and it is still a great hotel in great condition. The staff are doing a great job keeping it clean and nice. The free breakfast is still decent to fill up on before going to the parks. My only real complaint is that the pool was a little cold, but we still had fun.   Same complaint I had last time about the ART shuttle still exists. They need to put a bigger bus on this route in the morning and evening. Several times it's been jam packed. But that's not Springhill's fault. I plan to write to ART this time to complain. Hopefully enough people doing this will get them to put a bigger bus on the route.
Manager Response: Zachulaa,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write an honest review on our property! Our hotel is located only a half mile away from the Disneyland resort in which our guests can take advantage of two options when traveling to and from Disneyland. The first option is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel and for a small fee, can be used to get back and forth from Disneyland. Another option we give our guests is to walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends parking structure which is a short walk from our hotel. From there our guests can hop on the complimentary Disneyland tram and ride it to the main entrance. We even have directions right at the front desk, just ask any of our staff! Our buffet style breakfast has lots of different food varieties that everyone can enjoy. Thank you for writing a review on our property, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again.  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Tried to find the best hotel in Anaheim. I think I found it!
Summary: I have been to Disneyland many many times throughout the years. I am always searching for a nice place to stay. Knowing that my boyfriend and I were traveling with his 2 kids, ages 4 and 11, I wanted a kid-friendly place to stay with adult touches. Upon arrival, we got through check in within minutes. Super easy and we were given a room with the view of the fireworks at night. As we got in our room, we loved it from the moment we set foot inside. The kids loved the beds! So incredibly comfy and to be honest, the best beds I've experienced in a hotel. The seating area in the room was a nice touch. Good separation between a place to eat and the bedroom area! As for the bathroom, it was so large for a hotel bathroom! Nice size shower and plenty of room for the 4 of us! We also used
Manager Response: Danielle S,  Thank you so much for writing a review about our hotel. We always strive to meet our goal of delivering the best customer service experience that have our guests coming back! Our pool is always a huge hit with our guests that just want to relax and catch some sun. It is heated throughout the year to give our guests that year round pool time. Our staff is always available to assist our guests with any need they may have. We are pleased to hear when trying to extend your reservation, our staff was able to give you that customer service excellence we always strive for! On behalf of our entire staff, we are thrilled to hear that your stay was amazing and we upheld our goal to deliver excellent guest satisfaction to you and your family. Once again thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Very clean and bright. The 3rd floor in the back has a front row seat for the Disney fireworks. Enjoyed dinner delivery from one of many local restaurants (it takes about an hour from when you order). Breakfast is included and different stations minimize traffic jams.
Manager Response: Kenritak,  Thank you for writing an honest review about our property! We are glad to hear that your stay with us was great. We have many dining options that are in close proximity to our property including delivery options that will deliver right to your door! Just ask our front desk staff and we would be more than happy to assist you with these. Our complimentary buffet style breakfast caters to a wide range of our guests, and even includes gluten free options! Thank you once again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We stayed May 15th thru May 20th.  There was two adults and three kids (12, 10 and 2).  Hotel is clean and beautiful.  The rooms were perfect.  Cleaning service did an amazing job.  My kids got a kick out of the creative things they did with their stuffed animals when we returned.  We always had like 7 towels (more than we needed).  Everything was stocked back up great.  Breakfast was good and kept us full until we are a late lunch either at the park or while we were taking a break back at the hotel.    Only things that could be improved was the pool was really cold for May.  Would be nice to have it heated.  Pull out bed, though it's a nice addition, it is not comfortable to sleep on.  We just loved having the sofa with the tables to eat on.    The ART shuttle always took a
Manager Response: TaraHamblin,  Thank you so much for writing a review on our property. Our staff always accommodates all of our guests, as if they were guests in their own home. We are delighted to hear that we made your vacation a memorable one! Our breakfast always has a wide variety of food offerings available to cater to all of our guests. When looking to get to the Disneyland resort, there are a couple options we offer for our guests. First, our hotel is conveniently located along the ART shuttle line, in which for a small fee you can take to Disneyland. In addition, only a short walk from our hotel is the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends Parking structure.  We have directions at the front desk just in case you get lost! Thank you so much again for choosing to stay with us and writing a review on our property, If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We felt welcomed from the moment we arrive the staff were always very helpful.  The rooms were amazing  the facilities in the room were great - fridge, microwave, safe - beds were so comfortable and the bathroom was huge - our family who travelled with us were a family of 6 and they found the same.  The breakfast was great and a good start for your day at Disney.  Our first night we took the looong walk to Downtown Disney for a meal but found out that there is a very quick way to the disney tram to take you to the very front door of Disney just ask the staff re this ( it requires cutting through a parking garage but this is easy to negotiate)  The only problem we found it didn't have any other shops close by if you didn't have a car.  We would certainly recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: Ameriaussie2016,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on our hotel! All of our rooms come equipped with a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and safe to help our guests feel more at home and provide everyday necessities to match the needs of our guests! Our complimentary buffet style breakfast every morning caters to a wide range of tastes, even gluten free options, to ensure that we achieve our goal of â€œevery guest every time.â€ To assist our guests on traveling to and from the Disneyland resort, we provide detailed instructions on how to walk to the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends parking structure, where you can take the complimentary Disney tram to the Maingate. Another option that we provide is the ART shuttle which will pick you up right in front of our hotel approximately every 25 min or so, for only a nominal fee. Just simply ask any of our front desk staff members on which option would be better for you and we would be happy to assist you with that! Our hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk from Downtown Disney, which has multiple restaurant and shopping offerings for everyone to enjoy. But if you wanted to relax, simply ask one of our staff members about delivery options and we will provide you with different menus and let the food come to you. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about our hotel and recommending it to others! If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again. Hope to see you in the near future!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: My husband, daughter and I this past week stayed at this hotel for a disneyland vacation for 4 nights and we were definitely impressed!  The hotel is about a 20 minute walk approximately from the park but for the most part we used the ART which runs every 20-30 min. The staff was amazing! Always so attentive and smiling which was welcoming, house keeping did a great job as well and super friendly.  We are so glad we made the choice to stay here, they pay attention to detail, I called in advance to ask questions and I mentioned in small talk with the lady who answered we would be celebrating a wedding anniversary and they welcomed us with a sweet surprise on arrival. We very much enjoyed the breakfast, my daughter loved being able to make fresh waffles and the various options as
Manager Response: Irubio83,  Thank you writing an honest review of our property! Our hotel is located a short walk away the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends parking structure and is also on the ART shuttle stop, which most of our guests use to get the main entrance of Disneyland. Our staff would be more than happy to explain each option to see which one is best for you. Our hotel always strives ourselves on accommodating all of our guests, and providing exceptional customer service to all of our guests needs and we are all so glad we were able to uphold our commitment to that! We try to provide a wide range of different offerings for our complimentary breakfast. Once again, from all of our staff here at the Springhill Suites, we are delighted to hear we upheld our commitment to providing you with a superior guest experience that you will never forget! Thank you so much for writing a review on our hotel, and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, remember our doors are always open and we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: This hotel is in a great location close to Disneyland. They have a good no charge full breakfast if you want or go lightly.  We would stay here again with no problem. They offer a local shuttle service that you pay for but you really dont need to.  If you come out of the front door of the hotel you turn right and walk down to Ball Road 1st set of traffic lights and turn right for a very short walk to the entrance to the Disney staff parking lot you will see the parking structure and take the stairs up to the 1st floor and then to the front when the Disney shuttles are parked.
Manager Response: Cabo Sunshine,  Thank you for writing an honest review about our property here on TripAdvisor! Our hotel is situated only about a half mile away from the Disneyland resort and we are glad to hear you took advantage of the complimentary Disneyland tram, which is only a short walk from our hotel and we have directions available right at the front desk! Complimentary with your stay is a buffet-style breakfast which is perfect before heading out to the park. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to have you stay with us again! Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great staff, and a relaxing stay
Summary: Two adults and 2 teenagers sharing a room could be a challenge, but in this room, we had enough room to hang out.  The location is great--we walked to Downtown Disney on the day we arrived and it was a nice walk, although maybe a bit too long if you have little kids. The staff could not have been nicer! They were happy to answer questions and give directions.  No complaints!
Manager Response: Steelcitycampbells,  Thank you writing a review about our hotel! Our staff is very knowledgeable about the Anaheim area and tries to accommodate our guests in every way possible. At the front desk, we have visual directions on how to walk to the Disneyland resort, as well as local food offerings in the surrounding area. Our hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to Downtown Disney, which a lot of our guests prefer to do. We also do offer the ART shuttle which stops right in front of our hotel every 25 min or so. For a nominal fee, you can take the shuttle to and from the Disneyland resort, and tickets are conveniently sold right at the front desk!  Again, thank you for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area, our doors are always open!  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary Heading: Disneyland is just a hop and a skip away...
Summary: The facility was extra clean and the staff was so helpful, informative and knowledgeable. The breakfast buffet was a nice and a welcome perk. The proximity of the hotel to Disneyland is very convenient. A pleasant experience.
Manager Response: MichaeleV796LR,  Thank you so much for writing an honest review about our property! We are glad to hear your experience with us was great! Our buffet style breakfast is big with our guests. Every morning we have a waffle bar, cereal, toast, eggs, etc. as well as gluten free options available to all of our guests. Our hotel is only a 10-12 minute walk away from the Mickeyâ€™s and Friends parking structure which is where a lot of our guests hop onto the Disneyland tram to enter to the park, with maps available at the front desk. We are also on the ART shuttle line, in which for a nominal fee our guests can go straight from our hotel to the main entrance and back. Again, thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: The location is a short walk to Disney and the Convention Center.  Lots of eateries also within walking distance.  We were there during spring break while a high school and collegiate dance competition was going on at the Convention Center and the hotel was busy.  The free buffet breakfast, which offered ample selection, was the only time we felt the crowded.  The bar off the lobby is convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room sizes are more than adequate, there were 8 of us including 4 adults and one toddler. Two queen suites were a perfect fit. Breakfast very popular for the children and as a gluten free eater myself I was satisfied. Walk to friends of Disney tram was no trouble for the almost 3 year old either. A couple of the adults enjoyed the walk right from downtown Disney to the hotel as well. Overall a great place to stay. The pool was popular too.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Overpriced even for Disneyland area. Terrible breakfast.
Summary: First, the good - the daily room cleaning was excellent. Every day when we came back to the room it was clean and they even arranged the children's "stuffies" on the couch in a cute, fun way. Nice touch, housekeeping staff! They only had one recurring problem (see below).  That was about it for the good. While it is a bright and shiny new hotel with a modern design, like everything in life the truth lies in the details.  First, these are not suites. Nothing like a suite. At all. Not sure how or why they wanted to call it that. A bit cramped as well.  Next, and this is just a personal pet peeve but you have to pay for high speed Wi-Fi. They provide a basic Wi-Fi for free but my tests showed it running at under 1MB. Not a huge problem if you are only checking email but potential
Manager Response: Hello VallGray, Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim and for sharing your honest feedback with us here on TripAdvisor. Iâ€™m glad that you enjoyed the special touches that my housekeeping staff prepared for your children each day when cleaning your room, but sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your overall stay at my hotel. I have shared your comments with our entire Team at the hotel. We strive to provide a memorable experience for each of our guests and have unfortunately fallen short in this instance. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us so that we can improve in these areas and provide a more positive experience for all of our guests in the future. I hope to have the opportunity to have you as a guest again in the future so that we can earn your loyalty again. Please feel free to contact me directly if I can assist you in any way. Thank you.  Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: SpringHill Suites is hit or miss -- I've stayed in some that were very good, and some that were so-so. The only reason I'm giving it 3 stars instead of 2 stars is because all the staff members I interacted with were very pleasant and helpful.  We stayed for 2 nights. We surprised our 3 youngest kids on the way to watch our oldest graduate from college with Disneyland day ... When I made the reservation, I was looking for inexpensive and close to Disneyland where the hotel also offered a shuttle. So they met that criteria.   The room was very cramped. Yes, we had 5 people (2 adults, 2 teens, 1 child) in the room, but even if it was just me, it would have been cramped. The bathroom was long and narrow with a glass door -- so if anyone got up in the middle of the night to use the
Manager Response: Hello Allison B, Thank you for choosing our hotel or your recent trip to Disneyland and for sharing your feedback with us here on TripAdvisor. I hope that you and your family enjoyed your time in the Parks and Iâ€™m happy to hear that you found our staff here at the hotel to pleasant and helpful. I apologize that our breakfast did not meet your satisfaction, we certainly do our best to keep up in the mornings when the rush happens. Iâ€™m sorry to hear that you had to wait for items to be replenished and long lines for the waffles, I know that can be frustrating while trying to get out to enjoy your day. We will share your comments with the Team to see how we can improve these areas in the future. Please share our congratulations with your oldest on graduating from college! I hope that youâ€™ll come back and stay with us again next time your travels bring you to Anaheim. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: We brought the family here for a very special 4th birthday celebration for our granddaughter. The room was perfect and the staff left a lovely gift (including a personalized birthday garland, stuffed Dumbo toy, balloons, and bag of treats) in the room. I would absolutely stay here again and I would recommend it if you want a great place to stay close to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Sheri W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. We try to accommodate the needs of all of our guests, as the saying goes, â€œevery guest every timeâ€. We are so happy to hear that you chose to stay with us here at the Springhill Suites for your granddaughterâ€™s wonderful 4th birthday celebration. We are excited to hear that you and your family loved the extra touch we added to the room for your Granddaughterâ€™s birthday! Again, thank you so much for staying with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate

Summary: I am still on my vacation. We just starting anyways. 2 more nights in the king room not a good room for a stay with little ones no tub. My first complainant. Second don't let it foul u not close 2 any place 2 eat.didn't rent a car because they all charge u 2 park so I got the ark pass. Anyways we got in and 2 this hotel kinda late and we were hungry. Let's just It's a 25 min walk 2 any food places. Not happy at all. If I ever come back won't b staying here.
Manager Response: Dear badbabygirl2004,  Thank you for staying with us on your visit to Anaheim, I hope that you are enjoying your vacation here in the city. Iâ€™m sorry to hear our king room is not accommodating your familyâ€™s needs. While all of our king rooms do have the shower enclosure only, a majority of rooms with 2 queen beds do have the shower/tub combination that are better suited for families with small children. If you would like inquire about transferring to one of those rooms for the remainder of your stay, please contact the Front Desk and weâ€™d be happy to assist you. For dining options, we are just a short 10 minute walk to entrance to Downtown Disney that offers a variety of dining options and have a number of menus available at the Front Desk for local restaurants that deliver to our hotel should you not want to go out. If you would like any recommendations, my staff would be happy to provide those for you. I hope that you enjoy the rest of your vacation with us, if there is anything that I can do to assist you please feel free to contact me directly. Thank you. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: What a gorgeous hotel!  Perfect location near Disneyland, in walking distance.  Excellent staff that are knowledgeable about the area and events.  Great breakfast, spacious rooms.  This is one of my favorite hotels and locations!  I definitely will return!
Manager Response: Dear mindih723,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review about our property! Our great location puts us a short walk or a simple shuttle ride away from Disneyland, which our guests take advantage of. If you are wanting to see which option is best for you and your family, we can explain them both to you right here at the front desk. Our staff prides themselves on being very knowledgeable about the Anaheim area and to be very welcoming to all of our guests. We are pleased that our staff accommodated and answered any questions you had. With so many hotels located here in the Anaheim resort area, we are ecstatic to hear that we are one of your favorite hotels! Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, remember our doors are always open and we would love to accommodate you again!   Best Wishes, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Great hotel for a large family visit.  The staff put all three of our rooms in close proximity to each other as we requested.  Upon arrival, the front desk also indicated that she was able to give us each a view of the evening firework show.  I didn't think we would need the view but I was grateful for the gesture.  Turns out...the view was perfect for some very tired kiddos.    A word of caution with the location of the hotel.  I am not sure how fast the other reviewers walk, but anything short of a sprint would not get you to Disneyland in 10-15 minutes!  It takes about 30 minutes to walk to Disneyland's main gate.  These other reviewers must be counting time to Downtown Disney (a great destination, but it is not the Park!).  There are two shuttle options: First, you can pay
Manager Response: TB0042016, Thank you for writing a review about our hotel! Here at the Springhill Suites we try to accommodate all of our guestsâ€™ needs and try our very best to do so. Glad to hear that our staff was able to accomplish this and put your rooms in close proximity to each other. Some of our rooms do face the Disneyland Resort and have a superb view of the firework show. Happy to hear that even though your family wasnâ€™t expecting to watch them from your room but at Disneyland, it was always an option for you. Our hotel is located a short walk away from Downtown Disney and also the parking structure. We have directions and a walking map available at the front desk for all of our guests, if you would like to use this option to get to Disneyland. Also, another option would be the ART shuttle which services all the Anaheim resort hotels and for a nominal fee you would be able to hop on the shuttle in front of our hotel and take it directly to Disneyland. Thank you once again for reviewing our hotel and if you and your family come back to the Anaheim area, we would be thrilled if you stayed with us again.   Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Springhill Suites is a very nice stay near the entrance to Disneyland.  There is a Disneyland tram nearby on the opposite side of the Disneyland parking garage. It requires one to walk about 1/2 mile to get to the tram.  We used that option and it worked well.   The hotel is clean and modernized.  The rooms are quiet and the beds are comfy.  The bathrooms are spacious, also.  We will put this hotel at the top of our list if we don't stay at a Disney hotel next year.
Manager Response: Hello Michael V,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about our property! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed staying with us. Our guests have a couple options when needing to get to the Disneyland Resort. One option is the ART shuttle, which picks up right in front of our hotel approximately every 30 minutes for a nominal fee per person. Another option is to walk to the Disneyland tram, which is conveniently located behind our property. At the front desk, we do provide a map with directions and it is about a 10-15 minute walk right from our property. We are thrilled that you took advantage of the tram, which is an easy option when going to the Disneyland Resort. Our staff does a tremendous job with the upkeep of the hotel, which keeps our guests coming back. Once again, thank you so much, Michael V, for staying with us here at the Springhill Suites and if your travels bring you or your family back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Warmest Regards,  Ryan  Nourse Front Office Supervisor

Summary: I recently stayed at SpringHill Suites Anaheim Maingate with my daughter and her family.  As we had five in our party I feared we would be crowded but my concerns were unfounded!  The room was large and well-appointed with a huge walk-in closet and ample drawer space.  We had a fridge and microwave too which helped with snacks for the little ones.  The pool and spa areas were large and clean and stayed open until 10 pm. We were able to walk to Disneyland within 10-15 minutes along nice shaded sidewalks and pathways.  I will most certainly stay at the Maingate again.
Manager Response: 2Travelers92308,  Thank you for writing a review of our property, the Springhill Suites. We are delighted to hear your stay with us was fantastic! Our rooms all come with ample room so everyone has enough space to move around and all come equipped with a mini fridge, microwave, as well as a coffee maker so our guests can store food and drinks. Our pool and Jacuzzi is a huge hit for all of our guests who want to just take it easy and relax either, in the afternoon sun or after an exhausting day at Disneyland. With our close proximity to Disneyland choosing to walk to Disneyland is a great option for our guests. It is a short walk from our property and we provide directions at the front desk. 2Travelers92308, thank you for staying at our property and if your travels bring you or your family back to the Anaheim resort area, we would love to accommodate you again!  Best Regards,  Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate

Summary: This hotel was very convenient and met our expectations. We stayed here primarily for Disney having toured LA a few day prior.  The room was clean and the bathroom was huge and clean as well. The only downside was the parking cost at the hotel. So the next day we walked to Disney, just a  pleasant 10 minute walk.
Manager Response: SueS_Dubai of Dubai,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us at the Springhill Suites! We are glad your stay with us met your expectations. We are delighted to hear your took advantage of walking from our location to Disneyland which is only a short walk away. We also have the ART shuttle which picks up in front of our hotel for a nominal fee that will take you back and forth from Disneyland. We do have a small parking fee per night because of our proximity to Disneyland to ensure our guests have ample parking spaces while staying with us. Once again, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on our property and if you come back to the Anaheim area, we would love to have you stay with us again!  Warmest Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and can walk to Disney too!!!
Summary: In my last review I forgot to put that there was a fridge, coffee pot, and microwave.  Not a stove.  Great location!  Wonderful staff!!  Super breakfast!  Can walk to Disney tram!  Could print off boarding passes right in the hotel lobby!!  Pool and hot tub was wonderful!
Manager Response: Leann O,  Thank you for taking the time to write an honest review about our property! We love that we are conveniently located just a short walk away from Disneyland. Our staff always tries to accommodate our guests in every way possible and are glad that our staff accommodated you and your family. The tram is an easy option when traveling to and from Disneyland. We have directions at the front desk and will gladly assist you with those directions. We are glad you took advantage of our pool and Jacuzzi which is a guest favorite when just wanting to relax in the sun or to relax after a long day at Disneyland. Thank you once again, Leann O, for your honest review about our property and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we would love to accommodate you once again!  Best Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate

Summary Heading: Very nice option and close to Disneyland!
Summary: The Springhill Suites is a newer hotel just on the East side of Disneyland. It is very clean and well appointed. The breakfast was fine (and free). In addition, the pool is very nice. The location is fantastic! You literally walk around the block (less than 1/2 mile) and jump on the free tram which drops you off right in the middle of Downtown Disney. I was very pleased with the accommodations, location, and pleasant helpful staff! This will be our new "go to hotel" in Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hello Carrie G,  We are delighted you wrote a review on our property. Our great proximity to the Disneyland resort is a key factor when guests book our property. We are located just a short walk away from the Mickey and Friends parking structure, and even provide a map at the front desk for our guests. We love giving our guests that wow factor as they walk in the door, by keeping our property in pristine condition and have our staff that is willing to go out of their way to fulfill all of our guestsâ€™ needs. The pool and Jacuzzi are a great relaxation destination for after a long day at Disneyland, and we do provide the towels out there for our guests. Thank you once again, Carrie G, for your recent stay with us and if you come back to the Anaheim area we would love to accommodate you again!   Warmest Regards, Ryan Nourse Front Office Supervisor
