Please feel free to contact me directly if I can be of future assistance, weâ€™d love the opportunity to have you as our guest again. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. We had asked for a room to  see the fireworks and we were not disappointed. The staff was very friendly and professional, the breakfast and coffee was great. The hotel is veey clean and well kept. It is only a 12 minute walk to Disney. Love the location. You won't be disappointed. Great price for a great stay!
Manager Response: Hello ScotLass72, Thank you so much for sharing your experience here on TripAdvisor, Iâ€™m very glad to hear that you found our hotel to be a convenient location for the Disney Half Marathon. I agree we do get some pretty amazing views of the fireworks display both from some of our rooms and from our patio outside. We do only have a limited number of rooms with that view, so please be sure to request that when booking your reservation and weâ€™ll do our best to accommodate your request. I hope you had a great time at the Half Marathon and finished well, we look forward to seeing you here again for future events! Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Stay Near the Park and Experience no Crowds
Summary: I had heard and read many Pros & Cons. Now I am here to tell you the stay at this Hotel was great. They had a small store by the front desk loaded with treats to bring to Disneyland and microwave meals, which provided a couple after hour late dinner snacks. The complimentary breakfast was great - non crowded and a variety of hot and cold foods for the Young and Old. Following a fulfilling breakfast there was a Seven Minute no crowds walk to the Disneyland Tram and then off to Disneyland. At the end of the day you could set out on the patio and watch the Disney Fireworks with a better view than watching them on Main Street USA. Overall it was a great stay - I guess you could call it the perfect get-a-way from the crowds Hotel.
Manager Response: Hello steve_felice, Thank you for staying with us on recent visit to Disneyland, Iâ€™m glad that you found us to be your perfect get-a-way from the crowds! Iâ€™m happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast in the morning and the easy access to the parks during your stay. And yes, while the view of the fireworks on Main Street USA is impressive why not beat the crowds and enjoy them from the comfort of our patio while you have some snacks and cold drinks from our Market? Thank you again for choosing our hotel, we hope to see you again next time youâ€™re here in Anaheim! Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: We've stayed here on 5-6 occasions, not because of Disney, but family.   If you can't stand kids, forget it. It's a suite hotel next to Disney and there are kids everywhere. During all but one stay, this hasn't been a problem. The one time it was a bother, it was due to poor adult supervision. Kids will be kids.   Otherwise, this place has been a very good hotel that has served us well with a fine staff.
Manager Response: Rocky E Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review. It has be our pleasure to have you stay with us while you have visited family. I love to see our guests that come back over and over again. It gives me a great sense of pride to grow our Springhill Suites family. I know my staff and I look forward to many more visits.  Sincerely, Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary: Wow! This was the nicest SpringHill  Suites I ever  visited .  It looked brand new! The staff was friendly, the room large, and the free breakfast was very good .  We loved that it was a 15 minute walk to Disneyland tram center.  You can take the Disney  tram for free to the enterance. (The hotel did offer a shuttle for a nominal fee, but we did not use it).  We walked one day and drove our car the other day and it was much faster to walk.  We had two queen  beds and there was a couch, which my teenagers liked. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Angela N Thank you so much for your great review.  We really try to wow our guest and Iâ€™m glad we succeeded.  We have a lot of great amenities like the ART shuttle stop on property and complimentary breakfast, all to make our guest experience the best it can be. We invite you to stay with us on your next Disney vacation.  Sincerely  Jason Bell  Front office manager

Summary: This is one of the newer hotels in the Disneyland area and we had an absolutely fantastic stay! Very close to the park itself, even though it is within walking distance to the park, I was quite happy that this hotel had a dedicated stop on the ART line. Our room was beautiful, the queen suite worked out perfectly for 4 adults travelling together. What made it even better was our room was facing east which gave us the perfect view of the fireworks every evening from the park! Thank you to the awesome front desk agent working the evening we checked in to recommending a east facing room! Having a hot breakfast in the morning was a great bonus, helped us save money for stuff at Disneyland, only thing I would say is that a couple more hot buffet items would be nice, but still had a
Manager Response: Brad N Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your fantastic stay here at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate.  Iâ€™m glad that you liked the wonderful view of the firework. It is always a treat when you can enjoy them from your room and then easily slip into bed.   I was also delighted that you saved money by eating at our complimentary breakfast buffet.  We do have a great selection for everyone. The waffle bar is a highlight with many of our guests. I was pleased that you had such a great time with your stay with us and I invite you to come and visit us again soon.  Sincerely  Jason Bell  Front office manager

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel within walking distance to Disney
Summary: My family made a quick trip to Disneyland and enjoyed our stay.  We stayed in room 403 and it was very clean and spacious.    There were just a few things that could be better. 1. The water pressure in the shower is quite low.   2. There seems to be a minor electrical problem as we could not use several of the outlets. (e.g. the plugs nearest to the dining table did not work for us.)   Other than that, we enjoyed being able to walk to Disneyland each day.  The free breakfast is great.  There is plenty of shopping nearby as well.
Manager Response: FamilyGalCA Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay.  Iâ€™m glad you had an opportunity to go shopping and explore the local area. I hope you found everything you were looking for and if you are like me, probably more than you were looking for. The weather this time of year defiantly lends itself to exploring and Disneyland is also no exception. The crowds are less with everyone going back to school and new things to see every time I go.  I hope you had a great time with your family. However, I wanted to apologize for the water pressure and the electrical socket not working. It is important to us that all of our guests have a great stay.  I have notified our engineering staff so that they can fix these issues.  I hope on your next visit youâ€™ll stay with us again.   Sincerely, Jason Bell

Summary: The hotel is near everything, very clean and new.  The rooms are small considering they have 2 queen beds and a sofa bed. The small bathroom has a sliding glass door. If you turn the lights on at night, the entire room lights up. The a/c is inches from the bed so that person gets cold air blowing constantly on them while the sofa bed area is warm. Free wifi is slow. Breakfast bar is the draw here.
Manager Response: Hello Stuckinthesnowtoo, Thank you for staying with us on your recent quick trip to Disneyland, Iâ€™m glad to hear that you found our location to be convenient and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast in the mornings. Iâ€™m sorry to hear that you didnâ€™t find our suites to be as spacious as you would have liked, at SpringHill Suites our rooms are typically 25% larger than the standard hotel room youâ€™ll find at other chains. I will certainly pass along your comments about the A/C and WiFi to my maintenance team to see if we can improve in these areas in the future. Thank you again for staying with us and providing us some feedback on your stay, we hope to see you here again on your next visit. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay. The room design worked for us and it was nice to have a separate place to watch TV while others were resting on a bed. The frosted glass bathroom door was a little unusual. The breakfast was great and the staff is very nice and answered any question you may have. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Tami B!  I want to take a quick second to thank you for staying with us on your recent vacation to Disneyland with your 8 year old granddaughter. We take great pride in being friendly and creating an environment that is friendly and welcoming so to hear our staff accomplished that is a true compliment. I would have to agree with you on the breakfast it is a great way to start your morning with a lot of great choices. If you ever need help with future stay please do not hesitate to give us a call (714) 215-4000    Ranen Shulman   Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Breakfast was very good each morning.  One of the best we have had.  Staff are friendly, were able to accommodate a later check out which we appreciated.   Room was clean and modern.  Only issue we had was with the stupid design of the bathroom door in the room.  It has a frosted window....so anytime the light is turned on the whole room is filled with light!  Nice way to wake up the rest of the family when they are sleeping and someone has to go!  Dumb design.  Having said that would stay again as the facility overall was good.  There is a shell station next door, no other shops close by.  It's an easy 15-20 min walk to Disneyland.   Ask for top floor facing fireworks - view is great!
Manager Response: Hello Braveheart1010!  Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. I could not agree with you more in terms of starting out each morning with a hearty breakfast. Our staff works very hard to provide a fully stocked and delicious complimentary breakfast. I must admit the firework facing rooms are definitely a great way to go and it sure sounds like you got to enjoy that as well. Again, I know there are many, many choices to stay here in Anaheim and we are extremely grateful you picked us. if you ever need any help in the future booking a stay with us please contact us directly at (714) 215-4000  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: I called this hotel in desperation after a night stay down the street at a beyond then horrible hotel. The young lady on the phone was pleasant, accommodating and went out of her way to get us early checkin. This hotel is super clean, the staff is very very helpful and most pleasant the rooms are clean, bright and comfortable. You're greeted every time you pass the front desk. The breakfast area is well stocked clean and bright. Can't say enough wonderful things about this hotel. It was a wonderful stay. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Hello Mariu59!  I want to personally thank you for allowing us the chance to impress your during your stay here in Anaheim. It personally thrills me to hear about your experience with our front desk staff as it is our goal to provide elite service to everyone. Our breakfast staff does indeed work incredibly hard to provide a fully stocked breakfast for our guests to enjoy. Thank you once again for staying with us and should you ever need anything else pertaining to a stay with us feel free to give us a call at (714) 215-4000  Ranen Shulman   Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Haven in the Land of Mouse
Summary: My husband took our 19-year-old daughter and her best friend to Disneyland for 4 days in July, and were all impressed. The lobby is bright and cheerful, the room was spacious and light, the bed was excellent, the breakfast was substantial with many choices, and, though there is a bit of a walk, it's on a sidewalk on a relatively nice street. Most importantly to me, everything was spotless! Also, the room set up was very thoughtful, and even 4 adults (okay, 2 adults and 2 semi-adults) did fine for 5 nights. And the price was excellent, too.
Manager Response: Hello Kimba58!  First of all, let me be the first to extend a sincere thank you for choosing our property for your Disneyland getaway. I know we here at the Springhill Suites take great pride in first impressions and walking into our lobby should be held to high standards so I am thrilled we met yours. I would have to agree that the breakfast provides everyone plenty of delicious choices to start their day out just right. We are definitely in walking distance of Disneyland but also provide a chance to ride the ART shuttle for just 5 dollars for adults 10+ and children 3-9 for 2 dollars that includes an all day pass. Thank you once again for giving us the chance to provide a great stay for you and your family. if you're ever in the area again please come see us! and if you ever need some assistance please don't hesitate to call us here at the hotel (714) 215-4000   Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: When our usual Disney hotel was charging $550 a night...we found this place for $200!  Very new, clean.  It was a two block walk to the parks main entrance.  The best park was the roof-top pool deck for watching fire-works after a LOng day of walking the park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent 5 nights at this property.  Beautiful lobby, GREAT way to start your day with a breakfast.  Rooms were spacious, great to have fridge and microwave in room.  Very clean property inside and out.  Staff was GREAT and treated everyone well.  Pool was great and if your lucky you can get a GREAT view from your hotel room of the Disney fireworks , if not step out back you there you have a great view.  Close and walking distance to the park.  If you don't want to walk many other ways to get you to the park or downtown Disney.  Would stay there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Hello Sandra S.   Thank you so much for your recent stay at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. We here at the hotel understand a first impression can mean everything so we make sure our lobby and front desk staff are 100% up to your standards. I couldnâ€™t agree with you more about the rooms being spacious and based upon availability a terrific view of the fireworks from your room. There  really is no better way to start your day than to take advantage of our delicious complimentary breakfast. If it is more of a relaxing day then laying out by our gorgeous pool and catching some sun is a great alternative to Disneyland. I want to once again thank you for staying with us and would like to invite you to stay with us again soon! Please feel free to contact me for any needs with a future hotel visit at (714) 215-4000.  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Convenient Location - Good Value - Loud Fireworks
Summary: I stayed here for a week and all in all had a perfectly comfortable stay. The rooms were large and clean. Breakfast was always plentiful.  The hotel is located right near disneyland which makes it a great spot for families to stay.  I was there on business and here are a few casual observations the hotel and breakfast can get crowded on the weekends, much more quiet on the weekends.  The hotel has easy access to major highways if you want to take some day trips.  The surrounding area is ok, not much in walking distance but a quick drive to anything you might need.  It should be noted that the fireworks can be heard from the hotel and are quite loud.
Manager Response: Hello Beccaniece,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip to Anaheim, Iâ€™m so glad to hear that you were comfortable the week you were here. Iâ€™m glad that you liked our breakfast and yes it can become pretty busy here in the mornings as everyone gets ready to head over to Disneyland for the day, but we do start serving at 6:30am on weekdays and 7:00 on the weekends if you like to get down early to beat the crowds. I agree with you completely that our location is a great launching pad for day trips throughout Southern California, so if you have the time stay a few extra days come and explore everything we have to offer. I hope that youâ€™ll come back and stay with us again next time youâ€™re in Anaheim whether it be for business or vacation! Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: The hotel is one of the newer Springhill Suites design. We were a party of 6 and the layout was excellent. The room was clean, and have a mini fridge and microwave was great. The breakfast they provide is very good and a time and money saver. It is right by Disneyland and you can walk, but it is about a mile to get to the entrance. We stayed a week and when we go back we know we're we will be staying.
Manager Response: Hello Jose N Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Disneyland. We loved having you and your family with us. Iâ€™m glad all 6 in your family fit comfortably in our 2 queen suite.  Also, thank you for the high score on our location. I believe our location is the best around, Near Disneyland and shopping, still able to see the fireworks from select rooms but just far enough to get some peace and quiet. I hope your enjoyed your week with us and we look forward your next visit.    Sincerely  Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: New Property - Great for Families visiting Disneyland!
Summary: Visited Anaheim from Chicago, Illinois, and booked this property after looking at all the reviews! We were not disappointed. This is newer property. Very modern, chic, but comfortable for families. We are a family of five with two teenagers and a 10 year old. We booked a room with two queen beds and a sofa pullout. The beds are comfy and very clean. The bathroom is large, lots of counter room, squeaky clean shower. There was a mini fridge, microwave and coffee pot in the room. The hotel offers a complimentary breakfast of waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage, cold cereals, muffins, bagels, oatmeal, yogurts, and juices/milk. The hotel also offers a shuttle to Disney for a minimal cost of $5 for adults and $2 for children, but you can also catch the Disney tram if you walk down around
Manager Response: Patty R I wanted to say thank you for making the trip and coming to stay with us. We see and serve many families and we know how difficult it can be to make sure everyone is happy. Iâ€™m glad we did not disappoint and that we were everything you hoped for. My staff works very hard to make sure everything is perfect for our guests. To that add great amenities like complimentary breakfast a great pool area and easy transpiration to the park and you are sure to have a great time. I hope we will see you again soon and should you need anything please donâ€™t hesitate to call me at the hotel.  Sincerely Jason Bell Front office manger

Summary: We stayed  here while visiting Disneyland.  Perfect location, perfect hotel.   The room was beautiful. Roomy and comfortable.  The beds were amazing, and felt so good after a long day at Disneyland.  They have a free breakfast in the morning , with a good selections of foods. Cereal, eggs, sausage, etc.  The hotel staff were very nice and extremely helpful. For $5.00 you can purchase a pass between the hotel and Disneyland.  It's a great idea, it drops you off right at the gate. However , returning back to the hotel after the park was an issue.  When we stood in line to get the shuttle, there were people who had been waiting 40 minutes for a ride back to the hotel. Hearing this, we got a cab.   Overall, the hotel itself is great, I recommend it, and I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Linda1225!  I want to be the first to personally thank you for choosing Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. I would have to agree that there is not much better than after a long day of Disneyland coming back to the hotel and getting a good nightâ€™s rest in a big comfortable bed. I see that you took advantage of our complimentary breakfast in the morning to get you started and that is definitely a perfect way to start your day. We canâ€™t wait for you to stay with us again and if you ever need anything feel free to personally contact me here at the hotel (714) 215-4000 thank you once again for staying with us here at Springhill!  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: My family of five including three teenagers stayed here for 3 nights early July.  This is an excellent hotel.  We had a suite with two queen beds and a sofa bed and there was enough room.  The bathroom only had a shower, no tub.  Not sure if all of the rooms are like that which would be inconvenient for toddlers.  Breakfast had a nice selection of items.  The last morning we got to breakfast about 9 am and some of the items were gone and it was crowded.  The mornings we ate at 7 am were much nicer.  Easy walk to the Disneyland parking lot and catch the tram there.  Would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Cheryl H! Thank you so much for your recent stay here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate! I know you have many choices to stay for your Disney vacation and I couldnâ€™t be more thrilled that you chose to stay with us. The Queen Suite is always a great choice with plenty of space for a family such as yours. There is no doubt that joining us for the hearty complimentary breakfast before a long day at Disneyland is a great way to start your day. Once again thank you very much for staying with us and if you are in the area again please do not hesitate to call me for any needs I can personally help out with here at the hotel (714) 215-4000  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We booked this last minute on our was to Disney.  Everyone treated us great.  The hotel was clean and breakfast was as expected.  The highlight of this place is the location.  Late night we were having trouble getting a shuttle from Disney so we decided to walk.  When I put it in my navigator it was only 1 mile.  Great location.
Manager Response: Hello Scott J!  I personally would like to take the time to thank you for choosing Springhill Suites Anaheim as your hotel while visiting Disneyland with your family. Our top priority is guest satisfaction so hearing how well you were treated while visiting is amazing to hear. We couldnâ€™t be more thrilled to hear how you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast before heading out to enjoy your day, and I would absolutely agree about the great location! It would be our pleasure if you choose us again next time you are in the area, and please contact me directly if there is anything I can help you with before your next stay. (714) 215-4000  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Outstanding experience at an excellent hotel. The experience started with the front desk staff who were extremely helpful and friendly - really great customer service. The rooms are beautiful and very clean. They have everything you need and very comfortable beds. Complimentary breakfast is also very good. The location is very close to Disney, so no long drives. Talk to the front desk about buying passes for the shuttle to take you into Disney and avoid the hassles of parking. They drop you off near the entrance gates. An excellent place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Jim B!  Thank you so much for choosing Springhill Suites as your hotel while visiting the Disneyland Resort. It always thrills me to hear about how clean our rooms are as that is a testament of how terrific our housekeeping staff is. I couldnâ€™t agree more on this being such a fantastic location, and even more so how easy it is to take advantage of the ART shuttle which takes you to the Resort Maingate. We always strive to give you first class service and are always exhilarated to know our front desk staff made it happen. Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact any of us at the hotel if you ever need a place to stay while in the area again at (714) 215-4000  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: To make a long story short- we needed a room for one night after we were released from Children's Hospital Orange County and still had another day before we could hop on a flight back home to Philadelphia. I  had just unexpectedly spent a week with my daughter at the hospital during our planned family vacation and the rest our of family had already gone home as planned days earlier. We were released in the early morning (8:30am) with medications that needed to be refrigerated. I needed to find a place that would allow me access to a room immediately so I could keep those meds cold and after calling several hotels in the Disneyland area that were unable to accommodate that request, I just about gave up hope. That's when I walked into the Springhill Suites. I explained our
Manager Response: Hello TrayBagz!  Let me be the first to thank you for staying with us and wish you and your family great health! Mayra takes great pride in her work up at the front desk and I will make sure she knows what a great job she did. Taking advantage of our complimentary breakfast to start your day is always a great Idea. No better way to end a long day of Disneyland than to fall asleep in our big comfortable beds! Thank you so much for staying with us and please come visit us soon here at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate.  Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: The suite we had at Springhill was very nice. We had two queen size beds and a sofa bed. There were three adults and three children in the suite, one being under two.  My wife and I had a queen bed each and one of our granddaughters slept with each of us. They are six and nine. They alternated beds each night. My daughter and toddler grandson slept in the sofa bed as she could put cushions up on one side to prevent him falling out of bed. The ensuite had a bath with shower in it as well. It was a very good size. The beds were very comfortable with two medium firm pillows and two soft pillows on each bed. Our housemaid was very efficient and very nice. There was a complimentary breakfast every morning which was quite good. There is a shuttle bus calls in every twenty minutes to
Manager Response: Hello MervHarg!  Thank you very much for your recent stay here at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. I am thrilled to hear how you took advantage of all the space in your room! Our housekeeping team is absolutely incredible and it definitely sounds like they live up to your standards. Before getting your day started its always a great option to enjoy the complimentary breakfast we do provide to all of our guests. It sounds like you had a great time interacting with our front desk staff. There is no doubt they take great pride in being able to enhance the experience for our guests any way they can. If at any point you're back in the area and need a place to stay please do not hesitate to give us a call at (714) 215-4000  Ranen Shulman   Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: After a long and dedicated search for a quality, spectacular hotel, my family found one. it had been a couple of years in the making, but we finally found the perfect hotel for our trips to Disneyland and California Adventure. The breakfast is darling and complete. (Fuits, cereals, oatmeal, sausage, eggs, juice, milk, waffles, muffins, donuts, cake, etc.) The view from the rooms is also amazing if you get a room on the west side of the hotel, facing Disney. Fireworks at 10 before bed and great space. The rooms were clean and spacious and luxurious. Everything anyone could want from a a hotel. We did have a few occasions where noise was a pretty big issue with neighbor's kids early in the morning and late at night, but we're all on vacation at Disney, so we overlooked it gladly.
Manager Response: Hello Lauryn G!  I would like to take this opportunity to say thank you, first of all, for staying at Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. I was thrilled to hear about how much you enjoyed your stay, and I would definitely agree with you on how spectacular the view of the fireworks from the rooms are! Its outstanding to hear that you enjoyed how spacious and clean our rooms are, and that you were able to take advantage of our hearty breakfast before a busy day at the Disneyland Resort. I want to once again thank you so much for staying at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate and would love to extend an invite to come stay with us again next time youâ€™re in the area. Please feel free to contact me direct at the hotel and allow us to assist you on your next visit at (714) 215-4000   Ranen Shulman  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: It was our family's first stay (2ad 4ch) in USA so of course first impressions last..Loved loved loved it!  A very clean, modern entrance. Greeted by friendly staff at reception, helpful as well. Our room was on the 4th floor. Nice fresh decor, two Queen beds very comfortable with a double fold out sofa, plenty sleeping space, however one blanket for the sofa, needed an extra one. Bathroom/shower great size and we had a great view of the Disney fireworks!  Rooms are serviced daily too. A pretty good location, 5-10min walk to catch Tram to Disneyland which was free & ran constantly. We could've caught the shuttle but it obviously saved us a few dollars and we enjoyed the walk. Free buffet breakfast which also saved some money. We loved the pool and spa pool. Laundry room seemed
Manager Response: Hello Maxine M!  WOW! how cool that it was your first trip to the United States! I hope every moment was memorable and I want to take this opportunity to thank you for staying with us at the Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate. I could not be more thrilled to hear you got to enjoy the fireworks from your room at night and enjoy a fantastic complimentary breakfast in the morning. It is always great to hear about how efficient our housekeeping staff is and how we lived up to all your expectations. If you ever come back to the Anaheim area we would be thrilled and honored if you stayed with us again! again, thank you so much!  Ranen Shulman   Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: great rooms, great breakfast (may want to limit amounts of items each family can leave area with) Saw one family taking multiple yogurts and bananas to the park. It was busy so some items ran out and were not able to be replenished. CVS downstairs was a joy. Anytho9ng we needed was right there 24 hours. Close to park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We rented 2 rooms for the weekend of the 13th of June. The hotel is very clean and well maintained. As an elite member I've stayed at several Springhill locations and this one was NICE.  The rooms were modern and allowed for suitcases and grown men to feel comfortable. The door bathrooms are a nice feature.  The hotel is conveniently located to Disney for those who can walk. Just exit the hotel entrance, head right to the first street and turn right. You'll head right into the employee parking lot for Disney. Walk up the stairs to the Tram and in minutes you'll be at downtown Disney.  Overall excellent!
Manager Response: Hi Joy L, Thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay on June 13th and for sharing your experience with us here on TripAdvisor. We always love to hear such great feedback for our guests, particularly our Marriott Rewards Elite members! Our staff takes great pride in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained, Iâ€™ll be sure to share your comments with the Team! And yes we are very conveniently located to both Disneyland and Downtown Disney, and for those of you who donâ€™t want the walk we also partner with ART to provide shuttle service at a very reasonable price. Thank you again for choosing our hotel, we hope to have come back again soon! Sincerely, Ranen Shulman Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Excellent Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at this property for a recent trip to Disneyland. Great location which is close enough to walk to the park, but the shuttle stops at the front door of the hotel every 15-20 minutes.  The shuttle was an excellent way to get to the park.  The staff was very helpful and the rooms were perfect; lots of space for a family. We will definitely return to this property again on our next trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Chris P Thank you for taking the time to write a wonder review of our hotel.  I think our location is very convenient to get to the parks and is only a 10 min walk away from Downtown Disney. If youâ€™re like me and would like to save your feet for Disneyland the ART Shuttle is a very good idea. It is a great value at $5 for an adult and $2 for children for an all-day pass. I was also glad to hear that our staff took such great care of you. We take great pride in making sure every guest leaves with the best possible experience. We hope you will come back and visit us again soon. If you need anything please let me know.  Sincerely Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel for my trip to Disneyland. I wanted something clean and nice because I was traveling with  my 8 month old. The hotel was nice and clean the staff was courteous.  The only thing that I didn't like was the windows don't seem to keep the noise out. We had a room that faced disneyland and that street seems to be very busy even late at night. The traffic was loud, if we had a room on the other side of the hotel it might have been a bit quieter. Breakfast was OK nothing great but good to have as a quick bite. Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Karrs01 Thank you for writing about your recent trip to Disneyland.  I love to read the comments and appreciate the kind words about the staff. They work hard and do a great job.  I couldnâ€™t ask for better.  I hope you and your baby had a great time at Disneyland and look forward to you staying with us again soon. Sincerely Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary: first off I went into room with my family and the a/c didn't work had to call them to fix it he got there and I asked him its not blowing very good and there are six of us here he said all the rooms were like this the second thing that happen was my son went to use the bathroom and there was a piece of crap in the tolet this was not starting well I call again them to fix the problem he said happens all the time this is not what I paid 558 dollars for and the shower had rust in it my room was 232 and its a handy cap room and if this is the way they treat handicap people that is very bad then I checked out and they said we always hold an extra 20 dollars for the room incase of charges it was more like 90 dollars I found this to be a very bad and discussing thing for my family
Manager Response: Hello Timothy G,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim and for sharing your feedback about your stay. Iâ€™m sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay at my hotel and was shocked to hear about your bathroom concerns, as we hold ourselves to very high standards of cleanliness. I spoke to my maintenance engineer who answered the service call for your air conditioning and the clogged toilet and he does remember handling those service requests. We did not intend to give you the impression that leaving dirty toilets is a normal occurrence, only that toilet clogs do happen from time to time and we are equipped to handle such situations. Each of our rooms is cleaned and then inspected by a supervisor prior to being made available for guests checking in to ensure that the high cleanliness standards of our guests is met. Again, I sincerely apologize that you were given the wrong impression. I will certainly take this opportunity to share your comments with the appropriate departments at my hotel to ensure that our guestsâ€™ needs are being met in the future. If I may be of any further assistance to you, please feel free to contact me directly. Thank again for staying with us, I do hope you enjoyed the rest of your time here in Anaheim. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Don't let the name fool you
Summary: Not sure why people say it's close enough to walk with all the other options far closer. We arrived Friday afternoon to start our Disney adventure. Asked the front desk easiest way to get there, was given a map to the tram station, no mention of the ART bus that stops right in front of the hotel. We discoverd that at the end of day 2. ART offers dicounted passes for 3 days or more, missed that deal. Highly recommend that if you are walking the parks all day and/or have smaller ones. The hotel itself is one of the newer ones so is still fresh. The breakfast buffet was decent, we were down there every morning at 6am. We didn't use the pool, but it looked clean. This is our 9th time to Disneyland, and we won't be staying here again due to location. Did appreciate the free wifi.
Manager Response: Sara G Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. It is always great to hear what our guest love and what we could improve on here at the Springhill suites Anaheim Maingate.  I am just like you. I must have complimentary internet when I am away from home. There is nothing worse than feeling disconnected from everything.  Only second to internet is a complimentary hot breakfast.  I was happy to hear that you found our complimentary breakfast convenient for your family. While on the subject of convenience I am sorry that you were not aware of the ART shuttle.  It was never our intention we strive to make every guest experience a relaxing and pleasant one.  I hope you will give use a second chance to show you just how easy getting to the parks and enjoying your vacation can be. If I can be of any further assistance please just call me at 714-215-4000. Iâ€™d be happy to help. Sincerely  Jason Bell

Summary: The hotel was overall okay.  Good location for Disneyland.  Walkable even.  My grown son and I  had a room with two double beds.  I found the bed hard and uncomfortable, my son did not.  Bathroom didn't seem to have an air vent/fan.  Hotel breakfast was not great but passable.  Of three mornings we only ate there once.
Manager Response: Dear Flower of the Month thank you for taking the time to share your review with us.  I know my staff and I enjoyed having your family with us.  I always love hearing how our guests stay was.  I was glad to hear that our amenities meet your needs except for the beds. I have stayed in many hotels in my travels and beds are just one of those things that are so dependent on personal preference. It may be perfect for one person and not for another.  On your next visit please contact me at the hotel and we will make sure to soften up your bed.   Sincerely Jason Bell

Summary: Stayed one night on our way thru Southern California. Great breakfast buffet included with room, big comfortable rooms, nice pool and hot tub. If you can get an east-facing room, you can watch Disneyland fireworks at night. A recommendation: there is a shuttle to Disneyland and it's also close enough to walk. By the time you pile in the car and drive then fight crowd in the parking, the shuttle or a short walk would have gotten you there. Great hotel, will stay again.
Manager Response: S8bfelt Thank you for taking some time out of you busy schedule to write such a great review. I agree that we are a great hotel for families and it was great to have your family stay with us. As you mentioned we do have a lot to offer such as a great complimentary hot breakfast, pool and easy access to the Disney Resort, but most of all we want our guests to have a good time and let us take the guess work out of their vacation.  If there is anything we can do to help plan for your next vacation please donâ€™t hesitate to ask.   Sincerely,  Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed 5 nights on a trip to Disney, universal Studios and the beach.  Had 2 adjoining rooms.  Nice rooms, solid breakfast, convenient location, transit to Disney was efficient.   Just make sure you get breakfast before 9.  No new food after that.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Mike M Thank you for your review. It sounds like you made great use of your time in California.  We are glad that you made Springhill Suites Anaheim Maingate your home away from home.  We look forward to your next trip to California and hope you will stay with us again soon.  Sincerely Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice property near Disneyland and California Adventure
Summary: We were very happy with this property for many reasons.   Very welcoming front staff who allowed us to check in quite early.   The room was immaculate and very spacious.  Nice breakfast is included in the room rate.   The only surprise was the additional $14 + tax for parking.   Also it was really too far to walk to Disneyland and Downtown Disney, however Anaheim does provide a convenient bus shuttle (#11) that comes by about every 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Hello worldtraveler535,  Thank you for reviewing us here on TripAdvisor, Iâ€™m very happy to hear that my staff were so welcoming to you and that we were able to get you checked in early to the hotel. We understand that many of our guests are traveling here to visit the Disneyland parks and we always do our best to accommodate early arrivals so you can start enjoying your trip as soon as possible. Iâ€™ll be sure to share your comments with staff and recognize them for taking such good care of you, we hope to see you here again! Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: Spacious rooms, clean, quite, walking distance (long walk) to Disney main gate.  There were four in our party, the room could have accommodated up to six if small children.  An alternative to staying on site at Disney.  We saved over $400 by staying here (you don't get into the park as early). Excellent breakfast.  Of the four different hotels we stayed in on our week + vacation, this was by far the best!
Manager Response: Hello OscarL123,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Disneyland. I agree that we are perfectly suited to accommodate families traveling to the theme parks and that we offer significant value compared to the Disney signature hotels. Iâ€™m very happy to hear that you preferred all hotel over the others you stayed at during your vacation and hope youâ€™ll come back again soon! Thank you, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Mickey meets Darth Vader and Friends...
Summary: Well, this was an EPIC family vaca experience!  At 68, Grampy's first visit to MICKEY'S PARK.  A wonderful day with 7 family members at DISNEYLAND.  And a full 9 hour day it was!   Day 2 we had tickets to STAR WARS CELEBRATION 2015!  Another long day of fun, characters, costumes and STAR WARS gear! SpringHill Suites Anaheim is perfectly located for Disney or the big convention in town.  The rooms are very large and nicely appointed.  Rates are good.  Rooftop area has nice pool, exercise room AND PERFECT VIEW OF DISNEYLAND NIGHTIME FIREWORKS!! Morning breakfast very nice.  The STAFF is very cordial and most helpful. SAY 'HI' TO MICKEY FOR ME...
Manager Response: Hello Dave N, Thank you for posting this EPIC review for us here on TripAdvisor! From reading your review, it seems that you may have been staying at SpringHill Suites Convention Center and not our hotel (we donâ€™t have a rooftop pool). I hope you get a chance to see this and post your review to their page since it sounds like you really enjoyed your stay with them. At any rate, Iâ€™m glad to hear that you, Grampy and the rest of the fam had a great visit here in Anaheim and weâ€™d love to have come stay with us next time you are in the area. Weâ€™ll be sure to say â€œHiâ€ to Mickey for you in the meantime. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager p.s. â€“ We have pretty amazing views of the fireworks from our property as well!!

Summary Heading: Left behind a treasure....if found, please reach out!
Summary: we stayed in room 211 for our stay ( nights May 13-17, 2015) and then moved to room 311 due to noise concerns we had.  In one of these rooms ( probably 211) my husband left behind his silver Hopi money clip ( sun head engraved on the front) with $50-$80 Canadian Cash in it.  Money clip was purchased on a trip to Arizona 10 years ago and has sentimental value....if you happened to find this....could we have it returned? Hotel staff checked the safe (where we think it was left) but to no avail.  Hoping for some luck and kind hearted travelers who may have stayed in the room after us.  Thanks! Aside from this unfortunate event ( caused by a night of loud neighbours that caused us to need to change rooms for our last night) was a good stay and well located for Disney visits.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa G, Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Anaheim and for sharing your experience here on TripAdvisor. Iâ€™m glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us despite being disturbed by the group next to you. Iâ€™m sorry that we were unable to find the missing money clip for you, we always do our best to recover and return any left behind items to our guests. I kept your contact information from our last conversation in case anything is turned in so I can make arrangements to ship it back to you. Once again, thank you for choosing our hotel. We hope to have you back with us again next time youâ€™re in Anaheim. Sincerely,  Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: Stayed here on a visit from the UK in April.  Could not fault the hotel or location but in particular Ryan and Tyler who made every effort to make us feel welcome.  Just a final message for Tyler, I hope the Ducks lift the Stanley Cup and Ryan I'm sure the Lakers will be great again.
Manager Response: Thank you JazzyJ5102 I always enjoy hearing how our staff really makes a difference and goes above and beyond. Tyler and Ryan truly have a knack for knowing how to make our guests feel welcome. I sincerely appreciate the kudos to my staff. They genuinely are the real deal.  Sincerely, Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay they bent over backwards to please us always with a smile. Best stay in Anaheim to date. Tip: walk a block to the east cut through parking lot go up 1 level of parkade catch trams on south side of parkade to downtown Disney and park entrances free and on your schedule. Good food delivery services, and ok restaurant close.
Manager Response: Hello Corvetter We are ecstatic to hear that your visit with us and the Disneyland Resort was an experience to remember. Our team works hard to ensure the best possible vacation. We also really enjoyed your tip. Few people know that it is really that easy to walk to the tram at the Mickey and Friends parking structure.  I go the same way when I go to Disney, Saves time and money.  If you ever need some more tips on your next Disneyland vacations donâ€™t hesitant to ask. The front desk staff knows all the tricks to making your time at Disney all it can be.  Sincerely, Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Not a good choice for families
Summary: Lots of hotels to choose from around Disney, and most would be a better choice than this if you have children.  We found the employees and the atmosphere to be surprisingly cold, unhelpful and indifferent.  Our kids seemed to be an annoyance to the staff, even when just sitting in the lobby, which felt very uncomfortable.  The room was dirty when we arrived, especially the bathroom, and the room was also much smaller than any other Springhill Suites we have stayed in.  (I've stayed at hundreds if not thousands of Marriott properties and I would say this is the single worst I have ever experienced- disappointing).  So look around the area, you can definitely find a better experience than this.
Manager Response: Hello GTraveler111888,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Anaheim and for sharing your experience here on TripAdvisor. I am surprised and disappointed to hear that you and your family did not receive the warm and hospitable service that we are accustomed to providing at this hotel during your stay with us. We take great pride in being a family friendly hotel here at the SpringHill Suites Anaheim Maingate, I apologize that we fell short of that goal during your stay with us. I have shared your comments with the appropriate teamâ€™s here at the hotel so that we can learn and improve from this instance. Thank you again for the feedback, we appreciate hearing from all of our guests so that we can continually grow and become better. If you wish to discuss the matter further, or if I can be of any assistance in the future please feel free to contact me directly. Weâ€™d love to have come back and stay with us again in the future.  Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: Great Hotel stay, staff was both excellent to deal with on any concern I had and very helpful, they always responded with a smile, they made my stay excellent. I had an issue with a loud AC unit and they let me check out another room and change rooms and also apologized for my inconvenience. This Hotel has excellent, and very professional staff.
Manager Response: Dear Glen F,   I would like to start off by thanking you for choosing our property to stay at during your time out of town. Hearing about your experience with our front desk is thrilling because we definitely strive to be top notch when it comes to our front desk staff giving excellent guest service. Weâ€™re glad we were able to quickly resolve the air issue in your room. We hope to see you again!  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: This was a new hotel a couple blocks from Disneyland.  Our room was huge with a king bed and also a sofa, fridge, microwave and desk overlooking the pool area.  The bathroom was very roomy with a large walk-in shower.  The hotel was very clean and located in a quiet area near homes.  Breakfast buffet was included which definitely saves a lot of money when travelling.
Manager Response: Dear Lynn H,  I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for staying with us here at Springhill Suites. We are excited to hear how you enjoyed your stay, and particularly your spacious room. Taking advantage of our Breakfast buffet is always a great idea as it will give you a perfect head start to your long, yet, fun day at Disneyland. We hope the next time you are in Anaheim you will give us the pleasure of having you stay at our property once more.   Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Good for Disney visit-but not excellent
Summary: First off, this is a new hotel that opened in March of 2014. It is clean and (most of) the front desk folk are helpful and are willing to meet your needs. Airport shuttle service for this airport is difficult to come by. And the ART shuttle is not worth paying for - they are not air conditioned and tend to get very crowded. This hotel is less than a mile away from Disneyland and is completely walkable. Give it a try! The beds are comfortable and the rooms are spacious. The main road (Ball St) is busy and can be heard from rooms facing that street. The pool is small and unheated, but clean and well maintained. Rooms come with a microwave and small refrigerator. There is granite details in the bathroom, "kitchen" area and windowsill. Breakfast is served daily and may or may not be
Manager Response: Dear LiliMo6,  First off I want to thank you for choosing our property for your stay, and taking the time to write this review. I am happy to hear how you enjoyed our beds comfort and the size of the rooms. One thing we pride ourselves on is guest service so we are thrilled to hear you had an enjoyable experience with our front desk staff. I want to take this time to apologize for ART shuttle as it seems it did not live up to your expectations and I would agree the walk to Disneyland is definitely doable in a timely fashion. We hope that whenever you are back in the area you will give us the pleasure of staying with us once again.   Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We were booked into this hotel as part of a Southwest Airline Vacation Package. It is a great hotel! Only one year old, very clean.  We had a king suite which included king bed, fold out couch, desk, and nice bathroom.  Front desk staff were helpful on all shifts. They were hospitable and informed. They answered our questions with good and reliable information. Provided maps to illustrate what they were telling us.  The breakfast is quite fine. Has nice mixture of hot items, good pastries, cereal ,and waffles.
Manager Response: Hello Duane P, Thank you for choosing our hotel as part of your Southwest Vacation Package and for taking the time to share your experience here on TripAdvisor. Iâ€™m pleased to hear that my staff was friendly and helpful to you during your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast in the mornings. I hope that we have the chance to have you back again in the future and that we can be your hotel of choice anytime youâ€™re in the Anaheim area. Thank you again for staying with us!  Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: Mickey Mouse is not in the house!
Summary: My daughter stayed here for 2 nights for a 1 day Disneyland Blitz (8:30 -> midnight).  Room is very spacious and could have easily absorbed 3 more people even before you stuffed any kids in the large walk in closet.  Very new and clean facility, and overall surprisingly quiet even for the worse room from that standpoint in the hotel (the one we had was right next to the breakfast area - which made it easy to grab coffee and return to room).  Was an easy walk to Disneyland hotel, and then Downtown Disney into the park.  You can also piggyback off the large parking garage transportation, but we did not bother.  Breakfast quality was "meh", not awful, not great.  Staff kept restocking food as fast as people consumed it so you won't go hungry.  2 Mickey Thumbs up for what we paid.
Manager Response: Hello OriginalMurph I am so glad to hear that you had a great vacation here in Anaheim. We loved having you and your family here and it sounds like you made good use of the space in the room. I know many of our guest come for Disneyland and they may not be in the room very much. However, it is a life saver to be able to spread out a bit when you do get back to the room. I hoped you enjoyed our staff and amenities we offer.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Until then Jason Bell Front Office Manager

Summary: Close enough to walk to disney, nice hotel, suites our needs as a family of 4 in 1 room (2 small children). Free breakfast was a nice bonus, there were lots of options available. To go to Disney this is a great hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Deanne C,  Thank you so much for choosing us for your family vacation to Disneyland! Iâ€™m glad to hear that our suites fit your familyâ€™s needs and that you found our location convenient to the parks. I hope that you and your family had a wonderful time while visiting and that youâ€™ll come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary Heading: If your not going to Disney this may not be the place
Summary: Decent hotel and good wheelchair access in the hotel and in the room. The rooms were clean and the staff was nice.  In my accessible room the air conditioner was about 4 feet from the bed so its either noisy or you have cold air blowing on you all night.   The free breakfast was nice but there are lots of Disneyland guests there which is to be expected.  So if your not a Disney person this may be to much for you.  They have taken a page from the airline book of generating revenue.  You stay at the hotel and pay your room rate but they charge you to park your car in the parking space.
Manager Response: Hello Guy B,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to Anaheim with the family and for taking the time to share your experience here on TripAdvisor. Itâ€™s so nice to hear that you liked our clean rooms and friendly staff here at the hotel, and that the accessibility met your needs. I apologize if the air conditioning unit disturbed you, my maintenance team is working diligently to add sound buffering to those units to help mitigate the noise and if it ever gets too cold for you weâ€™d be happy to bring you some extra blankets. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and hope that youâ€™ll choose us again next time youâ€™re staying in Anaheim. Sincerely, Darrell Buettner General Manager

Summary: We had a great stay during our 2-day trip to Disneyland.  The hotel is so close we walked to Disneyland; apparently we took the long way which was still not bad, but ask the front desk about the short cut through the parking lot.  The breakfast was great and the eating area was large enough to accommodate everyone.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Everything was perfect, no complaints.
Manager Response: Edriss M Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to writing such a growing review.  It is always great to hear how my staff is providing excellent service and experiences.  I hope you had a great time at Disneyland and come see us again soon.  Jason Bell  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Your magical hotel for your Disney visit
Summary: We stayed at this hotel September 2014 for three nights.  Awesome value for money. Super clean rooms, great shower and spacious rooms with a huge flat screen  with numerous channels. It was great to come back to our room and unwind watching TV. Fridge, microwave, coffee maker, spacious comfortable beds. Check in was easy and all the staff were helpful and happy. I have no idea how you could find anything to complain about, breakfast was great and plentiful and not crowded. And I love Raisin Bran :-) Very near Disney, we chose to take the car and were parked in the lot within five minutes. Walking would be no more than 15 minutes at the most. If you want a new super clean super friendly hotel this has to be your first choice. We will be back in September 2015. Seriously the value
Manager Response: DisWaltSnow Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to the Disney Resort. We pride ourselves on giving excellence service for a great price. All the amenities that you could want right at your figure tip (Iâ€™m a rain Bran lover myself). Plus a peaceful place to have some down time away from the hustle and bustle of the park. It sounds like you had a great vacation and It was great to have you and your family with us.  We hope to see you again real soon.  Jason Bell  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Good overall- Very helpful front desk
Summary: Within a comfortable walk to Disney shuttles (about a mile?), and close to most attractions by drive. Easy access and parking (although it's $14 per night). Front desk was very helpful on ideas and transportation, and pointed us to some good beaches.
Manager Response: 360time I hope you had a great time with us. Iâ€™m grateful for your wonderful review and Iâ€™m glad that my staff took really great care of you and your family. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Safe travels until then. Jason Bell  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Not as close as you think
Summary: The Marriott Springhill Suites are first of all not suites in classic sense. Rather they  are a  large rooms separated by a half wall and small kitchen unit.  There is no real separate sitting area or closing off of the bedroom that one would expect in a suite. That being said the room is very comfortable with nice modern styling. There is a small work area and a couch next to the half wall but only one tv that is sort of jointly shared between the two spaces.  Also if you like to bathe rather than shower you are out of luck, no tubs in the units only showers. The bed itself is king size and comfortable, with six pillows and a pillow top to the mattress.    The shower was a very low volume and would barely rinse off the soap and shampoo. I don't if this had to do with the water
Manager Response: Hello Terry R Thank you for staying with us on your recent stay in Anaheim.  I was glad to hear that you enjoyed the extra space and great breakfast that are included with your stay. My staff and I try to make it feel as if this is our guestâ€™s home away from home.  As you mentioned we are located about a mile and a half walk from the main entrance of Disneyland. I recommend using the Anaheim resort transit that picks up in front of the hotel and drops at the transportation center. We are also located next to the Mickey and Friends parking structure with a quick and easy walk to the complimentary tram or monorail located at downtown Disney. We at Marriott are glad that you enjoyed your vacation and we hope that you will come and visit us again soon.  Sincerely  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, but not a suite!
Summary: Location was great, but this was not at all a suite for 6 people as advertised! Thank goodness we spent most of our time at Disneyland. The free breakfast was not very kid-friendly. I mean, how many kids eat Raisin Bran for breakfast. They do have waffles, but the line was a 10-15 minute wait just to start your waffle. The rooms are very narrow. and the layout is weird. We did not like the sliding barn door to the bathroom.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Julie T,  Thank you for your recent stay with us. We're sorry that the room was not up to your expectations. Our queen studio suite typically fits 6 people just fine as it has 2 queen beds and a pull out sofa bed. While Raisin Bran is an option for people's morning cereal, we do have other sugary cereals that kids love such as Froot Loops several others but, we will definitely discuss your feedback with our breakfast staff.   Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here recently for business when the hotels closer to the convention center were packed.  I would call it a happy accident.  In my time there, we asked for a lot of help and advice, and even had a few issues.  Everything was handled and answered quickly, professionally and above expectation.   Locationwise, you are literally around the corner from Downtown Disney so it was very easy to get over there.  There are not a lot of other restaurant choices right here, but the hotel works with a professional car service that is pretty quick and very pleasant (tell Sammy Meg says hi =) )  The rooms are spacious and comfortable, the workout room decently equipped, the pool adequate and the breakfast filled my needs (I liked the mini waffle iron; I think if I were traveling to
Manager Response: Good afternoon Megawattage,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and we are glad that a happy accident brought you to our hotel! We make our best effort to provide as much help and information to our guests as possible and we will definitely let Sammy know you say Hi!   Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Very modern updated hotel. The rooms are very nice, it took a minute to get that the key card is required for the AC and power in the sitting/kitchen area. Beds were comfortable. They have a nice lounge area in front of the hotel. We decided to spend a few hours at Disney and took the ART bus which picks you up right in front of the hotel and literally drops you off at the Disneyland main gate. We are passholders and go all the time..this was the easiest way to go to Disneyland we have ever experienced!!
Manager Response: Good afternoon Jen R,  Weâ€™re quite glad you enjoyed our modern dÃ©cor and thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. The Art shuttle is quite convenient in that itâ€™s about every 20 minutes and picks you up right at the hotel. Nice time youâ€™re taking advantage of your passes and are back in the area weâ€™d love to have you stay with us again!  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: This is the best hotel for a solo, business, or family trip. The rooms are exactly as you see in the pictures. Traveling from Bermuda I didn't bother packing things that would weigh down my bags like shampoo. I was pleased to see they had the Paul Mitchel line in the rooms.  The hotel is perfectly just outside Disney. I prefer this location better than the Florida location to be honest. I find this one offers more for the adult kid. Bus tours easily booked at the front desk. Bus picks you up at the hotel. You can also see the fireworks each night from your hotel room!  I feel they need to improve on the breakfast offering as the eggs were always overcooked and looked like fake yellow sponge cake. tasted nasty!  I forget my hotel room number but it had a bad air conditioner. Kept
Manager Response: Good evening Bachatness,  Thanks for choosing our hotel to stay at and for the honest review. Everyone, myself included, tends to forget the little details such as shampoo or toothbrushes at home when traveling but here at the Springhill Suites we always have such amenities available to our guests. The nice thing about Disneyland is that itâ€™s much more personal than Disneyworld and both have a great fireworks show each night. We will definitely pass on your comments to our breakfast staff to correct any issues and weâ€™re sorry your room had air conditioner issues, if possible please notify us which room you were in so we can properly and promptly address the problem. We know youâ€™re quite far in Bermuda but, if youâ€™re ever back in the Anaheim area donâ€™t hesitate to call us.   Sincerely, Javier Urrutia  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Typical solid and consistent marriott.. surprised they didn't have any tea bags in the room.. just coffee.  We are people too ya know ;) i would avoid room 417 as the hvac was extremely loud and seemed to cycle on / off very frequently. breakfast seemed pretty good and the desk staff was nice.. location is perfectly set near the disney parks.. all less than a mile. The pool did only seem to catch the sun in the afternoon.. not in the morning.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Workhplayh,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for your recent stay with us. While we do not have tea bags in individual rooms, we do have a variety of tea bags available upon request from the Front Desk. Weâ€™re very sorry that there was an issue with your room and have forwarded the issue to our Maintenance department to fix the problem promptly. If youâ€™re ever in the area we hope you give us a chance to make it up to you.   Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: great place to stay near Disney, friendly staff
Summary: we stayed 3 nights and were impressed.  The room was spacious and well lit.  The tv could be rotated so you could watch it from the seating area or in bed.  The in house washing machine was cheap and convenient so make sure you bring a pod for soap.  There is a shell station right next door where you can get your supplies (cheap U.S booze, chips etc).  The pool is adequate and it is very friendly if someone is in a wheelchair.  The air conditioner was very loud but in southern cali but I would much rather deal with a load noise as opposed to sweltering heat.  The staff were all very pleasant and willing to assist.  The shampoos were Paul Mitchell and my wife loved that (so much so she took an extra 2 when the housekeeper wasn't looking ;)  The shuttle was never too full and left
Manager Response: Good afternoon darniro,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for your recent stay with us. Weâ€™re very glad we impressed you. Our on-site laundry room is always available to our guests 24/7 and we also do have detergent and fabric softener for sale in our Market in case you forget your own. One of the best amenities at the Springhill Suites Brand is their excellent Paul Mitchell shampoo and conditioner. We look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Very nice stay at Springhill Suites
Summary: We had two rooms at the Springhill Suites Maingate.  The customer service received from the front desk was awesome.  It was a very busy week at the hotel and they were able to accomodate getting our rooms right across the hall from each other.  We were greeted by staff each time we entered the front doors and when we walked by.  The staff was always very friendly and willing and able to answer questions about the area.   The rooms were very clean and modern and beds/pillows were very comfortable.  It was also surprisingly quiet in our room, which was very nice. The proximity to Disneyland park was fairly close, but still about at 20 minute walk or a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland parking shuttle (free).   Breakfast was just o.k.  The selection was acceptable, but quality of
Manager Response: Good afternoon 77luv2go,  Thank you for staying with us during such a busy week. We try our best to be as knowledgeable about the area as possible for our guests. Weâ€™re sorry the breakfast wasnâ€™t quite to your expectations and we will certainly communicate that with our staff. Hopefully next time youâ€™re in the area you will come back and stay with us!  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: School Band had an awesome stay!
Summary: Was lucky to travel with our Canadian High School Band of 45 kids and stay in this hotel.  Great staff, nice larger rooms, walking distance to Disneyland, and excellent value.  We would definitely recommend this hotel to others travelling with a large school group.  The staff and management could not have treated us better.   Already looking forward to returning in 2019!
Manager Response: Good evening Kevin H!  Thank you for your recent  stay with us. Our spacious rooms are perfect for larger groups and the complimentary breakfast makes it a great value. The kids were great and we look forward to seeing them again!  Sincerely,  Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels around Disneyland, and this is one of our favorites. It is very clean, new, and spacious. We thought the breakfast was above average although it is very busy in there. There were some choices I haven't seen before which was very nice. The staff was excellent and the rooms are beautiful and large. The distance to the park is a very manageable walk. We would definately stay again.
Manager Response: Good evening Disneygirl202,  Thank you for such a great compliment! We strive to make each guests stay a wonderful experience. Next time youâ€™re in the area please give us a call!  Sincerely,  Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Our family stayed here recently while on a to the Disney parks. We chose this hotel based on reviews and the fact that it is a newer hotel.  The good: Location is great. It is within a short walk to the parks. We appreciated the breakfast, although it can be pretty crowded and a little crazy. The poor girls had a hard time keeping things clean and stocked. The room was a good size and pretty clean. We felt it could be cleaner. The beds were comfortable and the towels were nice and thick. The employees were all very nice.  The bad: I would have to say that the worse thing for me and my family was the terrible water pressure in the shower. It felt like it was only a little stronger than a trickle. I have thick hair and it took awhile for me to wet and rinse my hair. The walls are
Manager Response: Good evening Trippymom,  Weâ€™re glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We will definitely use your feedback and work with our breakfast and housekeeping staff to ensure everything is clean and stocked. Due to our close proximity to Disneyland, parking here is $14 per night plus tax for a total $16.38. We do hope to see you again next time youâ€™re in the area.  Sincerely,  Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Our family of five stayed here in December of 2014 during our stay in Anaheim. Although we intended to visit the greater Los Angeles area, we primarily wanted to visit the theme parks in the area, especially the two Disney parks, hence this hotel.  The hotel was small but cosy, with a colourful and vibrant lobby. Our receptionist was pleasant and helpful and provided us with tips about the area. He also offered us the option to buy a bus pass from an advertiser to Disney and Universal, but we rejected, since we already had our own rental car. If you do not have a car, I would probably recommend buying the ART passes, but not the private bus ones, especially if you are travelling in a group.  Our room was moderately-sized and fit all five of us nicely. As with the lobby, the room
Manager Response: Good evening Alexander G,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We want every one of our guests to have access to all Southern California has to offer, not just Disneyland. As such we do have plenty of services available to other Theme parks and tours. You are correct, we just celebrated our first year being open and it has been a great year! Our complimentary hot breakfast buffet is a hit with the kids, especially the waffle machine. We hope to see you again next time youâ€™re in the area for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here on a family trip to Disneyland, it was perfect. That walk to downtown Disney was easy, but the ART stops right at the front door if you want and is a quick ride. The staff made this hotel, super happy and knowledgable always willing to go the extra mile to help us. Breakfast was a great touch and we always cam back mid day for a swim or chance to go out and explore Aneheim. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone
Manager Response: Good evening Nikyee,  Thank you for your recent stay with us, and for giving us such a high recommendation. Weâ€™re glad we helped make your stay perfect as this is what we strive for. If youâ€™re even in the area again or simply have a few questions about the area give us a call and we will always do our best to help!  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Very nice, clean, but make sure to...
Summary: So, this is our second stay at this location.  This is also the only place we have returned to stay at in the Anaheim area while visiting Disneyland -- so we really like this place.  Here is why we like it: 1)  Rooms clean and fairly spacious.  They can seem a bit narrow, but overall good space 2) Close to Disneyland.  It is about a 1 mile walk to the park.  Even a little closer when you catch the monorail in Downtown Disneyland.  The walk is very nice -- since you don't have to walk down harbor blvd or over the freeway (you could go that way if you wanted).  We actually like to drive to the park from here -- and that is awesome.  Literally 1 minute from the parking garage and you are walking to the tram.   3)  Not on Harbor Blvd.  Harbor blvd is crazy busy.  This place is away
Manager Response: Good evening Bart P!  Thank you for coming to stay with us again and for taking the time to review our hotel. I think our location is perfect in that itâ€™s still a convenient distance yet away from the incredible business of Harbor. Weâ€™re sorry you were unable to get a room with a tub this time. While our single king rooms do not have tubs, tons of our double queen rooms have tubs in them. Next time youâ€™re thinking about coming to the area give us call so we can hopefully have a room with a tub for your next stay!  Sincerely,  Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We stayed at the Springhill suites- got in late and had an early call at Disney the next morning. We were greeted warmly and assigned to our room and parking with care. The queen double was beautiful and spacious. The TV HUGE and we felt the room was very modern and clean. We heard popping outside and opened our window- framed out the window perfectly were the Disney fireworks to our delight and surprise!! Darrell the GM and team were wonderful from beginning ot end and we are thankful for a restful experience!!
Manager Response: Good evening Staffingcoach!  Weâ€™re glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our large televisions in each room are wonderful for the huge amount of channels we provide as well as HBO in each room. Some of the best views of Disneyâ€™s fireworks shows are from our rooms that face the park! We hope to see you next time youâ€™re in the area!  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: My family stayed here in October 2014 while in town for Mickey's Halloween Party at Disney (so fun!).  Our room was quite spacious with two queen beds, semi-private sitting area, and large bathroom.  Very comfortable and clean.  We even had a view of the fireworks for the one night we were wiped out and came back to the room early to crash.  The helpful front desk staff called a cab for us; $10 each way to/from Disney AND we were able to call the same cab driver every time we needed a quick lift.  So convenient.  My only complaint was with the breakfast.  The food was not good.  The dining area was extremely crowded.  The other guests, many still dressed in pajamas, were sorely lacking in basic manners.  We ended up eating a small meal in the comfort and quiet of our room.  This
Manager Response: Good evening Klauswife!  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, and staying with us during the Halloween season. Disney does a great job with their yearly event and itâ€™s unforgettable experience. We regret that breakfast wasnâ€™t quite up to the standard you were expecting and we will work with our staff regarding this. We hope to see you again next time youâ€™re in the area.  Sincerely, Javier Urrutia Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We stayed here for a runDisney Star Wars Challenge Weekend run.  While the ART shuttle was free and frequent, we only took it a few times, as it's actually faster to walk to downtown disney and the parks than riding.  The included breakfast buffet was more than satisfying, but felt bad for the one guy on staff managing the entire breakfast setup.  He could use some help.  Desk staff was very pleasant and helpful.  As a Marriott Gold member, we got a free upgrade to a suite room, and other than the disney fireworks, we didn't hear any noise at all.  Beds were comfy.  Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Greg S Thank you for staying with us and writing about your recent stay. Iâ€™m glad you found our location convenient to the Disneyland resort and your events. I feel we have a great location, minutes away from Downtown Disney but still out of the way of major streets. This gives you the benefit of a quiet and relaxing stay without the intrusion of construction or traffic noise. Also thank you for your comments about our staff. They are topnotch and enjoyed having you and your family with us. However, we could not do it without our wonderful Marriott family and thank you for your loyalty as a gold elite member. I hope on your next vacation to the Anaheim area that youâ€™ll stay with us again.  Best wishes Jason Bell Front Office Manager
